Eastok Farmer: The European automotive industry as we know it will be gone

New episode of the show At eight

European producers on their knees, the future of the automotive industry is green and electric, and that price will have to be paid for it, says the member of the Hydria board and the mission coordinator Gremo Iztok Seljak.

Not only is the largest European economy, Germany, but the whole European Union and its economy in a serious crisis, which did not happen overnight, said Iztok Seljak, member of the board of HYDRA and coordinator of the GREMO mission, in the broadcast of Radio Slovenia's First Programme. The current situation in the European automotive industry is the result of a completely wrong strategy by the European Commission. But all of this is not just happening in the automotive industry. The automotive industry accounts for 10 percent of GDP, every seventh job, and it has huge multipliers for the economy as a whole. "Those who don't know they have a problem are in the worst of trouble, but they don't understand it yet", says Farmer.

China in a major advantage

"China has a 5-7 year advantage in 37 of the 44 key industries of the future. The rest is the United States. Slovenia is an integral part of the problem, rather than an integral part of the solution,' says Seljak. In its findings, China identified a global primate, not only in photovoltaics, wind power and electric vehicles. "First of all, she decided to set a vision, a strategy for a global leader in electric vehicles 20 years ago. It's now being done by 1.4 billion people in partnership with the state, science, education, the economy and everything else. In this respect, China subsidizes the development and production of electric vehicles at large amounts, unlike the European Union, where each of the 27 countries is moving in its own direction and the compromises between them cannot be innovative breakthroughs.' China controls 95 percent of the global photovoltaic industry, 80 percent of the global wind energy industry, and more than 70 percent of the lithium-ion battery industry. "And this is unlike our concepts of artificial intelligence, supported by automated production and renewable energy sources, which is contrary to our concepts, which are very outdated in this context. Things are moving very differently in Europe", he explains.

The Commission shall take into account the following:

At a time of crisis in the European automotive industry, an additional measure to reduce carbon dioxide emissions for manufacturers is coming in the new year. 'The EU, in my opinion, is committing suicide by the illusion that we will go forward by going backwards, by saving our uncompetitive electric vehicle production backwards with fossil fuels. Confused customers listen to this, and we have a correspondingly confused result. In the medium to long term, it is clear whether we like or not the predominant battery-powered electric vehicle. The sooner we realize it and adapt, the better", says the Farmer. It proposes that development investments in Slovenia be strengthened, breakthrough innovations be made available to China and other solutions be made available. "We need to strengthen our businesses in China, we need to make our way into Chinese supply chains, we need to establish ourselves in India, which is important for the future of the next 10 ⁇ 20 years. We must press Brussels for an immediate and clear strategy to resolve the crisis here too. This must be the only one and the only one for all 27 countries without unnecessary and harmful individual countries' solidarity", is one of the solutions Farmer sees.

More on what kind of cars we're gonna drive and how to deal with China, and on the podcast of the show, "Over Eight".

NSi želi s spremembami zakonov preprečiti zlorabe socialnih transferjev

Glasovanje o predlogih bo v četrtek

Poslanci so obravnavali sveženj zakonskih predlogov NSi-ja, povezanih z romskimi vprašanji. Z dopolnitvami zakonov želijo preprečevati zlorabe socialnih transferjev. Minister za delo Luka Mesec meni, da bi s predlaganimi ukrepi zgrešili bistvo.

V stranki NSi so zakonske spremembe urejanja trga dela ob izjemno nizki stopnji brezposelnosti pripravili z namenom aktivirati iskalce zaposlitve in preprečiti fiktivne prijave v evidencah brezposelnih. Menijo, da je treba zlorabam socialnih transferjev narediti konec.

Zato s predlogom novele o urejanju trga dela predlagajo, da bi zavodu za zaposlovanje omogočili, da po šestih mesecih brezposelno osebo napoti na delovno mesto, za katero se zahteva do dve stopnji nižja izobrazba, in da bi osebo, ki krši obveznosti do zavoda, prenehali voditi v evidenci brezposelnih oseb na dan izdaje odločbe.

S predlogom novele zakona o socialnovarstvenih prejemkih predlagajo, da se denarna socialna pomoč tri mesece izplačuje v naravi, če otrok neupravičeno ne obiskuje pouka osnovne šole. Denarna socialna pomoč bi se tri mesece izplačevala v naravi, tudi če bi obstajala dolg do javnih služb ali vzgojno-izobraževalnih zavodov.

S predlogom dopolnitev zakona o starševskem varstvu pa želijo, da bi se tudi otroški dodatek izplačeval v materialni obliki, če učenec ne obiskuje pouka. Če otrok ne nadaljuje izobraževanja v srednji šoli, se znesek otroškega dodatka zniža za 33 odstotkov oz. za tisti del, ki je namenjen izobraževanju. Za otroke s posebnimi potrebami pa bi se še naprej izplačeval v celoti.

S tem želijo v NSi-ju spodbuditi starše, da otrokom omogočijo dokončanje najmanj osnovne šole, kar je podlaga za vstop na trg dela in samostojno življenje.

Mesec: Spremembe "zgrešijo tarčo"

Minister za delo, družino, socialne zadeve in enake možnosti Mesec se je opredelil do celotnega zakonodajnega svežnja NSi-ja. Meni, da pri predlogu novele zakona o urejanju trga dela "zgrešimo tarčo", saj romska populacija izobrazbe po navadi sploh nima, z znižanjem stopnje izobrazbe Slovencem pa bodo delodajalci na delovna mesta, ki bi jih lahko zasedli Romi, raje vzeli njih.

Pri predlogu dopolnitev zakona o starševskem varstvu, ki predvideva, da bi se socialne pomoči oz. otroški dodatki znižali za 33 odstotkov, če otrok ne konča osnovne šole, minister poudarja, da ni študije, ki bi dokazovala, da bodo zaradi takšnega ukrepa otroci res končali šolanje. Podobno pa je tudi z zakonom o socialnovarstvenih prejemkih, ki predvideva izplačevanje socialne pomoči v naravi, če otrok ne obiskuje šole, meni minister.

Minister je dodal, da so do današnjega stanja v jugovzhodni Sloveniji pripeljala desetletja zanemarjanja, nekomunikacije z romsko skupnostjo. Tudi cilj vlade je uspešno sodelovanje in sobivanje z romsko skupnostjo, zato pripravljajo sistematičen pristop. Od 1. decembra bodo začeli zaposlovanje 30 dodatnih socialnih delavcev, ki se bodo ukvarjali z romsko populacijo, v zakonu o osnovni šoli pa bodo opredelili, da mora šola center za socialno delo sprotno obveščati o njegovi odsotnosti.

Z zavodom za zaposlovanje pa pripravljajo pilotni projekt Romano, s katerim bodo poskusili zaposliti določeno število Romov, zato da bodo ti lahko postali zgled dobre prakse v svojih okoljih, je nanizal Mesec.

V Svobodi ni podpore spremembam

Tudi v Svobodi menijo, da predlog ni ustrezen in ne bi dosegel svojega namena. Opozarjajo pa tudi, da je predlagana ureditev v nasprotju z ustavo, saj posega v pravico do svobode dela in v pravico do pravnega sredstva. Predlog novele zakona o socialnovarstvenih prejemkih pa po njihovem mnenju ne upošteva, da se številne družine spoprijemajo s kompleksnimi težavami, ki jih preprosto ni mogoče rešiti z odvzemom denarne socialne pomoči ali z izplačilom pomoči v obliki materialnih dobrin. Tovrstne spremembe niso sorazmerne z ustavno zagotovljenimi pravicami in bi lahko imele celo nasproten učinek, kot ga želijo doseči predlagatelji, menijo.

Podpora SDS-a

V SDS-u sveženj zakonskih sprememb NSi-ja podpirajo. Predlog novele zakona o urejanju trga dela podpirajo, saj zagovarjajo stališče, da je zaposlitev najpomembnejši način zagotavljanja socialne varnosti. Pravice romske skupnosti ne pomenijo, da za starše, ki svojih otrok ne pošiljajo v šolo, ni posledic in da ni posledic za neplačevanje obveznosti ali celo kazniva ravnanja, so poudarili.

SD opozarja na negativne posledice

V SD-ju opozarjajo, da bi negativne posledice morebitnega sprejema predloga novele zakona o urejanju trga dela čutili predvsem mladi, prvi iskalci zaposlitve, ki imajo višjo ali visoko izobrazbo, ter starejši delavci z nižjo izobrazbo. To bi vodilo v naraščanje števila dolgotrajno brezposelnih ljudi. Opozarjajo tudi, da denarna socialna pomoč ni namenjena spodbujanju izobraževanja, ampak zagotavljanju materialnih pogojev za zadovoljevanje minimalnih življenjskih potrebščin posameznika ali družine, ki je socialno ogrožena.

Levica: Gre za populistično norost

Predlog novele zakona o urejanju trga dela so v Levici označili za populistično norost, predlog pa je po njihovem mnenju antisocialen, atidelavski in tudi ironičen. Država bi po njihovem mnenju še tiste Rome, ki jim uspe pridobiti izobrazbo, silila opravljati dela za občutno nižje plačilo, menijo. Menijo, da je neprimeren tudi ukrep izplačevanja socialne pomoči v naravi, saj bi to poslabšalo stanje v finančno šibkejših družinah. Poudarili so, da je trenutno odločitev za izplačevanje socialne pomoči v naravi prepuščena strokovni presoji socialnih delavcev.

NSi je v parlamentarni postopek vložil sveženj zakonskih predlogov, povezanih z romskimi vprašanji in temelji na svežnju zakonov, ki jih je v DZ vložila že skupina županov občin jugovzhodne Slovenije in Posavja, a jih je DZ zavrnil. Med njimi predloge novel zakonov o osnovni šoli, o urejanju trga dela in o socialnovarstvenih prejemkih ter predlog dopolnitev zakona o starševskem varstvu in družinskih prejemkih. DZ bo o njih glasoval v četrtek.
2024-09-25.title: NSi želi s spremembami zakonov preprečiti zlorabe socialnih transferjev

The Commission has proposed amendments to the law to prevent the abuse of social transfers.

The vote on the proposals will be held on Thursday.

MEPs discussed a set of NSI legislative proposals related to Roma issues. They want to amend the laws to prevent the abuse of social transfers. Minister of Labour Luka Mesec considers that the measures proposed would be in error of substance.

In the NSi party, legislative changes to the labour market regulation at an extremely low unemployment rate were prepared with the aim of activating jobseekers and preventing fictitious registration in unemployment records. They think the abuse of social transfers should be stopped.

The proposal for a regulation of the labour market therefore proposes that the employment institution be allowed to refer the unemployed person to a job which requires up to two degrees of lower education after six months and that the person who breaches his obligations to the institution should be stopped from being registered as unemployed on the date of the decision.

The new Social Work Benefits Act proposes that the financial social assistance be paid in kind for three months if the child does not attend primary school unjustifiably. The social assistance would be paid in kind for three months, even if there were debts to public services or educational establishments.

The proposal to amend the Parental Protection Act also requires that the child benefit be paid in cash if the pupil does not attend the class. If the child does not continue his/her secondary education, the child allowance shall be reduced by 33% or for the part intended for education. And for children with special needs, I would continue to pay in full.

In this way, the NSI aims to encourage parents to allow their children to complete at least primary school, which is the basis for entry into the labour market and independent living.

Month: Changes "miss the target"

The Minister for Labour, Family, Social Affairs and Equal Opportunities Moon has identified himself to the full legislative package of the NSI. He believes that the proposal for a new law on the regulation of the labour market is "misguided" because the Roma population does not usually have an education at all, and that by lowering the level of education for the Slovenians, employers will prefer to take them away from jobs that could be filled by Roma.

In the proposal to amend the Parental Welfare Act, which provides that social assistance or child allowance would be reduced by 33 percent if the child does not finish primary school, the Minister stresses that no study would prove that such a measure would actually lead to the children's leaving school. The Minister also said that the Social Security Act, which provides for the payment of social assistance in kind, is similar if the child does not attend school.

The Minister added that decades of neglect, communication with the Roma community, led to the current situation in southeastern Slovenia. The government also aims to cooperate and coexist successfully with the Roma community, and therefore is preparing a systematic approach. From 1 December, 30 additional social workers will be hired to deal with the Roma population and the primary school law will stipulate that the school must inform the social work centre of its absence.

The employment institute is preparing a pilot project, Romano, which will try to recruit a certain number of Roma to become examples of good practice in their environment, the moon said.

Freedom is not a change-making force.

They also believe that the proposal is inappropriate and would not achieve its purpose. They also point out that the proposed regulation is unconstitutional as it affects the right to freedom of work and the right to a remedy. The new proposal for the Social Security Act, however, does not take into account the fact that, in their view, many families face complex problems which simply cannot be solved by withdrawing social security or by paying out material goods. Such changes are not proportionate to constitutionally guaranteed rights and could even have the opposite effect as the proposers seek to achieve, they consider.

Support for SDS

In the SDS, the legislative amendments package is supported by the NSI. They support the new Labour Market Regulation Bill, as they support the view that employment is the most important way of ensuring social security. The rights of the Roma community do not mean that there are no consequences for parents who do not send their children to school, and that there are no consequences for non-payment of obligations or even for criminal conduct, they stressed.

The SD warns of the negative consequences

The SD warns that the negative consequences of the possible adoption of the new labour market regulation law proposal would be felt mainly by young people, first job seekers with higher or higher education and older workers with lower education. This would lead to an increase in the number of longterm unemployed. They also point out that the purpose of financial social assistance is not to promote education but to provide material conditions to meet the minimum living needs of a socially disadvantaged individual or family.

Left: It's populist madness

The proposal for a new labour market regulation law was called populist madness by the Left, and they considered it antisocial, anti-slavery and even ironic. They believe that even those Roma who manage to get an education should be forced to work for significantly lower wages. They also consider that the measure to pay social assistance in kind is inappropriate, as it would worsen the situation in financially weaker families. They argued that the current decision to pay social assistance in kind is left to the professional discretion of social workers.

NSi has submitted a series of legislative proposals related to Roma issues to the parliamentary procedure, based on a series of laws already submitted to the DZ by a group of mayors of the municipalities of south-east Slovenia and Posavia, but which have been rejected by the DZ. Among them are the draft new laws on primary education, labour market regulation and social security benefits and the proposal to supplement the Parental and Family Benefits Act. The DZ is voting on them on Thursday.
2024-09-25.english_title: The Commission has proposed amendments to the law to prevent the abuse of social transfers.

Plače v realnem sektorju: "Zasebni sektor v Sloveniji višine plač namenoma skriva"

Rok Spruk meni, da bi se ob transparentnosti pokazalo, kako mizerne so slovenske plače glede na znanje in potencial

V javnem sektorju govorimo o enotnem plačnem sistemu, za realni sektor pa velja nasprotno. Plače se prilagajajo dogajanju na trgu dela. Nekateri zaposleni se o višini dogovorijo z delodajalcem, večinoma pa so še veljavne podjetniške kolektivne pogodbe.

Zasebna podjetja so si postavila plačni sistem, ki je za njih vzdržen. Imamo podjetja, ki izplačujejo razliko do minimalne plače, in imamo podjetja, kjer so plače visoko nad minimalno. Plače v gospodarstvu zaznamuje beseda raznolikost. Sindikalistka Mateja Gerečnik: "V gospodarstvu se na primer pojavlja to, da ima lahko inženir v enem podjetju trikrat višjo plačo kot inženir v drugem podjetju."

Plačni sistem v gospodarstvu ni transparenten, pa ocenjuje profesor ljubljanske ekonomske fakultete Rok Spruk: "Zakaj? Ker zasebni sektor to v Sloveniji namenoma skriva, saj bi se izkazalo, kako mizerne plače izplačuje, glede na to, koliko imamo v Sloveniji človeškega kapitala in znanja."

V zadnjem letu so plače v zasebnem sektorju kljub večji produktivnosti zastale. Spruk pravi: "Smejim se kolegom iz gospodarstva, ki pravijo, da imajo pomanjkanje kadra, pomanjkanje talenta. Pa jih vi vprašate, koliko oni plačajo ta talent?"

In višina plač v zasebnem sektorju? Po podatkih statističnega urada so v povprečju najvišje v financah, zavarovalništvu in energetiki – gre za malenkost več kot dva tisoč evrov neto, najnižje pa v gostinstvu, približno 1100 evrov neto.

"Mi nimamo statistike o plačah in nagradah predsednikov uprave. Tega nimamo. Pravijo, da je to poslovna skrivnost … Kakšna poslovna skrivnost, lepo vas prosim!" poudarja Spruk.

Ne samo plača, vedno bolj pomembni so delovni pogoji. Tudi zato je fluktuacija v zadnjem času pogostejša, poudarja Mateja Gerečnik: "Dobri, kadri, taki, ki se lahko prodajo za več, odhajajo iz podjetij: torej bolje izobražen kader odhaja pogosteje, manj izobražen kader pa redkeje."

Če primerjamo evropske plače, spadamo – glede na bruto domači proizvod na prebivalca – v mediteranski bazen. To pomeni, da so slovenske plače izenačene s španskimi in italijanskimi.

Real sector wages: "The private sector in Slovenia intentionally hides the wage level"

The Court considers that transparency would show how poorly Slovenian salaries are in terms of knowledge and potential

In the public sector, we are talking about a single pay system, but in the real sector, the opposite is true. Pay is adapted to developments in the labour market. Some employees agree on a level with the employer, but most still have collective agreements in force.

Private companies have set up a pay system that is sustainable for them. We have companies that pay the difference to the minimum wage, and we have companies where the wages are high above the minimum wage. Wages in the economy are marked by the word diversity. Trade unionist Mateja Gerečnik: "In the economy, for example, it appears that an engineer in one company can earn three times as much as an engineer in another".

The wage system in the economy is not transparent, but Professor Rok Spruk of the Ljubljana School of Economics says: "Why? Because the private sector in Slovenia is deliberately hiding this, because it would show how poor wages are paid, given how much human capital and knowledge we have in Slovenia.'

In the last year, wages in the private sector have fallen despite increased productivity. The passage says: "I laugh at colleagues in the economy who say they lack the skills, the talent. And you ask them how much they pay for that talent?"

And the payroll in the private sector? According to the Statistical Office, the highest average in finance, insurance and energy are  ⁇  a little over EUR 2 000 net and the lowest in hospitality, around EUR 1100 net.

"We have no statistics on the salaries and salaries of the chairmen of the board. We don't have that. They say it's a business secret... What a business secret, please!" emphasizes Spruk.

Not only pay, but working conditions are becoming more important. This is also why fluctuations have become more common lately, notes Matej Gerčnik: "Well, cadres who can sell for more are leaving companies: so the better-educated cadres leave more often, and the less-educated cadres less often".

When we compare European wages, we fall  ⁇  in terms of GDP per capita  ⁇  in the Mediterranean basin. This means that Slovenian wages are equivalent to Spanish and Italian wages.

Wall Street na novem vrhu kljub padcu potrošniškega zaupanja

Potencialno žarišče: komercialne nepremičnine

Wall Street se kar ne utrudi pri postavljanju rekordnih vrednosti, zabavi pa se je v torek pridružila še Kitajska, kjer so sveži ukrepi centralne banke okrepili zaupanje v tamkajšnji delniški trg. Zlato še naprej sije, visoki obeti so pri srebru.

Kitajska narodna banka je napovedala nove likvidnostne ukrepe, med drugim bo za 0,2 odstotne točke (z 1,7 na 1,5 odstotka) znižala sedemdnevno repo obrestno mero, poslovnim bankam pa bo znižala stopnjo obveznih rezerv za pol odstotne točke. Delniški trgi na Kitajskem so se odzvali z močno rastjo delnic, indeks CSI 300 je poskočil za 4,3 odstotka, kar je največja enodnevna rast po juliju 2020. Tudi v New Yorku so delnice kitajskih podjetij občutno porasle, tečaj proizvajalca električnih vozil BYD je porasel za pet odstotkov in je na letošnjem maksimumu (Volkswagnove so, na primer, skoraj 30 odstotkov pod 52-tedenskim vrhom), spletne trgovine Alibaba pa se je zvišal za sedem odstotkov.

Padec potrošniškega zaupanja ni pregnal optimizmaNa Wall Streetu je bil torek spet v znamenju novih rekordov, kar je manjše presenečenje, saj svež podatek o potrošniškem zaupanju vzbuja nelagodje. Očitno je slabši trg dela (julija je ameriško gospodarstvo odprlo najmanj delovnih mest po januarju 2021) načel moralo povprečnega Američana, tako da je indeks potrošniškega zaupanja z avgustovskih 105,6 nazadoval na 98,7 točke. Padec je bil večji od napovedi. Vlagatelji so to prezrli, močno so šle spet navzgor (+3,9 %) delnice Nvidie (spet so nad 120 dolarji in s tem višje kot ob junijski cepitvi delnic), pa tudi proizvajalca gradbene mehanizacije Caterpillar (+4,0 %), pri katerem je rast povezana s kitajskimi ukrepi.

Sijejo tudi plemenite kovineCena zlata je dosegla novo rekordno vrednost in presegla 2.650 dolarjev za 31,1-gramsko unčo, srebro (ni jih malo, ki mu za prihodnost napovedujejo višjo rast kot zlatu) pa je poskočilo za skoraj pet odstotkov, nad 32 dolarjev. Gre še vedno za odziv na visoko Fedovo znižanje obrestne mere Fed funds prejšnji teden v kombinaciji z vse večjimi geopolitičnimi tveganji, saj so razmere na Bližnjem vzhodu vse slabše. Tu je še negotovost pred ameriškimi volitvami, pa seveda močni nakupi številnih centralnih bank. Precej na skrivaj naj bi svoje zlate rezerve kopičila še Savdska Arabija. Letos so se cene zlata zvišale že za skoraj 30 odstotkov in vse kaže, da bo to najboljše leto za to najbolj cenjeno plemenito  kovino v 14 letih.

Eden od njih so komercialne nepremičnine (pisarne, gospodarski obrati ...), katerih vrednost se je (zaradi hitrega zvišanja obrestnih mer) od vrha pred dobrima dvema letoma znižala za več kot 20 odstotkov, po nekaterih ocenah pa bi se lahko na koncu celo za 35 odstotkov. Wall Street at a new peak despite a fall in consumer confidence

Potential location: commercial real estate

Wall Street is not tired of setting record values, and China joined the party Tuesday, where the central bank's fresh measures have boosted confidence in the local stock market. Gold continues to shine, high yields are near silver.

The Bank of China announced new liquidity measures, including a reduction of the seven-day repo rate by 0,2 percentage points (from 1,7 to 1,5%) and a reduction of the reserve requirement rate by half percentage points for commercial banks. The Chinese stock markets responded with strong share growth, with the CSI 300 index jumping 4.3%, the highest one-day growth since July 2020. Shares of Chinese companies also rose sharply in New York, with the rate of electric vehicle manufacturer BYD rising by 5 percent to this year's high (Volkswagns, for example, are almost 30 percent below a 52-week peak), and the online store Alibaba rising by 7 percent.

The decline in consumer confidence has not driven optimism on Wall Street, which was again a record-breaking Tuesday, which is less surprising as fresh data on consumer confidence is causing discomfort. The deteriorating labour market (the US economy opened the least jobs after January 2021) is apparently the principle of the average American's morale, so that the Consumer Confidence Index has fallen from 105.6 points in August to 98.7 points. The fall was bigger than expected. Investors have ignored this, with Nvidie's shares rising sharply (+3,9%) (over $120 in the end, thus higher than at the June stock-sharing) and Caterpillar's construction machinery manufacturer (+4,0%) also rising sharply, with growth linked to Chinese measures.

Gold has surpassed a new record high of $2,650 for a 31.1-gram ounce, and silver (not a few of them predicting higher growth than gold for the future) has jumped nearly five percent, to over $32. It's still a response to the Fed's high rate cut on Fed funds last week combined with increasing geopolitical risks as the situation in the Middle East worsens. There's still uncertainty ahead of the US election, and of course, strong purchases of many central banks. Saudi Arabia is supposed to be accumulating its gold reserves in secret. Gold prices have already risen by nearly 30 percent this year, and it seems likely to be the best year for the most valuable precious metal in 14 years.

A bad sign if the Fed cycle starts with such a high cut, September, as it turns out, will not justify the reputation of the worst month of the year this time, as, with the exception of the panic at the beginning of the month, the index is looking for new highs, which is mainly linked to the start of interest rate cuts in the US. The Fed just dropped interest rates from a 23-year high at its September meeting, and that's by 50 basis points. Some see this as a bad sign, as the Fed's interest rate cut cycle began with such a cut in 2001 and 2007 and was followed by sharp falls in stock indices. Interestingly, the interest rate cut period of 2007 also began on 18 September and the Fed reduced the rate from 5,25 to 4,75 percent as it did last week.

Potential hotspot: commercial real estateThe economic situation is considerably better than it was before the financial crisis (it was mainly affected by the flood of the secondary mortgage market at the time), but there are still several risk factors. One of these is commercial real estate (office, economic establishments ...), whose value (due to the rapid increase in interest rates) has fallen by more than 20% since its peak two years ago, and according to some estimates could eventually fall by as much as 35%. The problem is that over the next two years, over a trillion dollars of commercial real estate loans will collapse, which could cause serious problems for smaller banks that are too exposed to this sector. This is certainly a potential hotspot for a new crisis.
2024-09-25.english_title: Wall Street at a new peak despite a fall in consumer confidence

2024-09-24.author: Nastja Stopar, TV Slovenija
2024-09-24.content:
Ministrstvo bo moralo odšteti še 100.000 evrov za dostavo naprav uporabnikom

Stroški se kopičijo

Koliko denarja bo ministrstvo za digitalno preobrazbo na koncu odštelo za računalnike, za katere ministrica Emilija Stojmenova Duh trdi, da je bil njihov nakup pravilna odločitev? Plačati bodo morali še 100.000 evrov za dostavo računalnikov uporabnikom.

Na ministrstvu so za TV Slovenija potrdili še en strošek, povezan z nakupom 13.000 računalnikov. Strošek dostave do upravičencev znaša 10,65 evra z DDV-jem na kos opreme. "S hitro matematiko ugotovimo, da bo ministrstvo za distribucijo 10.000 računalnikov odštelo dobrih 100.000 evrov. Šole so namreč računalnike prevzele same," je za TV Dnevnik poročala Nastja Stopar.

Upravičencem bo računalnike razdelila Pošta Slovenije, ki je oddala najnižjo ponudbo.

Čeprav ministrica Stojmenova Duh trdi, da že od začetka postopek vodijo transparentno in da o vseh stroških poročajo javno, so na TV Slovenija pred nekaj dnevi razkrili javnosti še neznan strošek namestitve operacijskega sistema Linux, in sicer 250.000. Računalnike so namreč kupili brez operacijskega sistema.

Pod črto – ministrica je za nakup računalnikov odštela šest in pol milijona evrov, dodatnih 350.000 evrov za namestitev operacijskega sistema in distribucijo, še okoli 14.000 evrov pa so do zdaj plačali za najem prostorov, v katerih še vedno hranijo okoli 8000 računalnikov.

Zanimanje za izposojo računalnikov sicer raste, vendar šele zdaj, ko je krog upravičencev zelo razširjen, in sicer do šestega dohodkovnega razreda.

Ministrica bo nakup vnovič pojasnjevala v petek na že drugi interpelaciji, podporo premierja za zdaj še uživa.
2024-09-24.title: Ministrstvo bo moralo odšteti še 100.000 evrov za dostavo naprav uporabnikom
2024-09-24.english_content:
The Ministry will have to pay an additional €100,000 to deliver the devices to users

Costs accumulate

How much money will the Department of Digital Transformation ultimately spend on computers that Minister Emilia Spirit says were the right thing to do? They'll have to pay another 100,000 euros to deliver computers to users.

The Ministry confirmed another cost for TV Slovenia related to the purchase of 13,000 computers. The cost of delivery to the beneficiaries shall be EUR 10,65 with VAT per piece of equipment. "We're quick to figure out that the Department of Distribution will deduct a good 100,000 euros from 10,000 computers. Schools have taken over computers themselves", Nastya Stopar told TV Dnevnik.

The computer will be distributed to the beneficiaries by the Slovenian Post Office, which has made the lowest bid.

Although Minister Stojmenova Duh claims that the procedure has been conducted transparently from the outset and that all costs are reported publicly, the unknown cost of installing the Linux operating system, which is 250.000, was revealed to the public a few days ago on TV Slovenia. The computers were bought without an operating system.

The Ministry has allocated €6.5 million to the purchase of computers, an additional €350,000 to install the operating system and distribute them, and about €14,000 more to date to rent the premises where they still store around 8,000 computers.

Interest in computer lending is growing, but only now, when the number of beneficiaries is very high, up to the sixth income class.

The Minister will explain the purchase again on Friday at the second interpelation, and the Prime Minister's support is still there.
2024-09-24.english_title: The Ministry will have to pay an additional €100,000 to deliver the devices to users

2024-09-24.author: G. C.
2024-09-24.content:
Zunanje ministrstvo zaradi napadov v Libanonu na pogovor poklicalo izraelskega veleposlanika

Fajon: Zdi se, da Libanon postaja nova Gaza, razmere so zelo skrb vzbujajoče

Zunanje ministrstvo je zaradi izraelskih napadov v Libanonu poklicalo na pogovor izraelskega veleposlanika, je sporočila zunanja ministrica Tanja Fajon. Po navedbah virov na zunanjem ministrstvu je pogovor predviden v sredo dopoldne.

Kot je dejala ministrica Tanja Fajon ob robu zasedanja Generalne skupščine ZN-a v New Yorku, se zdi, da Libanon postaja nova Gaza, razmere pa je označila za skrb vzbujajoče. "Dejstvo je, da Izrael tako v Libanonu kot tudi v Gazi, Palestini, na Zahodnem bregu nasilje stopnjuje. Stopnjuje vojaške operacije," je poudarila in izpostavila, da gre za kršitve mednarodnega prava in tudi za nespoštovanje razsodbe Meddržavnega sodišča (ICJ) o takojšnji ustavitvi nasilne okupacije.

"Slovenija bo naredila vse, kar je v naši moči ob spoštovanju mednarodnega prava in pa seveda Ustanovne listine Združenih narodov," je napovedala in sporočila, da se bo v kratkem sešla z libanonskim zunanjim ministrom Abdalahom Bou Habibom, da se pogovorita, kaj je še mogoče narediti.

Stalna članica Varnostnega sveta ZN-a Francija je v ponedeljek zahtevala izredno zasedanje Varnostnega sveta ZN-a zaradi zaostrovanja razmer med Izraelom in Libanonom. Ministrica Fajon je povedala, da Slovenija kot predsedujoča Varnostnemu svetu prav zdaj usklajuje nujno zasedanje o Libanonu, ki bo predvidoma v prihodnjih dneh.
2024-09-24.title: Zunanje ministrstvo zaradi napadov v Libanonu na pogovor poklicalo izraelskega veleposlanika
2024-09-24.english_content:
The Foreign Ministry has called the Israeli ambassador for talks on the attacks in Lebanon

Lebanon appears to be becoming the new Gaza, the situation is very worrying

The Foreign Ministry has called for an interview with the Israeli ambassador following the Israeli attacks in Lebanon, Foreign Minister Tanja Fajon said. According to sources at the Foreign Ministry, the meeting is scheduled for Wednesday morning.

As Minister Tanja Fajon said on the sidelines of the UN General Assembly in New York, Lebanon appears to be becoming the new Gaza, and she called the situation of concern. "The fact is that Israel is escalating violence in Lebanon as well as in Gaza, Palestine, the West Bank. It is escalating military operations,' she stressed, pointing out that these violations of international law and also violations of the International Court of Justice (ICJ) ruling to immediately cease the violent occupation.

"Slovenia will do everything in our power to respect international law and, of course, the Charter of the United Nations", she announced, announcing that she will soon meet with Lebanese Foreign Minister Abdallah Bou Habib to discuss what else can be done.

France, a permanent member of the UN Security Council, called for an emergency UN Security Council meeting on Monday to address the escalation of relations between Israel and Lebanon. Minister Fajon said that Slovenia, as the Security Council Chair, is currently coordinating an emergency session on Lebanon, which is expected to take place in the coming days.
2024-09-24.english_title: The Foreign Ministry has called the Israeli ambassador for talks on the attacks in Lebanon

2024-09-15.author: M. L.
2024-09-15.content:
Dirka za VN Azerbajdžana, Baku

Leclercu sobotne kvalifikacije

Ob 13. uri se je v Bakuju začela dirka formule ena za VN Azerbajdžana. Najboljši startni položaj si je v soboto s ferrarijem priboril Charles Leclerc.

Monačan je četrtič zapored dobil kvalifikacije v Bakuju, a do danes še ni uspel pretopiti najboljšega startnega položaja v zmago. Kvalifikacije je dobil prepričljivo, za več kot tri desetinke sekunde je bil hitrejši od Oscarja Piastrija v mclarnu.

V drugo startno vrsto se je uvrstil Carlos Sainz mlajši (Ferrari), ob njega še Sergio Perez (Red Bull), v tretjo startno vrsto sta se zvrstila George Russell (Mercedes) in Max Verstappen (Red Bull). Zaradi menjave pogonskega sklopa bosta dirko iz boksov začela Lewis Hamilton (Mercedes) in Esteban Ocon (Alpine). 

Največji osmoljenec kvalifikacij je bil Lando Norris. Najbližji Verstappnov zasledovalec v skupnem seštevku za svetovno prvenstvo v formuli ena je izpadel že v prvem delu in je osvojil 17. mesto.

Dirka se je začela ob 13. uri. Lansko preizkušnjo je dobil Perez pred Verstappnom in Leclercom.

Leclerc zadržal Piastrija, Perez mimo SainzaLeclerc je dirko začel brezhibno, z zunanjega dela steze je za hip zaprl Piastrija in v uvodni zavoj proge zapeljal kot vodilni. Seveda mu je šlo na roko tudi dejstvo, da je od starta do uvodnega zavoja zgolj 90 m ravnine. Slabše se je odrezal Leclercov moštveni kolega Sainz mlajši, ki je izgubil boj s Perezom in padel na četrto mesto. Mehičan je Španca ugnal po notranji strani uvodnega zavoja. Norris, ki je sobotne kvalifikacije sklenil šele na 17. mestu, dirko pa začel s 15. startnega položaja, je že v prvem krogu nadoknadil dve mesti, na začetku drugega je prehitel še Nica Hülkenberga (Haas) za 12. mesto. Azerbajdžansko preizkušnjo je začel na najtrši različici gum. 

Zanimivo, Leclerc in Piastri sta 4. krog odpeljala v identičnem času (1:48,408). Leclerc je še naprej nizal najhitrejše kroge, v 9. krogu je postavil čas 1:47,672, bil je šest desetink hitrejši od Piastrija, prednost pa je narasla že na dve sekundi in pol, v 11. krogu že več kot tri sekunde. 

Dirka za VN Azerbajdžana, Baku
2024-09-15.title: Dirka za VN Azerbajdžana, Baku
2024-09-15.english_content:
The race for the UN of Azerbaijan, Baku

The Saturday Qualification Leclerc

At 1 p.m. the Formula One race for the Azerbaijan U.N. started in Baku. The best starting position ever was a Charles Leclerc on Saturday with a Ferrari.

Monaco qualified for the fourth consecutive time in Baku, but to date has not managed to turn its best starting position into a win. He got his qualification convincingly, by more than three tenths of a second, faster than Oscar Piastria at McLaren.

The second race was won by Carlos Sainz Jr. (Ferrari), followed by Sergio Perez (Red Bull), and the third race was won by George Russell (Mercedes) and Max Verstappen (Red Bull). The race will be started by Lewis Hamilton (Mercedes) and Esteban Ocon (Alpine) as a result of the change in the powertrain.

The biggest qualifier was Lando Norris. Verstapp's closest World Championship runner-up in Formula One was knocked out in the first round, taking 17th place.

The race started at 1 p.m. Last year, he won the test against Verstappn and Leclerc.

Leclerc stopped Piastria, Perez passed SainzaLeclerc started the race flawlessly, closed Piastria off the outside of the track for a moment and drove into the opening curve of the track as the lead. Of course, he also had the benefit of the fact that the plane from start to start was only 90 m. Worse, Leclerc's male colleague Sainz Jr. lost the fight to Perez and fell to fourth. The Mexican pushed the Spaniard through the inside of the opening curtain. Norris, who finished 17th in Saturday's qualifying and started 15th, had already completed the first round by two places, and had already overtaken Nice Hülkenberg (Haas) for 12th place at the start of the second round. Azerbaijan started the test on the most brittle version of the tyres.

Interestingly, Leclerc and Piastra made the fourth lap at the same time (1:48,408). Leclerc continued to set the fastest lap, setting a time of 1:47.672 in lap 9, six tenths faster than Piastria, and the lead had already increased to two and a half seconds, more than three seconds in lap 11.

The race for the UN of Azerbaijan, Baku
2024-09-15.english_title: The race for the UN of Azerbaijan, Baku

2024-09-15.author: T. O.
2024-09-15.content:
Od Slovencev skozi kvalifikacije krosa le Jakob Šavli

Angleški dan v Ivrei: dve zmagi in štiri medalje

Na tekmi svetovnega pokala v kajaku in kanuju v Ivrei v kajakaškem krosu ni bilo slovenskega uspeha. V ženski konkurenci med šestnajsterico v izločilnih bojih ni bilo nobene Slovenke, pri moških pa je napredoval Jakob Šavli in izpadel v četrtfinalu.

Na italijanskem prizorišču v Piemontu, kjer je bilo sončno in toplo (24 stopinj) se je zmage pri ženskah veselila Britanka Mallory Franklin. Druga je bila njena rojakinja Kimberley Woods, tretja pa Avstralka Noemie Fox.

Moški finale je dobil Britanec Jonny Dickson. Srebrno medaljo je osvojil Francoz Gael Adisson, bronasto Britanec Sam Leaver. Favorizirani Joseph Clarke se je moral zadovoljiti s četrtim mestom.

Sobotno dogajanje je bilo s slovenskega zornega kota izjemno uspešno. Benjamin Savšek je zmagal na tekmi kanuistov, v kajaku pa sta se na oder za zmagovalce zavihtela Eva Terčelj in Peter Kauzer. Savšek in Kauzer danes nista tekmovala.
2024-09-15.title: Od Slovencev skozi kvalifikacije krosa le Jakob Šavli
2024-09-15.english_content:
From the Slovenes through qualifying cross only Jakob Svali

English day at Ivrea: two wins and four medals

The World Cup of Kayak and Canoe in Ivrei in the kayak cross country was not a Slovenian success. In the women's 16th-place competition, there were no Slovenian women in the qualifying rounds, but Jakob Svavli advanced to the quarter-finals in the men's competition.

On the Italian stage in Piedmont, where it was sunny and warm (24 degrees Celsius), the women's victory was celebrated by the British woman Mallory Franklin. The second was her cousin Kimberley Woods, and the third was Australian Noemie Fox.

The men's final was won by Briton Jonny Dickson. The silver medal was won by Frenchman Gael Adisson, bronze medalist Sam Leaver. The favored Joseph Clarke had to settle for fourth place.

The Saturday event was a great success from the Slovenian perspective. Benjamin Savshek won the canoeing competition, and Eva Tercel and Peter Kauzer were on the winning side in the kayak. Savshek and Kauser didn't compete today.
2024-09-15.english_title: From the Slovenes through qualifying cross only Jakob Svali

2024-09-15.author: T. O.
2024-09-15.content:
Jorge Prado Gajserja spravil v nehvaležen položaj

Zadnja dirka bo čez dva tedna – VN Castille La Manche

Tim Gajser je na predzadnji preizkušnji sezone svetovnega prvenstva, dirki za VN Kitajske, po ponesrečenem nastopu izgubil vodstvo v skupnem seštevku. Veliko več razlogov za veselje ima Jan Pancar, ki je dosegel izid kariere.

Prva vožnja Tima Gajserja je bila za pozabo. Po številnih padcih je zasedel šele 17. mesto, njegov glavni konkurent Španec Jorge Prado pa je bil drugi in je tako že prevzel položaj vodilnega v skupnem seštevku. Zmagal je Francoz Romain Febvre.

V drugi vožnji je bil slovenski šampion sicer drugi, a znova za Pradom, kar pomeni, da pred zadnjo dirko, ki bo čez dva tedna v Španiji, za branilcem naslova svetovnega prvaka v razredu MXGP zaostaja za sedem točk.

Dosežek kariere si je v Šanghaju privozil drugi slovenski predstavnik v elitnem razredu Jan Pancar. V prvi vožnji je bil osmi, s čimer je izenačil svoj najboljši dosežek v posamični vožnji, v drugi pa je še napredoval in s petim mestom – tako v drugi vožnji kot skupno na dirki –, dosegel rezultat kariere. V skupnem seštevku ostaja na 14. mestu.

Dirka bi morala biti v ponedeljek, a so jo zaradi napovedanega slabega vremena izpeljali že ob klasičnem nedeljskem terminu.

Dvajseta in hkrati zadnja letošnja preizkušnja svetovnega prvenstva v motokrosu bo v nedeljo, 29. septembra. To bo dirka za VN Castille La Manche, ki bo na progi v Cozarju.
2024-09-15.title: Jorge Prado Gajserja spravil v nehvaležen položaj
2024-09-15.english_content:
Jorge Prado put Geiser in an unthankful position

The last race is in two weeks.

Tim Geiser lost the lead in the overall standings in the preliminary test of the World Cup, the race for the Chinese team, after an unfortunate performance. There are many more reasons to rejoice in the success of Jan Pancar's career.

Tim Geiser's first ride was a long one. After many falls, he only finished 17th, while his main competitor, the Spaniard Jorge Prado, came second and took the lead overall. The Frenchman Romain Febvre won.

In the second race, the Slovenian champion was second, but again behind Prado, which means that before the final race, which will be held in Spain in two weeks, he is seven points behind the defending world champion in the MXGP class.

The second Slovenian representative in the elite class Jan Pancar brought his career achievement to Shanghai. In the first race he was eighth, matching his best individual finish, and in the second he advanced further, finishing fifth in both the second race and the overall race, achieving a career record. In total, he remains 14th.

The race was supposed to be on Monday, but due to the predicted bad weather, it was already on a classic Sunday date.

The 20th and final test of this year's Motocross World Championships will be held on Sunday, September 29. This will be the run for the UN Castille La Manche, which will be held at the track in Cozar.
2024-09-15.english_title: Jorge Prado put Geiser in an unthankful position

2024-09-15.author: T. O.
2024-09-15.content:
Beograjsko občinstvo navdušeno, ko je Đoković izgubil igro

Filip Krajinović se poslavlja od tenisa

Srbija je na dvoboju skupinskega dela Davisovega pokala proti Grčiji v Beogradu povedla z 2:0 in za zmago potrebuje še eno točko. Prepričljiv je bil predvsem Novak Đoković, ki je s 6:0 in 6:1 premagal 770. igralca sveta Joanisa Ksilasa.

Grčija po odpovedi Stefanosa Cicipasa v Beogradu nima igralca med prvimi 500 na lestvici ATP, zato je vloga favorita jasno. Đoković, ki igra prvič po izpadu v 3. krogu Odprtega prvenstva ZDA, je delo opravil v 45 minutah.

Ko je 23-letni Ksilas pri zaostanku 5:0 z asom dobil svojo edino igro, je vsa dvorana Pionir po pozivu peščice grških navijačev začela navdušeno ploskati. Ne le Ksilas, tudi Đoković je s smehom pospremil to gesto.

Miomir Kecmanović je s 6:3 in 6:3 premagal Aristotelisa Tanosa.

Po današnjih dvobojih bo kariero končal 32-letni Filip Krajinović, ki v profesionalni karieri ni osvojil nobenega turnirja, na lestvici ATP pa je bil najvišje leta 2018 na 26. mestu.
2024-09-15.title: Beograjsko občinstvo navdušeno, ko je Đoković izgubil igro
2024-09-15.english_content:
Belgian audiences excited when Djokovic lost the game

Filip Krajinovic is saying goodbye to tennis.

Serbia won the Davis Cup group stage match against Greece in Belgrade 2-0 and need another point to win. Novak Djoković was particularly convincing, beating the world's 770th player, Joanis Ksilas, 6-0, 6-1.

Greece has not had a player in the top 500 of the ATP since Stefanos Tsipras was sacked in Belgrade, so the role of the favourite is clear. Djokovic, who plays for the first time since being knocked out in the third round of the US Open, finished the job in 45 minutes.

When 23-year-old Xilas got his only game behind by a score of 5-0, the whole Pioneer Hall began to cheer enthusiastically at the invitation of a handful of Greek fans. Not only Xilas, Djokovic also laughed at this gesture.

Miomir Kecmanovic defeated Aristotle Tanos with a score of 6:3 and 6:3.

After today's matches, 32-year-old Filip Krajinović will finish his career, having never won a tournament in his professional career and was ranked 26th in the ATP rankings in 2018.
2024-09-15.english_title: Belgian audiences excited when Djokovic lost the game

2024-09-15.author: T. O.
2024-09-15.content:
Messi se je vrnil z dvema zadetkoma v štirih minutah

Še vedno v igri za najboljšega strelca sezone

Lionel Messi je takoj po vrnitvi po poškodbi navdušil navijače in v štirih minutah dosegel dva zadetka in asistenco ob zmagi Interja iz Miamija v severnoameriški nogometni ligi MLS nad Philadelphio s 3:1.

Osemkratni dobitnik zlate žoge ni igral, odkar si je poškodoval desni gleženj med finalom južnoameriškega nogometnega prvenstva copa America 14. julija. Od takrat je izpustil osem tekem MLS-ja za klub iz Miamija.

Philadelphia je sicer odlično začela in povedla v drugi minuti, Messi pa je na domačem stadionu Chase v Fort Lauderdalu (pred 19 tisoč navijači) izenačil v 26. minuti, ko je sprejel podajo Luisa Suareza, opravil z branilcem Kaiem Wagnerjem in bil natančen z desnico. V 30. minuti je zadel še ob strelu z levo nogo iz sredine prostora.

V zadnjih sekundah tekme je Messi prispeval asistenco za zadetek Suareza.

Inter Miami je tako utrdil vodstvo na lestvici, z 62 točkami ima 10 točk prednosti pred najbližjim tekmecem iz vzhodne konference Cincinnatijem, do konca redne sezone pa je ostalo še šest tekem.

"Utrujen sem, kar je tudi posledica vročine in visoke vlage, a res sem si želel vrnitve, saj sem bil dolgo odsoten z igrišč. Počutil sem se dobro in zato smo se odločili, da bom začel, zelo sem vesel," je povedal 37-letni argentinski zvezdnik, ki je na 13 tekmah, na katerih je igral, dosegel 14 zadetkov, s čimer se je vrnil v boj za naslov najboljšega strelca MLS-ja. Ob tem ima tudi 15 asistenc.
2024-09-15.title: Messi se je vrnil z dvema zadetkoma v štirih minutah
2024-09-15.english_content:
Messi came back with two shots in four minutes.

Still in the game for the best shooter of the season.

Lionel Messi was immediately enthusiastic when he returned from injury and in four minutes he scored two goals and an assist in a 3-1 win over Philadelphia in the North American Soccer League.

The eight-time Ballon d'Or winner hasn't played since injuring his right ankle during the final of the South American Cup America on July 14. Since then, he's missed eight MLS games for the Miami club.

Philadelphia got off to a great start and led in the second minute, and Messi tied the game in the 26th minute at his home Chase Stadium in Fort Lauderdale (19,000 fans) to take the lead from Luis Suarez, facing defender Kai Wagner and being right-handed. In the 30th minute, he hit a shot from the middle of the room with his left foot.

In the final seconds of the game, Messi contributed an assist to Suarez's hit.

Inter Miami has cemented its lead with 62 points, 10 points ahead of the nearest rival in the Eastern Conference, Cincinnati, with six games left in the regular season.

"I am tired, also because of the heat and high humidity, but I really wanted to come back because I was away from the playground for a long time. I felt good and so we decided to start, I'm very happy", said the 37-year-old Argentine, who has 14 goals in 13 games, returning to the MLS best-selling title. He also has 15 assists.
2024-09-15.english_title: Messi came back with two shots in four minutes.

2024-09-15.author: T. O.
2024-09-15.content:
Pogačar v Montrealu v vlogi absolutnega favorita

Na startu kanadske klasike peterica Slovencev

Peterica slovenskih kolesarjev s Tadejem Pogačarjem na čelu kratko kanadsko turnejo končuje z nedeljsko dirko za VN Montreala. Če je v petek v Quebecu Pogačar še malce preizkušal pripravljenost, bo danes nedvomno napadel zmago.

Dirka bo dolga 209 kilometrov, kolesarji bodo naredili 17 krogov (vsak po 12,3 km) s skupno višinsko razliko 4.573 metrov. Zelo zahtevna enodnevna klasika prinaša številne klance, najtežji je tisti na začetku kroga, saj ima 1,8 kilometra dolg vzpon na Camilien Houde povprečni naklon osem odstotkov.

Za stavnice ni dileme: Tadej Pogačar je absolutni favorit s kvoto okrog 1,50. Konkurentje so v vlogi avtsajderjev, drugi na stavnicah je Matteo Jorgenson s kvoto 15. Večje vprašanje je, kdaj bo Pogačar napadel in se odpeljal zmagi naproti. Na ciljni klanec (Avenue du Parc) verjetno ne bo čakal, saj je ta prekratek (650 metrov) in premalo strm (povprečni naklon 4 %), čeprav – ob zmagi pred dvema letoma to ni bila ovira in je v sprintu peterice ugnal (za dolžino kolesa) tudi Wouta van Aerta.

Če se bo razpletlo po pričakovanjih, bo imela ekipa UAE Team Emirates popoln konec tedna, saj je včeraj na memorialu Marca Pantanija (195 km) zmagal Švicar Marc Hirschi. V središču Censenatica je dobil sprint glavnine in se že na peti zaporedni enodnevni klasiki veselil zmage.

Dirka za Veliko nagrado Montreala, ki je v koledarju Svetovne serije, se bo začela ob 16.15 in predvidoma končala malo po 21.30. Od Slovencev bodo nastopili še Matej Mohorič, Jan Tratnik, Domen Novak in Matevž Govekar.

Five Slovenian cyclists led by Tade Pogačar, a short Canadian tour concludes with a Sunday run for the Montreal United Nations. If the Quebec Cricketer tests his readiness a little more on Friday, he will no doubt attack victory today.

If it unfolds as expected, UAE Team Emirates will have a perfect weekend, as the Swiss Marc Hirschi won the 195km Marc Pantani Memorial yesterday. He's got a major sprint at the Censenatica Center and he's already looking forward to winning his fifth straight one-day classic.

Čile, Bolgarija in Nemčija prvi nasprotniki Slovencev na Filipinih

Žreb skupin za na 32 reprezentanc razširjeno svetovno prvenstvo v odbojki

Slovenski odbojkarji so dobili tekmece za svetovno prvenstvo, ki ga bodo prihodnje leto med 12. in 28. septembrom gostili Filipini. Slovence v skupini E čakajo tekme s Čilom, Bolgarijo in Nemčijo.

Filipinska prestolnica Manila je bila prizorišče žreba za svetovno prvenstvo 2025, na katerem bo v novem, razširjenem, formatu prvič nastopalo 32 odbojkarskih reprezentanc.

Sloveniji je kot nosilki pripada vloga v skupini F. Nato je ples žogic Slovencem namenil za nasprotnike Nemčijo iz drugega bobna, Bolgarijo iz tretjega in Čile iz četrtega bobna. Nemci so osmi na svetovni lestvici, Bolgari 19., Čilenci pa 27.

Za žreb iz četrtega bobna je bil zadolžen kapetan Slovenije Tine Urnaut, ki je bil eden izmed častnih gostov slovesnosti v Manili.

V osmini finala proti ZDA ali Kubi?

Svetovno prvenstvo se bo v dvoranah Mall of Asia in Coliseum Arena v Manili s skupinskim delom tekmovanja začelo 12. septembra, v izločilne boje pa se bosta uvrstili po dve najboljši reprezentanci iz vsake skupine, medtem ko bosta tretje- in četrtouvrščena ekipa končali nastope. Z razširitvijo SP-jev s 24 na 32 reprezentanc se tudi poenostavlja tekmovalni sistem. Po skupinskem delu se takoj začnejo izločilni boji.

V osmini finala se bosta najboljši reprezentanci "slovenske" skupine E križali z najboljšima iz skupine D, kjer so nosilke ZDA (3. na FIVB-lestvici) in močna Kuba (12. na svetu), medtem ko bosta skušala presenetiti Portugalska (22.) in Kolumbija (45.). V četrtfinalu sledi soočenje boljših iz omenjenih parov, nakar se v polfinalu križajo z najboljšo ekipo iz skupin A in H.

Tretji nastop na SP-jih, nazadnje četrti na svetu

Slovenski odbojkarji so na svetovnih prvenstvih doslej nastopili dvakrat. Prvič leta 2018 na turnirju v Bolgariji in Italiji, ki so ga Slovenci končali na 12. mestu. Drugič je Slovenija bila sogostiteljica SP-ja 2022, pri čemer je s pridom izkoristila prednost domačega parketa v Ljubljani in si priigrala boj za odličja. Slovenci, takrat že pod vodstvom romunskega stratega Gheorgheja Cretuja, so bili na koncu četrti.

Kapetan: Želimo še rasti in napredovati

Slovenski kapetan Tine Urnaut je neposredno po žrebu dejal: "Pot od naših začetkov je bila zelo dolga in zelo sem vesel, da smo iz leta v leto napredovali. Za nami sta dve uspešni poletji in tudi prva uvrstitev na olimpijske igre. Kot reprezentanca in tudi kot zveza želimo še rasti in napredovati in upam, da bomo na svetovnem prvenstvu na Filipinih še boljši. V Manili bo igralo zelo veliko dobrih ekip, ki se bodo borile za medalje. Vsaka tekma bo pomembna, vsak dan bo pomemben in komur bo uspelo iztržiti največ, bo zmagovalec. Zelo se veselim svetovnega prvenstva tu na Filipinih, saj je zelo lepo igrati v polni dvorani. Ko smo igrali Ligo narodov, je bilo vzdušje izjemno in prepričan sem, da bo tako tudi prihodnje leto."

Ob odbojkarjih drugo leto svetovno prvenstvo čaka tudi Slovenke, ki bodo sploh prvič zaigrale na tovrstnem turnirju. SP 2025 za odbojkarice bo med 22. avgustom in 7. septembrom gostila Tajska.

Chile, Bulgaria and Germany first opponents of the Slovenes in the Philippines

Group draw for the 32nd World Cup

The Slovenian volleyball players have been awarded the World Cup qualification tournament, which will be hosted by the Philippines from 12 to 28 September next year. The Slovenians in Group E are looking forward to matches against Chile, Bulgaria and Germany.

The Philippine capital of Manila was the venue for the 2025 World Cup, which will feature 32 volleyball players for the first time in the new, expanded format.

Slovenia has a role as a carrier in Group F. The ball dance was then given to the Slovenians by Germany on the second drum, Bulgaria on the third drum and Chile on the fourth drum. The Germans are eighth in the world, the Bulgarians are 19th, and the Chileans are 27th.

The fourth drum was drawn by the Slovenian captain Tine Urnaut, who was one of the guests of honor at the ceremony in Manila.

In the final eight against the United States or Cuba?

The World Cup will begin on 12 September at the Mall of Asia and Coliseum Arena in Manila with a group stage, with the top two teams from each group qualifying for the qualifying rounds, while the third and fourth placed teams will finish. The competition system is also simplified by extending the number of SPs from 24 to 32. After the group stage, the first-ever fight begins.

In the final eight, the top representatives of Group E will face the top representatives of Group D, where the USA are the third-placed in the FIVB rankings and Cuba the 12th-placed in the world, while trying to surprise Portugal (22) and Colombia (45). The quarter-finals will be followed by a match between the top two teams from the above-mentioned pairs, where they will face the top team from Group A and Group H in the semi-finals.

Third performance at the SPs, last fourth in the world

The Slovenian volleyball players have made two appearances at the World Championships so far. The first time was in 2018 at a tournament in Bulgaria and Italy, where the Slovenians finished 12th. Secondly, Slovenia was a co-host of SP 2022, taking advantage of the advantage of the home venue in Ljubljana and playing a battle for the title. The Slovenes, led by Romanian strategist Gheorghe Cretu, finished fourth.

V prvem polčasu tekme v Domžalah med skromnimi mlinarji in vodilnimi zmaji kljub razmerju poskusov strelov 7:3 (2:0 v okvir vrat) v korist Olimpije ni bilo golov. Ob izraziti premoči Ljubljančanov je najlepšo priložnost v 18. minuti imel Alex Blanco, a se je izkazal vratar Radomelj Emil Velić. Svojo priložnost so dočakale tudi Radomlje, a je napadalec Nino Kukovec iz dobrega položaja meril tik mimo vrat gostov.

Parada Vidovška, takoj zatem gol Florucza

Na začetku drugega polčasa so Radomlje imele nekaj priložnosti, izstopal je strel Gabra Dobrovoljca z glavo po kotu, a je Matevž Vidovšek s parado preprečil zaostanek. Že v naslednjem napadu v 53. minuti je sledila kazen in vodstvo Olimpije z 1:0. Agustin Doffo je podal z leve strani, pred vrati pa je v skoku bil najvišji Raul Florucz.

Po nekaj priložnostih na obeh straneh so Radomlje v 71. minuti ostale z igralcem manj, potem ko je Ognjen Gnjatić prejel drugi rumeni karton. Pet minut zatem je nedisciplina znova tepla mlinarje: Matej Mamić je v lastnem 16-m nepravilno zaustavljal Petra Agbaja. Zanesljivi izvajalec najstrožje kazni je bil rezervist Reda Boultam, ki je vstopil v 70. minuti.

Kakšen bo nedeljski odgovor zasledovalcev?

Ljubljančani v novi sezoni še ne poznajo poraza in zasedajo vrh prvenstvene lestvice z 18 točkami. S 15 točkami jim trenutno sledi Mura, v nedeljo pa so na potezi Bravo, Koper in Maribor, ki so bili pred začetkom 8. kroga prvi trije zasledovalci zeleno-belih. V derbiju 8. kroga v nedeljo Maribor in Koper igrata med seboj, medtem ko Bravo gosti zadnje Domžale.

Gol Juncaja ob debiju

Novi trener Mure Oskar Drobne je uspešno debitiral, sin novega klubskega "lastnika" pa je zadel na svoji prvi tekmi v dresu čarnjo-bejlih, prvi napadalec pa je s hat-trickom proslavil svoj stoti naslov v Prvi ligi.

Po kopici strelov na obeh straneh je Mura v 39. minuti povedla, s tretjim strelom po prekinitvi je gostujočo mrežo načel Dario Vizinger. Sandi Nuhanović je nevarno udaril s prostega strela z 20 metrov, Gašper Tratnik je branil in hitro odbil še strel Kaia Cipota z glavo iz bližine, nakar je do žoge prišel Vizinger in poslal žogo pod prečko.

Tik pred odmorom je vodstvo Pomurcev podvojil Steven Juncaj, sin novega klubskega mecena Georga Juncaja. Po visokem predložku Mateja Miloša z desne strani je Tilen Ščernjavić z leve podal v sredino, kjer je bil na pravem mestu Juncaj, ki je samo podstavil nogo in preusmeril žogo za gol ob debiju v dresu Mure. 

Zaradi vloge in mesta v udarni postavi Mure je Juncaj sprožil obilo prahu in pred tednom dni povzročil trenersko menjavo. Sobočane je tako prvič vodil Oskar Drobne, potem ko je Tonči Žlogar zaradi pritiskov novega vodstva iz ZDA zapustil klub.

Hat-trick Vizingerja

Po odmoru je Primorje pritisnilo, a v 54. minuti je Mura povedla že s 3:0. Veliko napako si je privoščil ajdovski branilec Mirko Mutavčić, kar je Vizinger neusmiljeno kaznoval s svojim drugim golom na tekmi. V 78. minuti je 26-letnik Hrvat postavil piko na i za svoj hat-trick. Rezervist Diogo Bezerra je z globinsko podajo skušal zaposliti Marošo, ki pa je preskočil žogo in Vizinger je s pomočjo leve vratnice zadel za 4:0.

Izredna predstava Vizingerja ob njegovi jubilejni stoti tekmi v Prvi ligi, kjer je v dresu Rudarja dosegel dva zadetka, v dresu Celja pa zabil 37 golov.

Prvoligaško soočenje po 19 letih

V Murski Soboti so bili gledalci priča prvemu prvoligaškemu soočenju Mure in Primorja po skoraj 20 letih. 2. aprila 2005 so Ajdovci doma s 3:1 premagali Sobočane. V naslednjih dveh desetletjih sta oba kluba doživela pretrese in nova rojstva, zdaj pa se začenja novo poglavje v medsebojnih obračunih dveh tradicionalnih slovenskih klubov.

Benjamin Savšek je veliki zmagovalec tekme kanuistov na divjih vodah za svetovni pokal v Ivrei. V kajaku sta se na oder za zmagovalce zavihtela Eva Terčelj in Peter Kauzer.

Savšek je svoj finalni nastop v Ivrei opravil brezhibno. Kot blisk je drvel proti cilju, švigal čez vratca, po polovici preizkušnje je bil enako hiter kot tedaj vodilni Francoz Yohann Senechault, a v spodnjem delu je izkoristil svoje bogate izkušnje in vodstvo prevzel za dobro sekundo. Tretji je bil Italijan Raffaello Ivaldi (+1,44). 

Na zelo dobri poti do zmage je bil tudi komaj 17-letni Žiga Lin Hočevar, ki je v finalu nastopil kot zadnji. Tudi on se med nastopom ni dotaknil vratc, pri merjenju zadnjega vmesnega časa je imel še dobri dve sekundi in pol naskoka pred Savškom, a je imel nato v spodnjem delu težave in ob prihodu v cilj zasedel sedmo mesto z zaostankom 7,44 sekunde. Na koncu je zaradi pribitka 50 sekund (izpuščena 23. vratca) zdrsnil na deseto mesto. 

Slovenija je imela v finalu še enega kanuista, Luko Božiča, ki si je boljšo uvrstitev pokvaril z dotikom vratc št. 3. V spodnjem delu je želel zaostanek nadoknaditi, a na koncu osvojil 5. mesto (+2,59).

Kauzer najboljši v polfinalu, tretji pa v finalu

V kajaku je zmagal Poljak Mateusz Polaczyk pred Francozom Anatole Delassus. Prehitel ga je za 0,48 sekunde. 1,11 je na tretjem mestu zaostal Peter Kauzer. Na progi je imel malce težav, napravil nekaj napak, a se je vseeno uvrstil na stopničke. Že 29. v karieri. V polfinalu pa je bil Hrastničan najboljši. Sprva so mu dosodili 50 kazenskih sekund, a so mu jih po ogledu posnetkov izbrisali in v finale se je prebil s prvega mesta.

S četrtim mestom je presenetil Lan Tominc. Za zmagovalcem je 22-letni Celjan zaostal 4,47 sekunde, potem ko je prejel šest kazenskih sekund. V finalu je veslal tudi Žiga Lin Hočevar, ki je tako kot v kanuju tudi tu prejel 50 kazenskih sekund in zasedel deseto mesto.  

Eva Terčelj z enim dotikom na tretjem mestu

Med kajakašicami je navdušila Eva Terčelj s tretjim mestom. Ljubljančanka je imela v polfinalu, kjer sta obstali Eva Alina Hočevar (18.) in najhitrejša v kvalifikacijah Ajda Novak (25.), šesti čas, v finalu pa je nastopila odlično. Bila je zelo hitra, tik pred ciljem pa je naredila manjšo napako. Dotaknila se je 21. vratc, a je bila vožnja vseeno dovolj dobra za vrhunski rezultat in 11. stopničke v karieri. 

Zmagala je Italijanka Stefanie Horn, ki je izpeljala progo brezhibno. Na domačih brzicah je veliko pridobila v spodnjem delu. 0,66 stotinke je bila hitrejša od Nemke Ricarde Funk, ki si je prislužila dve kazenski sekundi. Terčelj je bila počasnejša 1,93 sekunde.

Eva Alina Hočevar za las ob stopničke

Dobro sta se odrezali tudi kanuistki Eva Alina Hočevar in Lea Novak. Obe sta se dopoldne uvrstili v veliki finale, kjer sta prikazali zelo dobri vožnji. Hočevar je bila na sijajni poti proti uvrstitvi na stopničke, nato pa se je dotaknila vratc št. 20, zaradi česar si je prislužila dve sekundi pribitka. Na koncu je za 8,01 sekunde zaostala za zmagovalko, Čehinjo Gabrielo Satkovo. Druga je bila Britanka Kimberley Woods (+5,35), tretja Ukrajinka Viktoriia Us (+7,26). Novak je tekmo končala brez dotika, bila je šesta (+11,68).

V nedeljo bodo v Ivrei še tekme v krosu.

Pogačar: Imamo več orožij. Če bomo dirkali pametno, imamo res močne karte.

Roglič se počuti zelo močnega

"Trasa je zelo zahtevna. Ni mi stoodstotno pisana na kožo, je pa veliko bolj kot recimo lani," je povedal prvi favorit cestne dirke na svetovnem prvenstvu v kolesarstvu Tadej Pogačar.

V Zürichu je slovenska kolesarska reprezentanca že v polni sestavi. Kot zadnji se je kolegom pridružil Luka Mezgec, glavna aduta Pogačar in Primož Roglič, ki sta letos skupaj osvojila vse tri tritedenske dirke, pa sta na novinarski konferenci razkrila (visoka) pričakovanja. Slovenija bo z izjemno močno zasedbo eden glavnih favoritov, Pogačar, ki je letos slavil na Touru in Giru, pa je odkrito že večkrat govoril o naskoku na mavrično majico.

"Nekaj dni je minilo od Montreala. Tako da sem se spočil od tistih dve dirk, privadil na časovno razliko in naredil nekaj dobrih treningov. Forma je in se veselim nedeljske dirke. Poznam progo. V petek gremo s fanti na ogled. Upam, da bo vreme zdržali, da jo bomo lahko pogledali in skupaj trenirali, potem pa startamo s polno silo," je prvi kolesar sveta povedal za TV Slovenija.

Vedno je kaos ...

V Švici se bodo medalje delile na 275-kilometrski trasi s skoraj 4500 metri višinske razlike. Prav zaradi zahtevnosti proge je Pogačar, ki je bil lani bronast v Glasgowu, glavni favorit. 

"Trasa je zelo zahtevna. Ni mi stoodstotno pisana na kožo, je pa veliko bolj kot recimo lani. Na svetovnem prvenstvu ni vse v trasi, ampak tudi v načinu dirkanja. V reprezentanci se dirka malo drugače, saj ni toliko komunikacije kot sicer v ekipah. Ni radijskih vez in zato je vedno malo večji kaos. Na koncu se dirka razpleta na drugače način, kot si predstavljaš," je dejal. 

Ob skorajšnjem koncu izjemne sezone za slovensko kolesarstvo vabljeni na debato v živo. Na Avdiofestivalu v ljubljanski Cukrarni bodo v ponedeljek, 7. oktobra, ob 17.00 v podkastu Tour 202 pred občinstvom nastopili Martin Hvastija (Kolesarska zveza), Slavko Jerič (Podkasta Številke in SOS), Igor Tominec (Val 202) in voditelj Luka Petrič. Zagotovite si brezplačne vstopnice.

Z osvojenima rumeno in rožnato majico je že poskrbel za zgodovinsko sezono. Zdaj je pred njim še en velik izziv, je pa letos že dokazal, kako močan je na enodnevnih preizkušnjah, ko je zmagoval z napadi od daleč: "Na svetovnem prvenstvu je težko iti v dolg napad. Zelo dolga je dirka. 275 kilometrov in ne moreš se odločiti, da boš skočil 50 kilometrov pred ciljem. Po 220 kilometrih si pokuril že kar nekaj energije in težko je obvladovati take napade. Bomo videli, kako bo v nedeljo."

"Imamo več orožij v ekipi in, če bomo dirkali pametno, imamo res močne karte. Dovolj je terena in kilometrov, da bo priložnost za vsakogar, če bo le imel najmočnejše noge," je še povedal Pogačar na novinarski konferenci. 

Roglič se počuti zelo močnega

Ob njem bo močan adut tudi Roglič, ki je v nedeljo v vožnji na čas v Švici zasedel 12. mesto. Zasavec je vesel, da je večina pozornosti namenjena Tadeju: "Tadej zmaguje ali vsaj igra glavno vlogo na vseh enodnevnih dirkah. Sam na njih precej manj nastopam, ampak letos se v zaključku sezone počutim močnega. Selektor pa je preučil vse možne scenarije, kako bomo dirkali in koga moramo pokrivati."

Poleg njiju bodo nastopili še Mezgec, Jan Tratnik, Domen Novak, Matevž Govekar, Jaka Primožič in Matic Žumer, ki je priložnost dobil po poškodbi Matej Mohoriča. Prejšnji teden je ta padel na ogledu trase gravelske dirke v Gironi, zaradi poškodbe dlani pa izpušča svetovno prvenstvo. "Prilagodili se bomo na novo stanje. Glede taktike se nismo še nič pogovarjali. O sami dirki se bomo s fanti resno pogovorili po ogledu proge. Seveda manjka Matej s svojimi izkušnjami, a tako pač je."

2024-09-26.english_content:
We have more weapons. If we're going to race smart, we'll have really strong cards.

The roach feels very strong

"The race is very demanding. It's not 100% written on my skin, but it's a lot more than, say, last year", said the first road racing favorite at the World Cycling Championships, Tadej Pogačar.

The Slovenian cycling team is already in full formation in Zurich. The last to join the team was Luka Mezgec, head coach Pogačar and Primož Roglič, who won all three triathlons together this year, and revealed high expectations at the press conference. Slovenia will be one of the main favourites with an extremely strong attendance, and Pogačar, who celebrated this year's Tours and Gira, has been open about jumping on a blue shirt several times.

"It's been a few days since Montreal. So I took a break from those two races, adjusted to the time difference, and did some good training. He's in shape, and I'm looking forward to Sunday's race. I know the line. We're going to the show with the boys on Friday. I hope the weather will hold up, so we can watch it and train together, then we start with full strength", the world's first cyclist told TV Slovenia.

There's always chaos.

In Switzerland, the medals will be shared on a 275-kilometre route with an altitude difference of nearly 4,500 metres. The difficulty of the track makes the Pigeon, who was bronze in Glasgow last year, the top favorite.

"The race is very demanding. It's not 100% written on my skin, but it's a lot more than last year. In the World Cup, not only is it a track, but it's also a racing mode. The race is a little different in the representative race, because there's not as much communication as in the team. There's no radio connection, and that's why there's always a little more chaos. In the end, the race ends up in a different way than you think it will", he said.

At the close of the extraordinary season for Slovenian cycling, invited to a live debate. The Audiofestivali in the Ljubljana Cukrarna will be held on Monday, October 7, at 17:00 in the Tour 202 sub-casts, with Martin Hvasti (Cycling Federation), Slavko Jerič (Podkasta Številka and SOS), Igor Tominec (Val 202) and the conductor Luka Petrič. Get yourself free tickets.

With his yellow and pink jersey, he's already made history. He now faces another major challenge, but this year he has already shown his strength in one-day trials by winning the long jump: "It's hard to go long in the World Cup. It's a very long race. 275 kilometers, and you can't decide to jump 50 kilometers before the target. You've already lost some energy after 200 miles, and it's hard to control such attacks. We'll see how it goes on Sunday".

"We have more weapons in the team, and if we race smart, we have really strong cards. There is enough terrain and miles to give everyone a chance if they have the strongest legs", Pogačar told a news conference.

The roach feels very strong

The Swiss team will be joined by the strong adut Roglic, who took 12th place in the time trial on Sunday. The owner is pleased that much of the attention is focused on Tadea: "Tadea wins or at least plays a leading role in all one-day races. I'm a little less of a performer myself, but I feel strong at the end of the season this year. And the selector has examined all possible scenarios, how we're going to race and who we're going to cover".

In addition to them, they will also perform Mezgec, Jan Tratnik, Domen Novak, Matevž Govekar, Jaka Primožič and Matic Žumer, who got the chance after injuries to Matej Mohorić. Last week, this guy fell at a gravel race track in Girona, and a hand injury forced him to miss the World Cup. "We'll adjust to the new situation. We haven't talked about tactics yet. We'll talk seriously about the race itself with the guys after we watch the track. Of course, Matthew is missing with his experiences, but that's the way it is".
2024-09-26.english_title: We have more weapons. If we're going to race smart, we'll have really strong cards.

Ricciardo izgubil sedež v ekipi Racing Bulls, zamenjal ga bo Novozelandec Lawson

Ni mu uspelo unovčiti zadnjih dveh let za vrnitev v prvo ekipo Red Bulla

Ekipa formule ena Racing Bulls je odpustila Avstralca Daniela Ricciarda in ga do konca sezone zamenjala z dozdajšnjim tretjim voznikom, 22-letnim Novozelandcem Liamom Lawsonom.

35-letni Ricciardo se je v formulo ena vrnil lani na Madžarskem v dirkalniku Red Bullovega sestrskega moštva Alpha Tauri, ki se je v tej sezoni preimenovalo v Racing Bulls.

Ricciardo je na 14. mestu med vozniki po številu točk v sezoni. Zbral je 12 točk, 10 več jih ima njegov moštveni kolega Juki Cunoda.

Avstralec je že po zadnji dirki v Singapurju napovedal, da je bila tisto verjetno njegova zadnja dirka in da mu ni uspelo unovčiti zadnjih dveh let za vrnitev v prvo ekipo Red Bulla.

Avstralski dirkač je debitiral leta 2011 in je zbral tri najhitrejše startne položaje in osem zmag na 258 dirkah. V Red Bullu je bil tretji med vozniki v sezonah 2014 in 2016.

Lawson je debi doživel lani na VN Nizozemske, na kateri je bil Ricciardo odsoten zaradi poškodbe.
2024-09-26.title: Ricciardo izgubil sedež v ekipi Racing Bulls, zamenjal ga bo Novozelandec Lawson
2024-09-26.english_content:
Ricciardo lost his seat in the Racing Bulls team, and he's being replaced by New Zealander Lawson.

He hasn't been able to cash in the last two years to get back to the Red Bull first team.

The Formula One team Racing Bulls fired Australian Daniel Ricciardo and replaced him with the current third driver, 22-year-old New Zealander Liam Lawson, by the end of the season.

Ricciardo, 35, returned to Formula One last year in Hungary in the race of the Red Bull sister team Alpha Tauri, which this season was renamed Racing Bulls.

Ricciardo is 14th among drivers in points per game this season. He's got 12 points, 10 more than his male partner, Juki Cunod.

The Australian announced after his last race in Singapore that it was probably his last race and that he had failed to cash in the last two years to return to the Red Bull first team.

The Australian racer made his debut in 2011 and has amassed three fastest starting positions and eight wins in 258 races. He was third among drivers in the 2014 and 2016 seasons at Red Bull.

Lawson made his debut last year at the Netherlands Nations Cup, where Ricciardo was out of action due to injury.
2024-09-26.english_title: Ricciardo lost his seat in the Racing Bulls team, and he's being replaced by New Zealander Lawson.
