Med Mehiko in Španijo obujen kolonialni spor, ker kralj ni povabljen na inavguracijo

Na seznamu povabljencev tudi ruski predsednik Vladimir Putin

Med Mehiko in Španijo je izbruhnil spor, ker španski kralj Filip VI. ni bil povabljen na inavguracijo novoizvoljene predsednice Claudie Sheinbaum.

V Madridu so odločitev mehiške vlade kritizirali kot nesprejemljivo. V Mehiki pa vztrajajo pri opravičilu zaradi škode, povzročene s španskim osvajanjem Amerik.

Mehika je na inavguracijo Claudie Sheinbaum, prve ženske na mestu predsednice te države, ki bo v torek, že julija povabila Sancheza, ne pa tudi španskega kralja.

A špansko zunanje ministrstvo je zdaj sporočilo, da na inavguracijo ne bodo poslali svojega predstavnika, saj na dogodek niso povabili kralja Filipa VI., kar da je nesprejemljivo.

Španski premier Pedro Sanchez je izrazil obžalovanje zaradi "nesprejemljive in nerazumljive" odločitve prihajajoče mehiške vlade in pojasnil, da želijo s tem izraziti protest.

"Španija in Mehika sta bratski državi – in zato se izključitev našega kralja zdi nesprejemljiva," je dejal novinarjem. "Ne pozabimo, da je bil ta kralj na prav vseh inavguracijah najprej kot princ in nato kot kralj. Zato ne moremo sprejeti njegove izključitve in zato smo sporočili mehiški vladi, da na inavguraciji ne bo nobenega španskega predstavnika.”

Sheinbaum je v izjavi v sredo pojasnila, da monarha niso povabili, ker se ni odzval na pismo trenutnega predsednika Andresa Manuela Lopeza Obradorja iz leta 2019, v katerem ga je pozval, naj se javno opraviči za špansko osvajanje Amerik.

Claudia Sheinbaum: "Potrebujemo spoštovanje"

Pismo je predsednik, ki je bil v svojem mandatu večkrat kritičen do Španije, poslal ob 200. obletnici neodvisnosti Mehike, v njem pa zahteval javno priznanje krivic, ki jih je povzročilo špansko osvajanje. Zunanje ministrstvo v Madridu je takrat zavrnilo zahtevo za opravičilo.

Sheinbaum je bila še kritična, da do srede niso dobili odgovora od kralja in ker je del pisma pricurljal v medije. Je pa zavrnila namige, da zaradi spora prekinjajo vezi s Španijo. "Seveda ne, ampak potrebujemo spoštovanje," je dejala.

Prepričana je, da bi odnosom koristila prenovljena zgodovinska perspektiva v skladu z razvojem obeh narodov.

Seznam povabljenih na inavguracijo je sicer že pred tem razburila del javnosti, na njem je med drugim tudi ruski predsednik Vladimir Putin.
2024-09-26.title: Med Mehiko in Španijo obujen kolonialni spor, ker kralj ni povabljen na inavguracijo
2024-09-26.english_content:
A colonial dispute between Mexico and Spain arose because the King was not invited to the inauguration

Russian President Vladimir Putin is also on the guest list.

A dispute broke out between Mexico and Spain because King Philip VI of Spain was not invited to the inauguration of the newly elected President Claudie Sheinbaum.

In Madrid, the Mexican government's decision was criticized as unacceptable. In Mexico, however, they continue to apologize for the damage caused by the Spanish conquest of the Americas.

Mexico is hosting the inauguration of Claudie Sheinbaum, the first woman to hold the office of President of that country, who will be inviting Sanchez, not even the King of Spain, on Tuesday, July.

But the Spanish Foreign Ministry has now announced that they will not send a representative to the inauguration because King Philip VI was not invited to the event, which is unacceptable.

Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez expressed regret over the "unacceptable and unreasonable" decision of the upcoming Mexican government and explained that they wanted to express protest.

"Spain and Mexico are brotherly countries  ⁇  and therefore the exclusion of our king seems unacceptable", he told reporters. "Let us not forget that this king was right at all inaugurations first as a prince and then as a king. We cannot accept his exclusion and have therefore informed the Mexican government that no Spanish representative will be present at the inauguration.

Sheinbaum explained in a statement on Wednesday that the monarch was not invited because he did not respond to a 2019 letter from current President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador, asking him to publicly apologize for the Spanish conquest of the Americas.

Claudia Sheinbaum: "We need respect"

The letter, sent by the president, who has been critical of Spain on several occasions during his term, marked the 200th anniversary of Mexico's independence and called for a public recognition of the crimes committed by the Spanish conquest. The Ministry of Foreign Affairs in Madrid at the time rejected the apology.

Sheinbaum was critical that the king had not responded to her letter until Wednesday and that part of the letter had been leaked to the media. But she rejected suggestions that the dispute would cut ties with Spain. "Of course not, but we need respect", she said.

She is convinced that a renewed historical perspective in line with the development of both nations would benefit the relationship.

The list of those invited to the inauguration has already angered a number of people, including Russian President Vladimir Putin.
2024-09-26.english_title: A colonial dispute between Mexico and Spain arose because the King was not invited to the inauguration

2024-09-26.author: G. V.
2024-09-26.content:
Kitajska bo skušala oživiti gospodarstvo s krepitvijo državne porabe

Bloomberg: 140 milijard dolarjev vredni finančni injekciji v največje državne banke

Politbiro kitajske komunistične partije je odločen, da bo azijska velesila izpolnila letošnji cilj 5-odstotne gospodarske rasti in ustavila dolgotrajno krizo nepremičninskega trga, ki bremeni drugo največje gospodarstvo na svetu.

Potem ko je uradni Peking ta teden predstavil vrsto ukrepov za spodbujanje gospodarske aktivnosti, je sestanek svojega najvišjega organa na temo trenutnega gospodarskega položaja v državi sklicala tudi vladajoča komunistična partija.

"V trenutnem gospodarskem poslovanju se pojavljajo nove razmere in težave, ki zahtevajo občutek odgovornosti in nujnosti," so zapisali v poročilu z zasedanja, kjer so se zavezali, da bodo za spodbujanje gospodarske rasti uporabili "potrebno fiskalno porabo".

Kot poroča Reuters, septembrsko srečanje 24-članskega politbiroja običajno ni namenjeno makroekonomskim razpravam, kar kaže na veliko zaskrbljenost kitajskega vodstva zaradi upočasnitve gospodarske rasti.

Po poročanju kitajske tiskovne agencija Šinhua so člani politbiroja na srečanju, ki se ga je udeležil tudi predsednik Ši Džinping, razpravljali o "nekaterih novih težavah" v delovanju kitajskega gospodarstva. Ob tem so se strinjali, da je treba v prihodnje izboljšati učinkovitost političnih ukrepov, namenjenih krepitvi gospodarstva.

"Peking bo prilagodil politiko omejevanja nakupa stanovanj, znižal obrestne mere obstoječih hipotekarnih posojil in spodbujal gradnjo novega modela razvoja nepremičninskega sektorja," navaja Šinhua.

Politbiro je sporočil, da bi morala vlada "spodbujati stabilizacijo nepremičninskega trga", razširiti seznam dovoljenih stanovanjskih projektov, ki lahko prejmejo nadaljnje financiranje, in oživiti neuporabna zemljišča.

Člani politbiroji se zavezali tudi k izboljšanju skrbi za starejše in mlade, pri tem pa napovedali prizadevanja za rast števila delovnih mest, namenjenih mladim.

Potrditev nadaljnjih spodbud politbiroja "predstavlja strateški premik v makropolitiki, od politik po delih k močno orkestriranemu svežnju v pravo smer," je za Reuters dejal glavni ekonomist za Kitajsko pri mednarodni nepremičninski družbi Lang LaSalle Bruce Pang.

"Okrepitev državne porabe bo verjetno zadostovala za preobrat v poslovnem zaupanju, razpoloženju na trgu in gospodarskih dejavnostih, kar bo Kitajski pomagalo doseči potencialno trendno rast," je prepričan.

Obsežna finančna injekcija bankam

Po poročanju ameriške agencije Bloomberg naj bi kitajski vodilni uradniki razmišljali tudi o 140 milijard dolarjev vredni finančni injekciji v največje državne banke. To bi bila prva velika kapitalska injekcija bankam po svetovni finančni krizi leta 2008. Po neuradnih virih, na katere se sklicuje Bloomberg, naj bi bil ukrep izveden z izdajo posebnih državnih obveznic, pri čemer pa podrobnosti še niso dorečene.

Vlagatelji na borznem parketu so ta teden pozdravili napovedane ukrepe kitajske centralne banke, ki vključujejo znižanje ključnih obrestnih mer, pri čemer so delnice v Šanghaju in Hongkongu v preteklih dneh zrasle za več kot devet odstotkov.

Če želi Kitajska izpolniti zastavljen cilj in letos doseči petodstotno gospodarsko rast, pa analitiki opozarjajo, da bo morala tamkajšnja vlada uvesti korenitejše ukrepe.

Rast kitajskega bruto domačega proizvoda je v drugem letošnjem četrtletju znašala 4,7 odstotka, kar je bilo manj od pričakovanj analitikov.

Prejšnji teden objavljeni podatki o brezposelnosti med mladimi v drugem največjem gospodarstvu na svetu pa so pokazali, da se je ta avgusta povzpela na 18,8 odstotka, kar je najvišja raven letos.
2024-09-26.title: Kitajska bo skušala oživiti gospodarstvo s krepitvijo državne porabe
2024-09-26.english_content:
China will try to revive the economy by boosting government spending

Bloomberg: $140 billion in financial injections into the biggest state banks

The Politburo of the Chinese Communist Party is determined that the Asian power will meet this year's target of 5 percent economic growth and stop the long-term real estate crisis that is plaguing the world's second-largest economy.

After official Beijing unveiled a series of measures to boost economic activity this week, the ruling Communist Party also convened a meeting of its highest authority on the current economic situation in the country.

'New situations and problems are emerging in the current economic situation, which require a sense of responsibility and urgency,' they said in the report from the meeting, where they pledged to use 'the necessary fiscal expenditure' to boost economic growth.

The September meeting of the 24-member Politburo is not usually for macroeconomic discussions, which shows the great concern of the Chinese leadership over the slowdown in economic growth.

According to the Chinese press agency Xinhua, members of the Politburo at a meeting attended by President Xi Jinping discussed "some new problems" in the functioning of the Chinese economy. They agreed that the effectiveness of policy measures to strengthen the economy should be improved in the future.

'Beijing will adjust the home purchase restriction policy, reduce the interest rates on existing mortgage loans and encourage the construction of a new model for the development of the real estate sector,' Xinhua states.

The Politburo stated that the government should "promote the stabilization of the real estate market", expand the list of permitted housing projects that can receive further funding, and revive unused land.

The members of the Politburo also committed themselves to improving care for the elderly and young, and announced efforts to increase the number of jobs for young people.

Confirming further policy-making incentives "represents a strategic shift in macroeconomics, from policies to works to a highly orchestrated flock in the right direction", said Bruce Pang, chief economist for China at Lang LaSalle International Real Estate Company, to Reuters.

'The strengthening of government spending is likely to be sufficient to turn business confidence, market sentiment and economic activity around, which will help China achieve its potential trend growth,' he is convinced.

A major financial injection to banks

According to the Bloomberg report, Chinese officials are also expected to consider a $140 billion financial injection into the nation's largest banks. This would be the first major capital injection to banks since the global financial crisis of 2008. According to informal sources cited by Bloomberg, the measure is expected to be implemented by issuing specific government bonds, but details have not yet been disclosed.

Stock market investors this week welcomed the announced measures by the Chinese central bank, which include lowering key interest rates, with shares in Shanghai and Hong Kong rising by more than 9 percent in recent days.

If China is to meet its target of achieving 5% growth this year, analysts warn that the Chinese government will have to take more radical measures.

The growth of the Chinese gross domestic product in the second quarter of this year was 4,7%, which was less than the expectations of the analysts.

But data on youth unemployment in the world's second-largest economy released last week showed that it rose to 18.8 percent this August, the highest level this year.
2024-09-26.english_title: China will try to revive the economy by boosting government spending

2024-09-26.author: G. V.
2024-09-26.content:
Na Krku začeli rušiti nezakonito zgrajene počitniške objekte

Večina lastnikov se je zavedala, da gradnja nepremičnin na tem območju ni dovoljena

Na hrvaškem otoku Krk so v sredo na podlagi odločb hrvaške gradbene inšpekcije začeli rušiti nezakonito zgrajene objekte na območju Picika, kjer je po poročanju hrvaških medijev iz nezakonitih gradenj nastalo manjše naselje.

Do konca tedna jih bodo odstranili predvidoma 40, skupno pa je problematičnih 121 objektov.

Gradbena inšpekcija državnega inšpektorata je okrepila nadzor na območju Picika v bližini trajektnega pristanišča Valbiska na zahodni obali Krka. Skupno je po pisanju reškega časopisa Novi list doslej izdala 121 odločb o rušenju nezakonito zgrajenih objektov.

Državni inšpektorat je v sredo na strošek investitorjev oziroma lastnikov začel rušiti 43 nezakonito zgrajenih objektov, pet pa so jih lastniki do srede začeli odstranjevati sami. Na inšpektoratu so ob tem opozorili, da bodo rušili tudi preostale objekte, za katere je bila izdana odločba.

Lastniki objektov so za hrvaško javno televizijo HTV v sredo dejali, da so se zavedali, da gradnja nepremičnin na tem območju ni dovoljena. Nekateri od njih so navedli, da so postavljali samo mobilne hiške, ki da so dovoljene, drugi pa, da so jim ob nakupu zemljišča zagotavljali, da bo gradnja objektov v prihodnosti legalizirana.

Lokalne oblasti so si več let prizadevale za odstranitev nezakonito zgrajenih objektov, njihovo rušenje pa je po besedah župana mesta Krk Darija Vasilića opozorilo, da bodo storili vse za varstvo okolja. Parcele, na katerih stojijo nezakonito zgrajeni objekti, ostajajo v zasebni lasti, med drugim pa se lahko uporabljajo v poljedelske namene.
2024-09-26.title: Na Krku začeli rušiti nezakonito zgrajene počitniške objekte
2024-09-26.english_content:
On the Krk, illegal holiday homes started to be demolished.

Most owners were aware that building properties in this area was not allowed.

On the Croatian island of Krk, on Wednesday, on the basis of decisions of the Croatian Construction Inspectorate, illegal construction sites in the Picik area began to be demolished, where, according to Croatian media reports, smaller settlements have emerged from illegal construction.

By the end of the week, 40 of them are expected to be removed, bringing the total to 121 problematic sites.

The construction inspection of the State Inspectorate has strengthened controls in the Picik area near the ferry port of Valbiska on the west coast of Krk. According to the Czech newspaper Novi List, the country has issued 121 decisions to demolish illegal buildings.

On Wednesday, the State Inspectorate began demolishing 43 illegal buildings at the expense of investors and owners, and five of them were demolished by the owners themselves by Wednesday. The inspectorate warned that the remaining buildings for which the decision was issued would also be demolished.

The owners of the premises told the Croatian public television station HTV on Wednesday that they were aware that construction of real estate in the area was not allowed. Some of them said that they had only installed mobile homes that were permitted, while others said that when they bought land they were assured that the construction of the facilities would be legalized in the future.

The local authorities have been working for years to remove illegal buildings, and their demolition warned the mayor of Krk Darij Vasilić that they would do everything to protect the environment. Plots on which illegal construction is taking place remain in private ownership and may, inter alia, be used for agricultural purposes.
2024-09-26.english_title: On the Krk, illegal holiday homes started to be demolished.

2024-09-26.author: G. V.
2024-09-26.content:
Pirati zapuščajo češko vladno koalicijo po razrešitvi njihovega vodje z mesta ministra

Na pokrajinskih volitvah slavil Babišev ANO

Češka koalicija je v sredo doživela pretres, saj jo je zapustila Češka piratska stranka, ki se je za to odločila, ker je nameraval premier Petr Fiala razrešiti vodjo stranke Ivana Bartoša s položaja ministra za regionalni razvoj.

"Pirati zapuščajo kabinet, oziroma bolje rečeno, so bili odstavljeni," je novinarjem dejal Bartoš, ki je bil tudi podpredsednik vlade.

Fiala je v torek po pokrajinskih volitvah v državi, na katerih je slavila opozicija, napovedal razrešitev ministra za regionalni razvoj Bartoša in kot razlog navedel težave z digitalizacijo gradbenih dovoljenj.

Napoved je razjezila češke pirate, ki imajo v vladi tri ministrstva, med drugim za zunanje zadeve, zato je Bartoš v sredo sporočil, da se umikajo iz vlade.

"Odhod Piratov bi moral biti budnica za celotno vladajočo koalicijo," je dejal Fiala na novinarski konferenci v Pragi.

Dodal je sicer, da je zadovoljen s preostalima ministroma iz vrst piratske stranke, ki jih je zato prosil le za zamenjavo za Bartoša, v kar pa v piratski stranki niso privolili.

Zdaj štiričlanska koalicija bo imela po novem v 200-članskem parlamentu le še 104 sedežev, namesto dosedanjih 108.

Razrešitev Bartoša mora uradno potrditi še predsednik države Petr Pavel, ki pa je trenutno na zasedanju Generalne skupščine ZN-a skupaj z zunanjim ministrom Janom Lipavskim.

Lipavski je dejal, da bo posredoval odstopno izjavo, obenem pa namerava izstopiti tudi iz Češke piratske stranke. S to potezo bi sicer lahko ostal na mestu zunanjega ministra.

Koalicija v zadnjih tednih izgublja podporo, predvsem na račun inflacije, podpore Ukrajini, ki jo nekateri dojemajo kot preveč obsežno, in posledic nedavnih poplav.

Pokrajinske volitve hud udarec za Pirate

Nezadovoljstvo z vlado so pokazali volivci tudi prejšnji konec tedna na pokrajinskih volitvah, na katerih je opozicijska, populistična stranka ANO nekdanjega premierja Andreja Babiša postala najmočnejša sila v desetih od 13 pokrajinskih parlamentov.

Kljub zmagi v večini pokrajin bo ANO lahko vladal sam v le treh pokrajinah, medtem ko bo imel v drugih težavo pri sestavljanju koalicije, saj bi se lahko proti njemu povezale druge stranke.

Največji poraženec lokalnih volitev so bili sicer Pirati, ki so z 99 sedežev v pokrajinskih skupščinah padli na samo tri, zaradi česar je Bartoš sporočil, da se na kongresu stranke v začetku novembra ne bo več potegoval za predsednika stranke.
2024-09-26.title: Pirati zapuščajo češko vladno koalicijo po razrešitvi njihovega vodje z mesta ministra
2024-09-26.english_content:
Pirates are leaving the Czech government coalition after their leader was removed from office

In the provincial election, he celebrated the grandmothers of the ANO

The Czech coalition was shaken on Wednesday by the Czech Pirate Party, which left the party after Prime Minister Petr Fial sought to remove party leader Ivan Bartoš from the post of Minister of Regional Development.

"Pirates are leaving the cabinet, or rather, they have been removed", Bartoš, who was also the vice-president of the cabinet, told reporters.

Fiala announced the dismissal of Bartoš, the minister of regional development, on Tuesday after the provincial elections in the country, which were celebrated by the opposition, citing the problems with digitising building permits as a reason.

The announcement angered the Czech pirates, who have three ministries in their government, including foreign affairs, so Bartoš announced on Wednesday that they were withdrawing from the government.

"The Pirates' departure should be a wake-up call for the entire ruling coalition", Fiala said at a press conference in Prague.

He added that he was satisfied with the remaining ministers of the pirate party type, who he had therefore only asked to be replaced by Bartoš, which the pirate party did not approve.

Now the four-member coalition will have only 104 seats in the new 200-member parliament instead of the previous 108.

The release of Bartoš must be officially confirmed by President Petr Pavel, who is currently in the UN General Assembly with Foreign Minister Jan Lipawski.

Lipavski said he would deliver a statement of resignation while also planning to withdraw from the Czech Pirate Party. This move would have kept him in the position of foreign minister.

The coalition has lost support in recent weeks, mainly at the expense of inflation, support for Ukraine, which some perceive as too extensive, and the consequences of recent floods.

The provincial election is a big blow to the Pirates.

The government was also displeased by voters in the provincial elections last weekend, in which the opposition populist ANO party of former Prime Minister Andre Babis became the strongest force in 10 of the 13 provincial parliaments.

Despite winning most provinces, the ANO will be able to govern alone in only three provinces, while it will have difficulty forming a coalition in others as other parties could join it.

The Pirates were the biggest losers in the local elections, losing only three seats to the provincial assemblies by 99 and Bartoš announced that he would not run for the party's presidency at the party congress in early November.
2024-09-26.english_title: Pirates are leaving the Czech government coalition after their leader was removed from office

2024-09-26.author: G. V.
2024-09-26.content:
Župan New Yorka po preiskavah zaradi korupcije obtožen zveznih kaznivih dejanj

Več odstopov v mestni oblasti

Proti newyorškemu županu Ericu Adamsu je bila vložena obtožnica zaradi zveznih kaznivih dejanj. Podrobnosti naj bi tožilci razkrili še danes, obtožnica pa za zdaj ostaja zapečatena.

64-letni Adams, proti kateremu potekajo štiri s korupcijo povezane preiskave, je prvi med opravljanjem funkcije obtožen župan.

Adams je v sredo objavil izjavo, v kateri se je izrekel za nedolžnega. Obljubil je, da se bo bojeval proti obtožbam in ostal na položaju, prebivalce New Yorka pa prosil za potrpežljivost.

"Vedno sem vedel, da bom postal tarča, če se bom zavzemal za Newyorčane – in to sem tudi postal. Sem nedolžen in proti temu se bom bojeval z vsemi močmi," je dodal.

Proti njemu sicer potekajo najmanj štiri zvezne preiskave, pod drobnogled pa so vzele tudi druge uradnike v njegovi administraciji. Obtožnica prihaja po napornem tednu za Adamsa, čigar administracijo sta pretresla odstopa komisarja za zdravje Ashwina Vasana in kanclerja za izobraževanje Davida Banksa.

Pred tem je odstopil tudi policijski komisar Edward Caban in kot razlog navedel preiskavo zvezne policije FBI o domnevni korupciji. Tarča preiskave naj bi bil njegov brat James Caban, nekdanji policist, ki je vpleten v mestno industrijo nočnega življenja. Zvezni policisti sumijo, da je izkoriščal svoj vpliv pri bratu, da določenim klubom in barom pomaga v zameno za plačilo.

Adamsu so sicer pred skoraj letom dni zvezni policisti zasegli elektronske naprave in izvedli hišno preiskavo pri njegovi sodelavki Brianni Suggs. FBI namreč preiskuje sum korupcije pri financiranju Adamsove politične kampanje in preverja, ali je leta 2021 dobil denar od agentov turške vlade in drugih.
2024-09-26.title: Župan New Yorka po preiskavah zaradi korupcije obtožen zveznih kaznivih dejanj
2024-09-26.english_content:
New York City Mayor after a corruption investigation accused of federal crimes

More derogations in the city government

New York City Mayor Eric Adams has been indicted for federal crimes. The prosecutors are expected to release details today, but the indictment remains sealed for the time being.

Adams, 64, who is the subject of four corruption-related investigations, is the first mayor to be charged in his tenure.

Adams released a statement Wednesday pleading not guilty. He promised to fight the charges and stay in office, and he asked the people of New York to be patient.

"I always knew I'd be a target if I was involved with New Yorkers, and I became one. I am innocent and I will fight against it with all my might", he added.

At least four federal investigations are underway against him, and other officials in his administration have been briefed. The indictment comes after a busy week for Adams, whose administration has been rocked by the resignation of Health Commissioner Ashwin Vasan and Education Chancellor David Banks.

Before that, Police Commissioner Edward Caban resigned, citing an FBI investigation into alleged corruption as a reason. His brother James Caban, a former police officer involved in the city's nightlife industry, is allegedly the target of the investigation. Federal police suspect he was using his influence on his brother to help certain clubs and bars in exchange for payment.

Adams was seized almost a year ago by federal agents and conducted a home invasion of his colleague, Brianna Suggs. The FBI is investigating allegations of corruption in the financing of Adams' political campaign and is investigating whether he received money from Turkish government agents and others in 2021.
2024-09-26.english_title: New York City Mayor after a corruption investigation accused of federal crimes

2024-09-26.author: G. V.
2024-09-26.content:
"Evropska avtomobilska industrija bo propadla, če EU ne bo spremenil smeri"

Frangež: Slovenija spremlja razmere v evropski avtomobilski industriji

Nemčija in Italija sta se pridružili pozivu evropske avtomobilske industrije Evropski uniji, naj omili cilje za zmanjšanje izpustov CO2 za avtomobile in znova prouči prepoved prodaje avtomobilov z motorji na notranje zgorevanje do leta 2035.

Italijanski minister za industrijo Adolfo Urso je v sredo pred srečanjem ministrov držav članic EU-ja, ki so pristojni za notranji trg in industrijo, dejal, da si njegova država skupaj z Nemčijo prizadeva za podporo drugih držav pri pozivu k sprostitvi standardov za izpuste CO2 pri avtomobilih.

Po poročanju portala Euronews bodo prav tako zahtevali premislek o napovedi EU-ja, da bo leta 2035 prepovedal prodajo avtomobilov z bencinskimi in dizelskimi motorji.

Urso je ponovil nedavna opozorila avtomobilskih proizvajalcev in napovedal, da bo evropska avtomobilska industrija "propadla", odpuščenih pa bo "na desettisoče" zaposlenih v avtomobilskem sektorju, če EU ne bo spremenil smeri.

Ursova opozorila prihajajo tri mesece po tem, ko je italijanska premierka Giorgia Meloni prepoved prodaje avtomobilov z motorji na notranje zgorevanje označila za "ideološko norost".

Pred nekaj dnevi je tudi Evropsko združenje proizvajalcev avtomobilov (ACEA) javno pozvalo k odložitvi uporabe strožjih omejitev izpustov po objavi podatkov o padcu prodaje električnih avtomobilov.

Vplivna skupina s sedežem v Bruslju, katere člani so BMW, Ford, Renault, Volkswagen in Volvo, je 19. avgusta opozorila, da je število registracij novih avtomobilov avgusta padlo pod 644.000, kar je več kot 18-odstotni padec v primerjavi z istim mesecem leta 2023.

Največji sorazmerni padec so ugotovili pri električnih avtomobilih, pri čemer se je njihov tržni delež zmanjšal za skoraj tretjino z lanskih 21 odstotkov.

Ljudje namesto električnih vozil kupujejo športne terence

"Pogrešamo ključne pogoje, da bi dosegli potreben zagon v proizvodnji vozil brez emisij: infrastrukturo za polnjenje, tudi z vodikom, konkurenčno proizvodno okolje, cenovno dostopno zeleno energijo, nakupne in davčne spodbude ter varno oskrbo s surovinami, vodikom in baterijami," so zapisali pri ACEA-ju.

Trenutno morajo proizvajalci avtomobilov zagotoviti, da izpusti vseh avtomobilov, ki jih prodajo v določenem letu, v povprečju ne presegajo 115,1 grama na kilometer, ta meja pa naj bi se naslednje leto zaostrila na 93,6 grama. To številko bo vse težje doseči ob padanju prodaje električnih vozil na eni strani in prevladovanju večjih modelov športnih terencev.

Ob grožnji več milijard evrov kazni naslednje leto je ACEA pozval EU, naj izvede "nujne ukrepe pomoči", a kot piše Euronews, Evropska komisija verjame, da je za slab položaj vsaj delno kriva industrija sama.

"Pred nami je še 15 mesecev prodaje avtomobilov in industrija ima čas ... da doseže svoje cilje," je v torek novinarjem povedal tiskovni predstavnik Evropske komisije. "Vredno je tudi spomniti, da je bil cilj za leto 2025 dogovorjen leta 2019 in ... te politike smo oblikovali tako, da ima industrija čas za prilagoditev," je še dodal.

Frangež: Slovenija spremlja razmere v evropski avtomobilski industriji

Slovenija po besedah državnega sekretarja na gospodarskem ministrstvu Matevža Frangeža spremlja dogajanje v evropski avtomobilski industriji. Pred ministrskim zasedanjem v Bruslju je poudaril, da si je treba prizadevati za okrepitev položaja Slovenije v avtomobilski industriji, pri čemer komunicirajo z različnimi akterji.

Kot je povedal ob prihodu na zasedanje ministrov, bo evropska avtomobilska industrija zaradi prihoda novih tehnologij in nove konkurence naletela na strukturne težave.

"Položaj spremljamo tako na makroravneh, torej na ravni naših ključnih trgov, kot na mikroravni, torej na ravni ključnih kupcev slovenske avtomobilske industrije," je dejal.

Pojasnil je, da je država že podprla dve strateški pobudi, namenjeni prehodu na električno mobilnost. Prva je misija GREMO (GREen MObility), ki jo je slovenska avtomobilska industrija vzpostavila kot zavezo k zeleni in digitalni preobrazbi do leta 2030.

Druga pa je julija podpisana strateška namera s skupino Renault o proizvodnji nove generacije električnega twinga v novomeškem Revozu. S tem želi Slovenija po besedah državnega sekretarja svoj položaj proizvajalke avtomobilov nadgraditi v položaj proizvajalke električnih vozil.

"Seveda pa je se treba vprašati, na kakšen način bomo podprli industrije, ki bodo zaradi tega soočene z upadom naročil. Vidimo, da se v predelovalni industriji nadaljuje trend iz leta 2023, torej precejšen upad naročil," je poudaril.

Dodal je, da želijo na ministrstvu z okrepljeno komunikacijo z evropskim avtomobilskim ekosistemom, slovenskimi proizvajalci in ključnimi nacionalnimi institucijami razmišljati o ukrepih, s katerimi bi Slovenija kljub veliki preobrazbi okrepila svoj položaj v avtomobilski industriji. "Videti jo je namreč treba tudi kot priložnost, ne samo kot grožnjo," je poudaril Frangež.
2024-09-26.title: Evropska avtomobilska industrija bo propadla, če eu ne spremenil smeri
2024-09-26.english_content:
'The European automotive industry will fail unless the EU changes its course'

France: Slovenia is monitoring the situation in the European automotive industry

Germany and Italy have joined the call of the European automotive industry to the European Union to avoid the targets for reducing CO2 emissions from cars and to reconsider the ban on the sale of cars with internal combustion engines by 2035.

Italian Industry Minister Adolfo Urso said on Wednesday before a meeting of EU Member States' ministers responsible for the internal market and industry that his country, together with Germany, is working to support other countries in calling for the release of standards for CO2 emissions from cars.

According to Euronews, they will also demand a rethink of the EU's prediction to ban the sale of petrol and diesel cars by 2035.

Urso repeated recent warnings from carmakers, predicting that the European automotive industry would "go bankrupt" and that the jobs of "ten thousand" employees in the automotive sector would be laid off unless the EU changed its course.

Urs's warnings come three months after Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni called the ban on the sale of internal combustion engines "ideological madness".

A few days ago, the European Association of Automobile Manufacturers (ACEA) also publicly called for the postponement of the application of stricter emission limits following the publication of data on declining sales of electric cars.

The Brussels-based group of experts, which includes BMW, Ford, Renault, Volkswagen and Volvo, warned on 19 August that the number of new car registrations in August fell below 644,000, a decrease of more than 18% compared to the same month in 2023.

The biggest relative decline was found in electric cars, with their market share falling by almost a third from last year's 21%.

People buy sports fields instead of electric vehicles

"We are missing the key conditions to achieve the necessary acceleration in the production of emission-free vehicles: charging infrastructure, including hydrogen, a competitive production environment, affordable green energy, purchasing and tax incentives and a safe supply of raw materials, hydrogen and batteries", the ACEA wrote.

At present, car manufacturers must ensure that the average volume of all cars sold in a given year does not exceed 115,1 grams per kilometre and that this limit is to be tightened to 93,6 grams the following year. This figure will be increasingly difficult to achieve as electric vehicle sales on the one hand fall and larger sports car models dominate the field.

With a multibillion-euro fine threatened next year, ACEA called on the EU to implement "emergency assistance measures", but the European Commission believes that the industry is at least partly to blame for the poor situation, according to Euronews.

"We have 15 months left to go on selling cars and the industry has time ... to reach its goals", a European Commission spokesman told reporters on Tuesday. 'It is also worth recalling that the 2025 target was agreed in 2019 and ... we have designed these policies so that the industry has time to adapt,' he added.

France: Slovenia is monitoring the situation in the European automotive industry

Slovenia is monitoring developments in the European automotive industry, according to the Secretary of State for the Economy, Matevž Frangezh. He stressed the need to strengthen Slovenia's position in the automotive industry by communicating with different actors.

As he said at the Ministerial meeting, the European automotive industry will face structural problems due to the advent of new technologies and new competition.

"We monitor the situation both at macro level, i.e. at the level of our key markets, and at micro level, i.e. at the level of key customers of the Slovenian automotive industry", he said.

He explained that the State had already supported two strategic initiatives aimed at the transition to electric mobility. The first is the GREMO (GREen Mobility) mission, which was established by the Slovenian automotive industry as a commitment to green and digital transformation by 2030.

The second is a strategic plan signed with the Renault Group in July to produce a new generation of electric twing in the Newmarket Revoz. According to the Secretary of State, Slovenia thus wishes to upgrade its position as an automobile manufacturer to that of an electric vehicle manufacturer.

'Of course, the question is how we will support industries facing decline in orders. The Commission also notes that the Union industry is not in a position to increase its turnover in the Union.

He added that they wanted the ministry, with enhanced communication with the European automotive ecosystem, Slovenian manufacturers and key national institutions, to consider measures to strengthen Slovenia's position in the automotive industry despite the major transformation. "It should also be seen as an opportunity, not just a threat", said Frangez.
2024-09-26.english_title: The European automotive industry will fail unless the EU changes its direction

Japonec oproščen umorov po 46 letih čakanja na smrtno kazen

Smrtno kazen na Japonskem podpira velika večina javnosti

Japonsko sodišče je oprostilo 88-letnega moškega, ki je že skoraj pol stoletja čakal na izvršitev smrtne kazni, na katero je bil obsojen leta 1968 za umor svojega nadrejenega in njegove družine.

Ivao Hakamada je bil leta 1968 obsojen na smrt z obešanjem za umor svojega nadrejenega, njegove žene in dveh najstniških otrok dve leti prej.

Kot poroča Guardian, je nekdanji profesionalni boksar na izvršitev smrtne kazni čakal kar 46 let, kar je najdlje med vsemi na smrt obsojenimi zaporniki na svetu.

Na prostost so ga izpustili leta 2014, ko so se pojavili novi dokazi in so odobrili ponovno sojenje. Njegovi odvetniki so namreč dokazali, da se DNK krvnih madežev, ki so jih našli na domnevnih oblačilih morilca, ne ujema z njegovim DNK-jem.

Hakamada je vseskozi vztrajal pri svoji nedolžnosti in zatrjeval, da so ga k priznanju umorov prisilili preiskovalci, medtem ko so njegovi odvetniki trdili, da si je policija izmislila dokaze.

Višje sodišče je sprva odločilo, da ne bo odobrilo ponovnega sojenja, vendar je odločitev razveljavilo, potem ko mu je vrhovno sodišče naložilo vnovično proučitev primera.

Zaradi dolgotrajnih sodnih postopkov se je ponovno sojenje začelo šele lani in se zdaj končalo z oprostitvijo Hakamade, ki je po pisanju BBC-ja v povojni Japonski šele peti na smrt obsojeni posameznik, ki so mu dovolili ponovno sojenje.

O izvršitvi smrtne kazni obsojenci obveščeni le nekaj ur prej

Dolgoletno čakanje na smrtno kazen v zaporu je močno načelo Hakamadovo telesno in duševno zdravje, zato ni bil prisoten na razsodbi, na ponovnem sojenju pa ga je zastopala njegova sestra.

Hakamadovi podporniki zatrjujejo, da je njegova izkušnja razkrila napake v japonskem kazenskem sistemu in krutost obsodbe na smrtno kazen.

Japonska in Združene države Amerike so edine države v skupini G7, ki dovoljujejo smrtno kazen. Na smrt obsojeni zaporniki so na Japonskem o svoji usmrtitvi obveščeni le nekaj ur prej in nimajo možnosti, da bi govorili s svojci ali odvetniki. Po pisanju Guardiana je njihov zadnji pogovor z budističnim duhovnikom.

Vseeno ima smrtna kazen visoko podporo v javnosti. Anketa japonske vlade iz leta 2019 je pokazala, da kar 80 odstotkov vprašanih meni, da je smrtna kazen "neizogibna", medtem ko jih samo devet odstotkov podpira njeno odpravo.
2024-09-26.title: Japonec oproščen umorov po 46 letih čakanja na smrtno kazen
2024-09-26.english_content:
Japanese acquitted of murder after 46 years of waiting for death

The death penalty in Japan is supported by the vast majority of the public

A Japanese court has acquitted an 88-year-old man who had been waiting for the death penalty for nearly half a century, having been convicted in 1968 of murdering his superior and his family.

In 1968, Ivao Hakamada was sentenced to death by hanging for the murder of his superior, his wife, and two teenage children two years earlier.

As the Guardian reports, the former professional boxer has waited 46 years for the death penalty, the longest of any death row inmate in the world.

He was released in 2014 when new evidence emerged and a retrial was approved. His lawyers have proven that the DNA of the bloodstains found on the suspect's clothes does not match his DNA.

Hakamada insisted on his innocence, claiming that he was forced to confess to the murders by investigators, while his lawyers claimed that the police had fabricated evidence.

The High Court initially decided not to grant a retrial, but the decision was overturned after the Supreme Court ordered it to review the case.

The lengthy court proceedings led to a retrial that began only last year and now ends with the acquittal of Hakamade, the only person sentenced to death in postwar Japan to be allowed to retrial, according to the BBC.

The execution of the death penalty was announced to the inmates only hours before

The long wait for the death penalty in prison was a strong principle of Hakamad's physical and mental health, so he was not present at the trial, and his sister represented him at the retrial.

Hakamad's supporters claim that his experience has exposed flaws in the Japanese penal system and the cruelty of the death penalty.

Japan and the United States are the only countries in the G7 that allow the death penalty. Death row inmates in Japan are notified of their execution only hours in advance and have no opportunity to speak to relatives or lawyers. According to the Guardian, this is their last conversation with a Buddhist priest.

Nevertheless, the death penalty is highly regarded by the public. A 2019 Japanese government survey showed that as many as 80 percent of respondents believe the death penalty is "inevitable", while only 9 percent support its abolition.
2024-09-26.english_title: Japanese acquitted of murder after 46 years of waiting for death

Japonska prvič poslala vojaško ladjo skozi Tajvansko ožino

Odgovor na plovbo kitajske letalonosilke blizu japonskih otokov

Japonska vojaška ladja je prvič zaplula skozi Tajvansko ožino, pri čemer naj bi šlo za opozorilo Kitajski, ki ima sicer Tajvan za del svojega ozemlja.

Kot poroča japonski časopis Jomiuri, je rušilec Sazanami v Tajvansko ožino vplul v sredo zjutraj iz Vzhodnokitajskega morja in plovbo skozi ožino porabil deset ur. Japonski rušilec je plul skupaj z vojaškimi ladjami iz Avstralije in Nove Zelandije, s katerimi v četrtek začenjajo skupne vojaške vaje v Južnokitajskem morju.

Po poročanju Jomiurija je s plovbo rušilca želel Tokio poslati sporočilo Kitajski. Vodja kabineta predsednika japonske vlade Jošimasa Hajaši ni želel komentirati poročanja časopisa, je pa izrazil zaskrbljenost zaradi povečane kitajske vojaške aktivnosti na območju.

Hajaši je dejal, da so se kršitve zračnega prostora zgodile v kratkem času, druga za drugo. "Še naprej bomo zelo pozorno spremljali razmere," je dejal na redni novinarski konferenci.

Jomiuri piše, da se je japonska mornarica doslej izogibala plovbi skozi Tajvansko ožino, da ne bi vznemirila Pekinga.

Ameriška mornarica in mornarice drugih držav občasno plujejo skozi Tajvansko ožino, s čimer opozarjajo na "svobodo plovbe". Prvič v dveh desetletjih je plovbo skozi ožino opravila tudi Nemčija in tako skušala pokazati odločenost Berlina, da stoji ob strani zahodnih zaveznikov.

Japonska v zadnjih letih krepi svoje vojaške zmogljivosti in hoče tudi na ta način odvrniti Peking od uporabe vojaške sile za uveljavljanje svojih ozemeljskih zahtev na območju.

Prejšnji teden je kitajska letalonosilka Liaoning prvič zaplula med dvema japonskima otokoma blizu Tajvana, med plovbo pa sta jo spremljala dva rušilca.

Jomiuri je poročal, da je prav ta dogodek spodbudil japonskega premierja Fumia Kišido, da je ukazal plovbo japonskega rušilca skozi Tajvansko ožino, saj bi bilo neukrepanje lahko signal Pekingu za še bolj agresivno držo.

Tajvansko obrambno ministrstvo je v četrtek sporočilo, da je nad otokom zaznalo 29 kitajskih vojaških letal. Ob tem so zatrdili, da bodo še naprej krepili svojo obrambo kot odgovor na kitajsko stopnjevanje sile.
2024-09-26.title: Japonska prvič poslala vojaško ladjo skozi Tajvansko ožino
2024-09-26.english_content:
Japan sent a military ship through the Taiwan Strait for the first time.

Response to the Chinese aircraft carrier's approach to the Japanese islands

A Japanese warship sailed through the Taiwan Strait for the first time, as a warning to China, which claims Taiwan as part of its territory.

According to Japan's Jomiuri newspaper, the Sazanami wrecker entered the Taiwan Strait on Wednesday morning from the East China Sea and spent ten hours sailing through the strait. A Japanese destroyer sailed alongside Australian and New Zealand warships, which are set to begin joint military exercises in the South China Sea on Thursday.

According to Jomiuri, Tokyo wanted to send a message to China by a destroyer ship. The chief of staff of Japanese Prime Minister Yoshimasa Hayashi declined to comment on the newspaper's reporting but expressed concern over increased Chinese military activity in the area.

Hajashi said the airspace violations occurred in a short time, one after the other. "We will continue to monitor the situation very closely", he said at a regular press conference.

According to Jomiuri, the Japanese Navy has so far avoided navigating the Taiwan Strait to avoid upsetting Beijing.

The U.S. Navy and navies of other nations occasionally sail through the Taiwan Strait, warning of "freedom of navigation". For the first time in two decades, Germany also made a trip through the strait, thus trying to show Berlin's determination to stand with its Western allies.

Japan has been strengthening its military capabilities in recent years and is also seeking to deter Beijing from using military force to enforce its territorial claims in the area.

Last week, the Chinese aircraft carrier Liaoning made its first landing between two Japanese islands near Taiwan, accompanied by two destroyers.

Jomiuri reported that this very event prompted Japanese Prime Minister Fumia Kishido to order a Japanese destroyer to sail through the Taiwan Strait, as failure to do so could signal Beijing to take an even more aggressive stance.

Taiwan's Ministry of Defense said on Thursday it had spotted 29 Chinese military aircraft over the island. They also said they would continue to strengthen their defenses in response to China's increasing power.
2024-09-26.english_title: Japan sent a military ship through the Taiwan Strait for the first time.

2024-09-26.content:
Netanjahu po pozivu k premirju ukazal izraelski vojski, naj se še naprej bojuje s polno močjo

V zatočiščih v Libanonu več kot 70.000 razseljencev

Izraelski premier Benjamin Netanjahu ni upošteval poziva ZDA in njihovih zaveznic k 21-dnevnemu premirju med Izraelom in Hezbolahom. Izraelski vojski je ukazal, naj se še naprej bojuje "z vso močjo".

Kljub pozivom mednarodne skupnosti k premirju Izrael nadaljuje napade na Libanon, kjer so po navedbah izraelske vojske ponoči zadeli okoli 75 tarč proiranskega šiitskega gibanja Hezbolah. V napadih je bilo po podatkih libanonskih oblasti ubitih najmanj 13 ljudi, od tega devet na severovzhodu in štirje na jugu države.

Izraelska vojska je navedla, da je med drugim napadla južno predmestje Bejruta, ki velja za eno od trdnjav Hezbolaha. Izrael trdi, da je v napadu ubil poveljnika enote za brezpilotne letalnike Mohameda Srura, poznanega tudi kot Abu Saleha.

Hezbolah je v odgovor na izraelske napade z 80 raketami napadel izraelsko mesto Safed. Podrobnosti za zdaj niso znane. Skupini so podporo zagotovili jemenski hutijevci, ki jih prav tako podpira Iran in ki od novembra lani iz solidarnosti s Palestinci v Gazi napadajo ladje v Rdečem morju.

Izraelsko obrambno ministrstvo je medtem sporočilo, da si je Izrael zagotovil 8,7 milijarde dolarjev vreden paket vojaške pomoči ZDA. "Paket vključuje 3,5 milijarde dolarjev za nujna vojna naročila in 5,2 milijarde dolarjev za sisteme zračne obrambe," so zapisali v izjavi.

Izrael se na pozive k ustavitvi ognja ne zmeni

Kot so sporočili iz kabineta izraelskega premierja, se Netanjahu ni zmenil za poziv ZDA skupaj z evropskimi in arabskimi državami. "Novica o prekinitvi ognja ni resnična. To je ameriško-francoski predlog, na katerega se premier sploh ni odzval. Tudi novica o domnevni direktivi za omilitev bojev na severu ni resnična," so zapisali.

"Premier je ukazal izraelskim oboroženim silam, naj nadaljujejo bojevanje s polno močjo in v skladu z načrti, ki so mu bili predstavljeni. Prav tako se bodo boji v Gazi nadaljevali, dokler ne bodo doseženi vsi cilji vojne," so še sporočili.

Izraelski zunanji minister Izrael Kac je izjavil, da prekinitve ognja ne bo.

Tudi skrajno desni izraelski finančni minister Bezalel Smotrič je zavrnil poziv za prekinitev ognja in pozval k uničenju Hezbolaha. Vztrajal je, da je nadaljevanje vojne proti Hezbolahu edina prava pot naprej.

"Kampanja na severu bi se morala končati z enim samim rezultatom: uničenjem Hezbolaha in odpravo njegove zmožnosti škodovati prebivalcem severa. Sovražniku ne smemo dati časa, da si opomore od hudih udarcev, ki jih je utrpel, in se reorganizira za nadaljevanje vojne po 21 dneh," je zapisal na omrežju X.

Izraelski opozicijski voditelj in nekdanji premier Jair Lapid je medtem izjavil, da bi izraelska vlada morala privoliti v le sedemdnevno prekinitev ognja. S tem bi po njegovem mnenju Hezbolahu "preprečili, da vnovič vzpostavi svoje sisteme poveljevanja in nadzora". "Ne bomo sprejeli nobenega predloga, ki ne bo vključeval umika Hezbolaha z naše severne meje," je še dodal.

Skupen poziv za tritedensko premirje

ZDA, EU ter Avstralija, Kanada, Francija, Nemčija, Italija, Japonska, Savdska Arabija, Združeni arabski emirati in Katar so skupaj pozvali k takojšnji 21-dnevni prekinitvi ognja na meji med Izraelom in Libanonom.

"Razmere med Libanonom in Izraelom so od 8. oktobra 2023 nedopustne in predstavljajo nesprejemljivo tveganje za širše regionalno stopnjevanje. To ni v nikogaršnjem interesu, niti v interesu Izraelcev niti Libanoncev. Čas je za diplomatsko rešitev, ki bo civilistom na obeh straneh meje omogočila varno vrnitev na domove," piše v skupni izjavi, ki jo je objavila Bela hiša.

"Zato pozivamo k takojšnji 21-dnevni prekinitvi ognja na libanonsko-izraelski meji, da se zagotovi prostor za diplomacijo, za sklenitev diplomatske rešitve v skladu z resolucijo Varnostnega sveta 1701 in izvajanje resolucije 2375 o prekinitvi ognja v Gazi," dodaja izjava podpisnikov, ki so zavezani podpreti diplomatska prizadevanja za mir.

Pred to izjavo sta ameriški predsednik Joe Biden in francoski predsednik Emmanuel Macron v skupni izjavi sporočila, da je napočil čas za rešitev na izraelsko-libanonski meji, ki bo zagotavljala varnost in zaščito civilistov.

Biden je v kratkem pogovoru z novinarji povedal, da poziv močno podpirajo evropske in arabske države, saj je pomembno, da se vojna ne razširi. Visoki predstavnik ameriške administracije je za BBC dejal, da niti Izrael niti Libanon nista sprejela predloga, so pa ZDA v stiku z obema stranema.

K premirju je pozval tudi visoki zunanjepolitični predstavnik EU-ja Josep Borrell

"Obe strani pozivamo, naj nemudoma vzpostavita premirje čez modro črto, ki bo učinkovito in bo takoj odpravilo vse čezmejne grožnje," je poudaril Borrell in dodal, da Bruselj tudi mednarodno skupnost poziva, naj se aktivira in podpre trenutna prizadevanja za ta namen.

"Vsako nadaljnje zaostrovanje bi imelo dramatične posledice za regijo in širše," je posvaril.Ob tem je med drugim spomnil na resolucijo 2749, v kateri je Varnostni svet ZN-a konec avgusta zadevne akterje pozval k takojšnjemu ukrepanju za umiritev razmer. Omenil je tudi resolucijo 1701 in v luči te sprti strani pozval, naj zagotovita varno vrnitev razseljenega prebivalstva domov.

"Pozdravljamo in močno podpiramo prizadevanja Francije in ZDA, da bi s pogajanji dosegli prekinitev ognja," je še dejal prvi mož evropske diplomacije in ponovil zavezanost EU-ja podpori libanonskim državnim institucijam, vključno z libanonsko vojsko.

Izrael ne izključuje vojaške operacije

Izrael je v sredo razširil zračne napade v Libanonu, kjer je bilo od ponedeljka ubitih najmanj 72 ljudi, več kot 220 pa je bilo ranjenih.

Izraelska vojska ni izključila možnosti kopenske operacije na jugu Libanona, kar je še okrepilo bojazen, da bi to lahko sprožilo širšo vojno na Bližnjem vzhodu.

Izraelski veleposlanik pri ZN-u Dani Danon je novinarjem pred izredno sejo Varnostnega sveta ZN-a v sredo povedal, da bi Izrael pozdravil prekinitev ognja in dal prednost diplomatski rešitvi. V VS-ju je nato dejal, da Iran predstavlja omrežje nasilja na območju in da je za mir potrebna odstranitev te grožnje.

Iranski zunanji minister Abas Aragči je pred zasedanjem dejal novinarjem, da njegova država podpira Hezbolah in ne bo ostala ravnodušna, če se vojna v Libanonu razraste.

Libanonski premier Nadžib Mikati je pozdravil poziv k prekinitvi ognja in dejal, da je ključ do njegove uveljavitve, ali je Izrael zavezan uveljavljanju mednarodnih resolucij.

V zatočiščih v Libanonu več kot 70.000 razseljencev

V Libanonu je zaradi intenzivnih izraelskih napadov v več sto začasnih zatočiščih nastanjenih že 70.100 razseljenih ljudi, je dejal libanonski notranji minister Basam Mavlavi. Več kot 22.000 ljudi pa je ta teden iz Libanona zbežalo v Sirijo prek dveh mejnih prehodov, sta povedala dva sirska varnostna vira. 

Izrael je v zadnjih dneh znatno okrepil napade na cilje Hezbolaha v Libanonu, v katerih je bilo od ponedeljka ubitih več kot 600 ljudi. Na tisoče ljudi je zaradi napadov zbežalo z juga na sever države. Natančno število notranje razseljenih v Libanonu je težko določiti. Veliko jih je namreč pobegnilo k sorodnikom, mnogi spijo na ulicah, navaja nemška tiskovna agencija DPA.

Po podatkih Mednarodne organizacije za migracije (IOM) je bilo sicer od ponedeljka v Libanonu razseljenih okoli 90.530 ljudi. Pred tem je bilo po podatkih ZN-a od začetka vojne v Gazi 7. oktobra zaradi spopadov med Izraelom in Hezbolahom v Libanonu razseljenih še 110.000 ljudi.

Libanonski zunanji minister Abdalah Bou Habib medtem trdi, da se število razseljenih v državi približuje pol milijona, poroča britanski BBC.

Več kot 22.000 ljudi je ta teden iz Libanona vstopilo v Sirijo. "Več kot 6000 Libanoncev in približno 15.000 Sircev je vstopilo prek glavnega mejnega prehoda Masna," je povedal eden od sirskih varnostnih virov, medtem ko je drugi poročal, da je "približno tisoč Libanoncev in 500 Sircev vstopilo prek drugega prehoda", poroča francoska tiskovna agencija AFP.

Vojna ni neizogibna

Varnostni svet se je na izredni seji o Libanonu sestal na zahtevo Francije, saj so, kot je dejal francoski zunanji minister Jean Noel Barrot, izraelski napadi povzročili preveč žrtev, Hezbolah pa nadaljuje napade na Izrael. Za vsako ceno je treba preprečiti vojno, po kateri si Libanon ne bo več opomogel, je dejal.

"Izkoristimo veliko navzočnost svetovnih voditeljev in vsilimo diplomatsko rešitev," je dejal. "Vojna ni neizogibna," je dejal in napovedal, da bo do konca tedna obiskal Bejrut.

K ustavitvi spopadov in umirjanju razmer so potem pozivali vsi preostali govorniki in izrazili podporo mirovni misiji ZN-a v Libanonu (Unifil).

Najbolj krvav dan v generaciji

S položajem na terenu je Varnostni svet seznanil generalni sekretar ZN-a Antonio Guterres, ki je dejal, da je v Libanonu izbruhnil pekel, in navedel, da je zaradi spopadov območje na jugu Libanona zapustilo že 200.000 ljudi, s severa Izraela pa jih je odšlo 60.000.

"Ponedeljek je bil najbolj krvav dan za Libanon v tej generaciji," je dejal o dnevu, ko je bilo po navedbah libanonskih oblasti ubitih najmanj 558 ljudi. Guterres je pozdravil diplomatska prizadevanja in zatrdil, da si nihče ne more privoščiti, da Libanon postane nova Gaza.

ZDA krivijo Hezbolah

Namestnik ameriške veleposlanice Robert Wood je zatrdil, da intenzivno sodelujejo z drugimi pri predlogu, ki bo vodil v diplomatsko rešitev, in prosil, naj Varnostni svet ZN-a v prihodnjih dneh to podpre.

"Širša vojna na tem območju ni v nikogaršnjem interesu. Edina pot je diplomatska rešitev v skladu z resolucijo 1701," je dejal Wood in izrazil globoko zaskrbljenost ZDA zaradi smrti več sto civilistov v Libanonu.

Za poslabšanje položaja je okrivil Hezbolah, ki od 8. oktobra lani napada Izrael z orožjem iz Irana. Ponovil je, da ima Izrael pravico do samoobrambe, ampak dodal, da morajo vse strani spoštovati mednarodno humanitarno pravo.

Fajon: Potrebujemo mir

Slovenska zunanja ministrica Tanja Fajon je poudarila, da več nasilja ne bo prineslo večje varnosti. "Terorizem pod krinko solidarnosti ali vojaške operacije pod pretvezo zaščite ne pomenijo večje varnosti. Pomenijo le trpljenje civilistov in odlaganje smiselnih diplomatskih rešitev. Potrebujemo mir," je dejala Tanja Fajon, ki je vodila zasedanje.

Spomnila je, da so o Libanonu razpravljali že prejšnji petek, in pozvala vse v dvorani, ki imajo vpliv na Izrael in Hezbolah, naj ga uporabijo. "Izrael mora ustaviti zračne napade in opustiti načrte za kopensko invazijo. Hezbolah mora ustaviti  napade," je dejala.
2024-09-26.title: Netanjahu po pozivu k premirju ukazal izraelski vojski, naj se še naprej bojuje s polno močjo
2024-09-26.english_content:
Netanyahu, after calling for a truce, ordered the Israeli army to continue fighting with full force

More than 70,000 displaced persons in Lebanon's refugee camps

Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has ignored the call of the United States and its allies for a 21-day truce between Israel and Hezbollah. He ordered the Israelite army to continue fighting "with all its might".

Despite calls by the international community for a ceasefire, Israel continues to launch attacks on Lebanon, where the Israeli military said it hit about 75 targets of the pro-Iranian Shiite Hezbollah movement overnight. At least 13 people were reportedly killed in the attacks, including nine in the northeast and four in the south.

The Israeli army stated that it had attacked, among other things, the southern suburb of Beirut, which is considered one of Hezbollah's strongholds. Israel claims that he killed in the attack the commander of the drone unit, Mohammed Srura, also known as Abu Saleh.

In response to Israeli attacks, Hezbollah launched 80 rockets into the Israeli city of Safed. Details are not known at this time. The groups have provided support to Yemenite Houthis, who are also supported by Iran and have been attacking ships in the Red Sea since November last year in solidarity with the Palestinians in Gaza.

Meanwhile, the Israeli Defense Ministry reported that Israel had secured a $8.7 billion US military aid package. "The package includes $3.5 billion for emergency war orders and $5.2 billion for air defense systems", the statement said.

Israel refuses to respond to calls for a ceasefire

According to the Israeli Prime Minister's office, Netanyahu has not agreed to the US invitation along with European and Arab countries. "The news of the ceasefire is not real. This is an American-French proposal that the Prime Minister has not responded to. The news of the alleged war-reduction directive in the north is also not true,' they wrote.

"The Prime Minister has ordered the Israeli armed forces to continue the fight with full force and in accordance with the plans presented to him. The fighting in Gaza will also continue until all the objectives of the war are achieved", they said.

Israeli Foreign Minister Israel Kac has stated that there will be no ceasefire.

Israel's far-right finance minister Bezalel Smotrich also rejected the call for a ceasefire and called for the destruction of Hezbollah. He insisted that continuing the war against Hezbollah was the only way forward.

"The campaign in the north should end with one single result: the destruction of Hezbollah and its ability to harm the people of the north. We must not give the enemy time to recover from the severe blows he has suffered and reorganize to continue the war after 21 days", he wrote on the X network.

Meanwhile, Israeli opposition leader and former prime minister Jair Lapid said the Israeli government should only allow a seven-day ceasefire. He said that this would "prevent Hezbollah from re-establishing its command and control systems". "We will not accept any proposal that does not include the withdrawal of Hezbollah from our northern borders", he added.

Joint call for a three-day truce

The United States, the EU and Australia, Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, Saudi Arabia, the United Arab Emirates and Qatar have jointly called for an immediate 21-day ceasefire at the border between Israel and Lebanon.

'The relations between Lebanon and Israel are unacceptable as of 8 October 2023 and present an unacceptable risk to wider regional escalation. It's not in anyone's interest, not in the interest of the Israelis or the Lebanese. It is time for a diplomatic solution that will allow civilians on both sides of the border to return home safely", the White House said in a joint statement.

"We therefore call for an immediate 21-day ceasefire on the Lebanon-Israel border to provide room for diplomacy, conclude a diplomatic solution in accordance with Security Council Resolution 1701 and implement Resolution 2375 on the Gaza ceasefire", adds the statement of the signatories, committed to supporting diplomatic efforts for peace.

Prior to this statement, US President Joe Biden and French President Emmanuel Macron announced in a joint statement that the time had come for a solution on the Israeli-Lebanese border that would ensure the safety and protection of civilians.

Biden said in a brief press conference that the call was strongly supported by European and Arab states because it was important not to spread the war. A senior US administration official told the BBC that neither Israel nor Lebanon had accepted the proposal, and the US was in contact with both sides.

The EU's High Foreign Policy Representative Josep Borrell also called for a truce.

"We call on both sides to immediately establish a ceasefire across the Blue Line that will be effective and immediately address all cross-border threats", Borrell stressed, adding that Brussels also calls on the international community to take action and supports the current efforts to this end.

"Any further tightening would have dramatic consequences for the region and beyond", he warned. In this regard, he recalled, inter alia, Resolution 2749, in which the UN Security Council called on the actors concerned to take immediate action to calm the situation at the end of August. He also mentioned Resolution 1701 and, in light of this opposition, called for ensuring the safe return of displaced people.

"We welcome and strongly support the efforts of France and the United States to achieve a ceasefire through negotiations", said the first man of European diplomacy, reiterating the EU's commitment to supporting Lebanese state institutions, including the Lebanese military.

Israel does not rule out military operations

Israel on Wednesday expanded airstrikes in Lebanon, where at least 72 people have been killed and more than 220 injured since Monday.

The Israeli military has not ruled out a land operation in southern Lebanon, which has reinforced fears that it could trigger a wider war in the Middle East.

Israeli Ambassador to the UN Dani Danon told reporters before an emergency meeting of the UN Security Council on Wednesday that Israel would welcome the ceasefire and give priority to a diplomatic solution. In the US, he then said that Iran represents a network of violence in the region and that the threat of violence must be removed for peace.

Iranian Foreign Minister Abas Aragci told reporters before the meeting that his country supports Hezbollah and would not remain indifferent if the war in Lebanon escalated.

Lebanon's Prime Minister Najib Mikati welcomed the call for a ceasefire and said the key to its implementation was whether Israel was committed to the implementation of international resolutions.

More than 70,000 displaced persons in Lebanon's refugee camps

Lebanon has already displaced 70,100 people due to intense Israeli attacks on hundreds of temporary shelters, Interior Minister Basam Mavlavi said. More than 22,000 people have fled Lebanon to Syria this week via two border crossings, two Syrian security sources said.

Israel has significantly increased its attacks on Hezbollah targets in Lebanon in recent days, killing more than 600 people since Monday. Thousands of people have fled the attacks from the south to the north. It is difficult to determine the exact number of internally displaced persons in Lebanon. Many of them have fled to relatives, many sleeping on the streets, reports the German news agency DPA.

According to the International Organization for Migration (IOM), about 90,530 people have been displaced from Lebanon since Monday. Prior to this, the UN reported that 110,000 more people had been displaced since the Gaza war began on October 7 due to clashes between Israel and Hezbollah in Lebanon.

Lebanon's Foreign Minister Abdalah Bou Habib, meanwhile, claims the number of displaced people in the country is approaching half a million, reports the BBC in Britain.

More than 22,000 people have entered Syria from Lebanon this week. "More than 6,000 Lebanese and about 15,000 Syrians entered through the main Masna border crossing", said one Syrian security source, while another reported that "about 1,000 Lebanese and 500 Syrians entered through the second crossing", reports AFP.

War is not inevitable

The Security Council met at an emergency meeting on Lebanon at the request of France, as French Foreign Minister Jean Noel Barrot said that Israeli attacks had caused too many casualties and Hezbollah continued to attack Israel. He said that at all costs, a war must be prevented after which Lebanon will not recover.

"We are taking advantage of the great presence of world leaders and imposing a diplomatic solution", he said. "War is not inevitable", he said, announcing that he would visit Beirut by the end of the week.

All other speakers then called for an end to the conflict and a calm to the situation and expressed support for the UN peacekeeping mission in Lebanon (Unifil).

The bloodiest day of my generation

The situation on the ground was briefed by UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres, who said that hell had broken out in Lebanon, and said that 200,000 people had already fled the area south of Lebanon as a result of the fighting and 60,000 had fled from northern Israel.

"Monday was the bloodiest day for Lebanon in this generation", he said of the day when at least 558 people were killed, according to Lebanese authorities. Guterres welcomed the diplomatic efforts and stressed that no one can afford Lebanon to become the new Gaza.

The U.S. blames Hezbollah

Deputy US Ambassador Robert Wood stressed that they are working intensively with others on a proposal that will lead to a diplomatic solution and asked the UN Security Council to support it in the coming days.

"The wider war in this area is in no one's interest. The only way forward is through diplomatic resolution 1701", said Wood, expressing deep U.S. concern over the deaths of hundreds of civilians in Lebanon.

He blamed the deterioration on Hezbollah, which has been attacking Israel with Iranian weapons since October 8 last year. He reiterated that Israel has the right to self-defense, but added that all parties must respect international humanitarian law.

We need peace

Slovenian Foreign Minister Tanja Fajon stressed that more violence will not bring greater security. "Solidarity terrorism or military operations under the guise of protection do not mean greater security. They mean only civilian suffering and delaying meaningful diplomatic solutions. We need peace", said Tanja Fajon, who led the siege.

She recalled that Lebanon had been discussed as early as last Friday and invited everyone in the room who has influence over Israel and Hezbollah to use it. "Israel must stop airstrikes and abandon plans for a land invasion. Hezbollah must stop the attacks", she said.

Ruski poslanci za prepoved posvojitve otrok v države, ki dovoljujejo spremembo spola

Ruski poslanci so v prvi obravnavi glasovali za podporo predlogu zakona, ki prepoveduje posvojitve ruskih otrok državljanom v državah, ki dovoljujejo spremembo spola.

Gre za zadnjega v nizu skrajno konservativnih socialnih ukrepov v okviru politike, ki jo zagovarja predsednik Vladimir Putin.

Predlog zakona, o katerem so danes glasovali poslanci, se nanaša na prepoved posvojitve otrok državljanom iz držav, ki dovoljujejo "spremembo spola z medicinskim posegom, vključno z uporabo zdravil", ali spremembo navedbe spola v uradnih osebnih dokumentih.

Za predlog je glasovalo 397 poslancev, en poslanec je bil proti. Vjačeslav Volodin, predsednik dume, spodnjega doma parlamenta, je pozdravil napredek pri sprejemanju predloga zakona, poroča francoska tiskovna agencija AFP.

"S tem zakonom ščitimo otroka, delamo vse, da otrok ne bi končal v državi, kjer sta istospolna zakonska zveza in sprememba spola dovoljeni," je dejal Volodin, ki je tesen zaveznik predsednika Vladimirja Putina in goreč zagovornik omenjenega predloga.

Volodin je v intervjuju za ruske medije na začetku meseca dejal, da sta Evropa in ZDA "bolni", ker dopuščata spremembo spola, in napadel ljudi, "ki so bili še včeraj moški, danes pa se imenujejo ženske", navaja AFP.

Predlog zakona mora biti v dumi sprejet še v dveh branjih, potrditi pa ga mora tudi zgornji dom parlamenta, preden ga lahko Putin podpiše.

Število posvojitev ruskih otrok v tujino je od leta 2012, ko je Moskva Američanom prepovedala posvojitve, drastično upadlo. Od začetka ruske invazije v Ukrajini leta 2022 pa se je tako rekoč popolnoma ustavilo.

Rusija je v zadnjih letih postala sovražno okolje do pripadnikov skupnosti LGBTQ. Novembra lani so ruske oblasti mednarodno gibanje LGBT označile za ekstremistično in prepovedale spremembo spola.
2024-09-25.title: Ruski poslanci za prepoved posvojitve otrok v države, ki dovoljujejo spremembo spola

Russian MEPs for a ban on adoption of children in countries that allow gender change

Russian lawmakers voted in the first reading in support of a bill banning the adoption of Russian children by citizens of countries that allow gender reassignment.

It is the latest in a series of highly conservative social measures under the policy advocated by President Vladimir Putin.

The bill, which was voted on by lawmakers today, concerns the ban on adoption of children by nationals of countries that allow "gender change by medical intervention, including the use of medicines", or change in gender in official personal documents.

The proposal was approved by 397 MEPs, with one MEP voting against. Vyacheslav Volodin, the speaker of the lower house of parliament, welcomed the progress made in passing the bill, AFP news agency reported.

"We are protecting the child with this law, we are doing everything we can to prevent the child from ending up in a country where same-sex marriage and gender reassignment are allowed", said Volodin, a close ally of President Vladimir Putin and a fervent advocate of the proposal.

Volodin said in an interview with Russian media earlier this month that Europe and the United States were "sick" because they allowed gender change, and attacked people "who were men yesterday but now call themselves women", reports AFP.

The bill must be passed in the House in two more readings and must be approved by the upper house of parliament before Putin can sign it.

The number of Russian children adopted abroad has dropped dramatically since 2012, when Moscow banned adoptions from Americans. But since the beginning of the Russian invasion of Ukraine in 2022, it has stopped completely.

Russia has become a hostile environment for members of the LGBTQ community in recent years. Last November, Russian authorities labeled the international LGBT movement as extremist and banned gender reassignment.

Golob v Varnostnem svetu ZN-a: Svet nujno potrebuje vodstvo

Slovenija je ob predsedovanju Varnostnemu svetu ZN-a pripravila posebno zasedanje

Varnostni svet ZN-a je pred posebnim zasedanjem, ki ga je pripravilo slovensko predsedstvo, soglasno potrdil predsedniško izjavo, v kateri med drugim priznava pomen multilateralizma in se zaveda odgovornosti, ki jih ima po Ustanovni listini ZN-a.

Posebno zasedanje Varnostnega sveta z naslovom Voditeljstvo za mir, ki ga je v okviru septembrskega predsedovanja v času splošne razprave svetovnih voditeljev na 79. Generalni skupščini ZN-a pripravila Slovenija, je vodil slovenski premier Robert Golob. Ta je na začetku zasedanja prebral predsedniško izjavo, ki je za resolucijo drugi najpomembnejši instrument Varnostnega sveta ZN-a in mora biti sprejeta soglasno.

"Varnostni svet poudarja pomen ohranjanja multilateralizma in osrednje vloge ZN-a, poudarja podporo usklajevanju znotraj ZN-a, zagotavljanju sprememb za najranljivejše, kot so cilji trajnostnega razvoja in preprečevanje konfliktov, in izreka pohvalo humanitarnim delavcem," navaja izjava.

Izjava znova potrjuje načela Ustanovne listine ZN-a in poudarja, da je potreba po okrepitvi odločenosti za ohranitev mednarodnega miru in varnosti v skladu z Ustanovno listino nujnejša kot kdaj koli prej.

Varnostni svet zato znova potrjuje svojo glavno odgovornost za ohranjanje mednarodnega miru in varnosti, zavezanost mednarodnemu pravu, poudarja potrebo po upoštevanju njegovih resolucij in spodbujanje enakopravnega sodelovanja žensk na vseh ravneh odločanja.

Predsedniška izjava še navaja, da se Varnostni svet zaveda kompleksnosti izzivov in groženj mednarodnemu miru in varnosti ter poudarja pomen celovitega pristopa k ohranjanju miru. Znova izraža odločno podporo zaščiti civilistov v oboroženih spopadih, poziva vse strani v oboroženih spopadih, naj v celoti spoštujejo svoje obveznosti po mednarodnem humanitarnem pravu, in znova poudarja svojo zavezanost odgovornosti za kršitve.

"Varnostni svet se v celoti zaveda odgovornosti, ki mu jih nalaga Ustanovna listina ZN-a, in skupnih prizadevanj narodov sveta, ki ga silijo k učinkovitemu ukrepanju za ohranjanje mednarodnega miru in varnosti. Izraža svojo zavezo, da bo svoje odgovornosti izpolnjeval na najučinkovitejši način. Poleg tega se zaveda, da mora prevladati duh, ki je vodil ustanovitev ZN-a, in navdihovati človeštvo, da vztraja na poti miru," pravi izjava.

Golob v Varnostnem svetu pozval k povrnitvi zaupanja v ZN

Golob je na zasedanju pozval k povrnitvi zaupanja v Združene narode, predvsem Varnostnega sveta, in za nesprejemljivo označil to, da je bilo lani po svetu pobitih rekordno število civilistov, humanitarnih delavcev in novinarjev.

Slovenija od začetka članstva v Varnostnem svetu opaža vztrajno upadanje moči pravil, oblikovanih po drugi svetovni vojni, in nezmožnost odzivanja na velike konflikte, kot so tisti v Ukrajini, Gazi in Sudanu, je poudaril Golob. "Zato smo pripravili ta dogodek. Svet nujno potrebuje vodstvo," je dejal.

Vojno v Ukrajini je označil za jasno kršitev Ustanovne listine ZN-a, ki lahko odpre vrata podobnim vojnam po vsem svetu. Zanj je nesprejemljivo, da Varnostni svet ni sposoben odločneje posredovati kljub grozodejstvom nad Palestinci, v Sudanu pa se napoveduje nov genocid, med drugim v Darfurju.

"Slovenija si prizadeva biti pošten posrednik, most in graditelj soglasja. Naša politika temelji na vrednotah in načelih. Kar smo se zavezali v kampanji za sedež v Varnostnem svetu, skušamo tudi uresničiti. Prizadevamo si, da bi za vse konflikte uporabljali enake standarde," je poudaril.

Golob je pozval k večjemu upoštevanju skupnih, in ne nacionalnih interesov, in navedel nekaj preteklih zgodb o uspehu Varnostnega sveta, kot so Liberija, Sierra Leone in Vzhodni Timor, kjer je ukrepal z orodji, ki jih ima na voljo. Pri nekdanji Jugoslaviji mu je uspelo ustanoviti mednarodno sodišče za zločine, kar se danes zdi nepredstavljivo, je dejal Golob.

Za rekordno število žrtev med civilisti po svetu nosi Varnostni svet svoj del odgovornosti, je dejal in pozval države, naj se zamislijo o tem. "Ponovno moramo vzpostaviti zaupanje v Združene narode," je dejal in pozval k prizadevanjem za večjo učinkovitost in reforme, pri čemer imajo stalne članice posebno odgovornost.

"Naj sklenem z besedami, da so načela multilateralizma – zamisel, da morajo narodi sodelovati, da bi ohranili mir – danes enako pomembna kot pred 79 leti. Danes smo se lahko združili okoli predsedniške izjave. Gradimo na teh temeljih in ponovno spodbudimo naše skupno delo za boljši, mirnejši in bolj človeški svet," je sklenil Golob.

Zasedanje, na katerem po zadnjih podatkih sodeluje približno 90 držav, se bo nadaljevalo do večera, ko se bo Varnostni svet na zahtevo Francije sešel na izredni seji o Libanonu.
2024-09-25.title: Golob v Varnostnem svetu ZN-a: Svet nujno potrebuje vodstvo
