Kanadska vojska nabavila spalne vreče, ki niso primerne za kanadske zime

Obrambno ministrstvo za vreče zapravilo 34,8 milijona kanadskih dolarjev

Kanadska vojska je priznala, da nove spalne vreče, ki so jih lani dobavili vojakom, niso primerne za "tipične kanadske zimske razmere".

Vojska je vojake z novimi spalnimi vrečami oskrbela lansko jesen v Alberti, kjer se je več sto pripadnikov kanadskih oboroženih enot pripravljalo na vojaške vaje z ameriškimi vojaki na Aljaski.

Vojaki, ki so uporabljali omenjene spalne vreče, so poročali o več "kritičnih težavah", povezanih s "pomanjkanjem toplote", razkriva okrožnica, ki jo je objavil CBC. Ker so se temperature v tistem času v Alberti ponoči spustile tudi do -20 stopinj Celzija, je vojake v novih spalnih vrečah zeblo, čeprav so si šotore ogrevali s pečicami.

Uradnik, podpisan pod okrožnico, je v njej še sklenil, da so vreče "primernejše za uporabo v vremenskih razmerah med pozno pomladjo in zgodnjo jesenjo". Ob tem je priporočil, da se vojakom posodi nekaj prvotnih vojaških arktičnih spalnih vreč, ki so jih prvič nabavili leta 1965.

Obrambno ministrstvo je za menjavo izvirnih arktičnih vreč porabilo več kot 34,8 milijona kanadskih dolarjev (23 milijonov evrov).

"Bolje, če bi šli v supermarket"

Vojska v izjavi za CBC ni želela komentirati, ali so vreče pred nakupom preizkusili v hladnem vremenu, so pa pojasnili, da so omenjene spalne vreče "izbrali po temeljitem konkurenčnem postopku" in da so pri izboru med drugim upoštevali vrednost izolacijskega materiala, težo spalnih vreč in volumen pakiranja.

Ob tem so dodali, da se jim še vedno zdi, da so nove spalne vreče primerne za večino uporabnikov – da pa bodo zdaj nabavili nove vreče, prilagojene za zimske razmere na skrajnem severu in na Arktiki.

"Sprašujem se, ali ne bi bilo bolje, da bi preprosto šli v Canadian Tire (priljubljen kanadski supermarket, op. a.)," je pikro pripomnil Rob Huebert z Univerze v Calgaryju, strokovnjak za arktične vojaške zadeve.
2024-09-14.title: Kanadska vojska nabavila spalne vreče, ki niso primerne za kanadske zime

The Canadian Army has procured sleeping bags that are not suitable for the Canadian winter.

The Department of Defense spent 34.8 million Canadian dollars on bags.

The Canadian military acknowledged that the new sleeping bags supplied to soldiers last year were not suitable for "typical Canadian winter conditions".

The military provided soldiers with new sleeping bags last fall in Alberta, where hundreds of Canadian armed forces were preparing for military drills with U.S. troops in Alaska.

Soldiers who used the sleeping bags mentioned reported several "critical problems" associated with "lack of heat", reveals a Circuit Court published by CBC. Because temperatures in Alberta at that time dropped to -20 degrees Celsius at night, soldiers were kept in new sleeping bags, even though they were heating their tents with bakeries.

The official, signed under the circular, also concluded that the bags were "more suitable for use in weather conditions between late spring and early autumn". He recommended that soldiers be given some original military Arctic sleeping bags, which were first purchased in 1965.

The Ministry of Defence spent more than C$34.8 million (€23 million) on the replacement of the original Arctic bags.

"We'd better go to the supermarket".

The military declined to comment on whether the bags were tested in cold weather before purchase, but explained that the said sleeping bags were "selected according to a thorough competitive process" and that the selection took into account, inter alia, the value of the insulation material, the weight of the sleeping bags and the packaging volume.

They added that they still believe that the new sleeping bags are suitable for most users  ⁇  but will now purchase new bags adapted to winter conditions in the far north and the Arctic.

"I wonder if it would be better if we just went to Canadian Tire", noted Rob Huebert of the University of Calgary, an expert on Arctic military affairs.
2024-09-14.english_title: The Canadian Army has procured sleeping bags that are not suitable for the Canadian winter.

Timberlake bo zaradi vožnje pod vplivom alkohola oddelal 25 ur družbeno koristnega dela

Zvezdnik sprva trdil, da je spil "le en martini"

Ameriški pevec in igralec Justin Timberlake je na sodišču v državi New York priznal krivdo zaradi vožnje pod vplivom alkohola in bil obsojen na družbeno koristno delo, poročajo ameriški mediji.

Timberlaka so policisti junija ustavili v kraju Sag Harbor na Long Islandu. Kot je takrat sporočila ameriška policija, je Timberlake prevozil znak stop in vijugal po cesti. Preizkus alkoholiziranosti je zavrnil, a so policisti ocenili, da so njegove "krvave in steklene oči", govor in zadah zadosten dokaz, da je pod vplivom alkohola, zato so ga pridržali do naslednjega dne.

Njegov odvetnik je zvezdnika branil in zatrjeval, da je med druženjem s prijatelji spil "zgolj en martini", kar je po takratnem poročanju ameriških tabloidov ves čas pridržanja ponavljal tudi Timberlake.

V skladu z ameriško zakonodajo bi bil lahko obsojen na največ leto dni zapora, plačilo kazni do 1000 dolarjev in začasen odvzem vozniškega dovoljenja za dobo vsaj šestih mesecev. A je njegova odvetniška ekipa dosegla dogovor, da kazen oddela z družbeno koristnim delom.

Po poročanju televizije CBS mora tako Timberlake oddelati 25 ur družbeno koristnega dela, javno priznati prekršek – kar je že storil na sodišču – in plačati 760 dolarjev kazni.
2024-09-14.title: Timberlake bo zaradi vožnje pod vplivom alkohola oddelal 25 ur družbeno koristnega dela
2024-09-14.english_content:
Timberlake will be serving 25 hours of community service for driving under the influence.

The star originally claimed to have drunk "only one martini"

American singer and actor Justin Timberlake pleaded guilty to driving under the influence in a New York state court and was sentenced to community service, U.S. media reports.

Timberlake was stopped by the police in June at Sag Harbor, Long Island. As reported by the U.S. Marshals Service at the time, Timberlake was carrying a stop sign and a whip along the road. He refused the alcohol test, but the police considered his "blooded and glass eyes", speech, and breathing to be sufficient evidence that he was under the influence of alcohol, so they detained him until the next day.

His lawyer defended the star, claiming that he had drunk "only one martini" while hanging out with friends, as Timberlake also repeated at the time, according to the American tabloid report.

Under U.S. law, he could be sentenced to a maximum of one year in prison, a fine of up to $1,000 and a suspended driver's license for at least six months. But his legal team has reached an agreement to split the sentence with a social benefit.

According to CBS, Timberlake will be required to serve 25 hours of community service, plead guilty to a felony he's already committed in court and pay a $760 fine.
2024-09-14.english_title: Timberlake will be serving 25 hours of community service for driving under the influence.

Cristiano Ronaldo je postal prvi človek z milijardo sledilcev

Taylor Swift ima 574 milijonov sledilcev

Cristiano Ronaldo je na družbenih omrežjih presegel skupno milijardo sledilcev, s čimer je postal prvi, ki je dosegel ta neverjetni mejnik.

Številka je izračunana na podlagi skupnega števila sledilcev na njegovih računih na Instagramu, Facebooku, Twitterju, YouTubu ter na kitajskih družbenih omrežjih Weibo in Kuaishou.

To ne pomeni, da ima milijardo posamičnih sledilcev, saj ga mnogi spremljajo na več omrežjih, nekateri pa so tudi boti.

Kljub temu pa strokovnjak za družbene medije Paolo Pescatore iz družbe PP Foresight številko opisuje kot "neverjetno" ter napoveduje, da bodo mediji in tržne znamke zelo pozorni na to.

"Kakšen dosežek, ki še dodatno poudari koreniti obrat v medijih," je povedal za BBC. "To kaže moč, kako se da, zahvaljujoč tehnologiji, doseči novo, mlajše občinstvo."

In Ronaldo lahko svoj dosežek še izboljša, saj drugače od nekaterih drugih nima svojega kanala na TikToku in Threadsih.

Na nogometnih igriščih je bil Ronaldo poznan po svojem rivalstvu z argentinskim zvezdnikom Lionelom Messijem, a se slednji s 623 milijoni skupnih sledilcev Portugalcu niti ne približajo.

Drugi zvezdniki z največjo prisotnostjo na družbenih omrežjih:

Selena Gomez (igralka/pevka): 690 milijonovJustin Bieber (pevec): 607 milijonovTaylor Swift (pevka): 574 milijonovThe Rock (igralec): 557 milijonovKylie Jenner (resničnostna zvezdnica in vplivnica): 551 milijonovAriana Grande (pevka): 508 milijonovMrBeast (največji zvezdnik YouTuba): 543 milijonov

Ronaldo je mejnik dosegel, zahvaljujoč svoji odločitvi prejšnji mesec, da se pridruži YouTubu, na katerem se je na njegov kanal v enem samem tednu naročilo 50 milijonov uporabnikov. Zaenkrat so na kanalu objavljeni večinoma pogovori med Ronaldom in njegovo soprogo Georgino Rodríguez, pa tudi z njegovim nekdanjim kolegom iz ekipe Manchester United Riom Ferdinandom.

Ronaldova kariera je polna rekordov. Med drugim je najboljši strelec v zgodovini Lige prvakov, ima največ zadetkov v evropski ligi prvakov in več mednarodnih nastopov kot kdor koli drug.
2024-09-13.title: Cristiano Ronaldo je postal prvi človek z milijardo sledilcev
2024-09-13.english_content:
Cristiano Ronaldo became the first person to have a billion followers

Taylor Swift has 574 million followers.

Cristiano Ronaldo has surpassed a total of one billion followers on social media, becoming the first to reach this incredible milestone.

The number is calculated on the basis of the total number of followers on his Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, YouTube and Chinese social networks Weibo and Kuaishou accounts.

That doesn't mean he has a billion individual followers, as many follow him on multiple networks, and some are bots.

Nevertheless, social media expert Paolo Pescatore of PP Foresight describes the figure as 'incredible' and predicts that the media and brands will pay close attention to it.

"What an achievement that further emphasizes the root cause of the media", he told the BBC. "It shows the power of technology to reach a new, younger audience".

And Ronaldo can improve his performance, because unlike some others, he doesn't have his own channel on Tiktok and Threads.

On the football field, Ronaldo was known for his rivalry with Argentine star Lionel Messi, but the latter with 623 million total followers does not even come close to Portugal.

Ronaldo reached the milestone thanks to his decision last month to join YouTube, which has 50 million subscribers to his channel in a single week. The channel has so far broadcast mostly conversations between Ronald and his wife Georgina Rodríguez, as well as his former Manchester United teammate Riom Ferdinand.

Ronald's career is full of records. Among other things, he is the best shooter in the history of the Champions League, has the most goals in the European Champions League and more international appearances than anyone else.

Tretjina Špancev meni, da je tujih turistov preveč. Evropejci za ukrepe proti množičnemu turizmu.

Grčija s pobudami proti oddajanju stanovanj turistom

Tretjina prebivalcev Španije meni, da je v njihovi okolici preveč tujih turistov, kažejo izsledki vseevropske raziskave, ki tudi kaže, da je večina prebivalcev Evrope naklonjena protestom proti čezmernemu turizmu in podpira ukrepe za boj proti njemu.

Raziskava YouGov je izšla po poletju protestov in alarmantnih svaril pred negativnimi posledicami množičnega turizma od Santorinija in Kanarskih otokov do Cinque Terre in Amsterdama.

Javnomnenjska raziskava je zajela Dansko, Francijo, Nemčijo, Italijo, Španijo, Švedsko in Veliko Britanijo, izsledki pa so pokazali, da so Španci najbolj nastrojeni proti množičnemu turizmu, saj jih kar 32 odstotkov meni, da je preveč tujih turistov na njihovem območju. Ta delež se je povzpel na 48 odstotkov v Kataloniji, ki zajema tudi Barcelono.

To mesto z 1,6 milijona prebivalcev vsako leto obišče okoli 32 milijonov obiskovalcev, stanje pa je tako alarmantno, da je eden od lokalnih kolumnistov prejšnji mesec zapisal: "Moje mesto mi je bilo ukradeno in ne bom ga več dobil nazaj."

Z 28 odstotki je Španija tudi država, za katero je najbolj verjetno, da bodo imeli prebivalci negativno stališče do tujih turistov. V Franciji tako stališče deli 16 odstotkov vprašanih, v Italiji 11 in v Nemčiji 14. Španci imajo tudi bolj negativno mnenje od drugih, ko gre za sektor nepremičnin za kratkoročni najem, ki naj bi bil poglavitni krivec za napihovanje cen nepremičnin in izseljevanje lokalnega prebivalstva iz mestnih jeder.

Španska vlada je julija napovedala radikalno omejitev kratkoročnega turističnega najema stanovanj in strogo preverjanje licenc na platformah, kot sta Airbnb in Booking.com, medtem ko nameravajo mestne oblasti v Barceloni do leta 2029 prepovedati vsa počitniška stanovanja.

Raziskava je pokazala, da več kot tretjina Špancev (37 odstotkov) meni, da sektor turističnih oddajanj stanovanj prinaša več škode kot koristi, 45 odstotkov pa jih ima izrazito negativno stališče do takšnega oddajanja stanovanj. V Veliki Britaniji jih ima 33 odstotkov negativno stališče do tega sektorja, v Italiji 30 odstotkov, v Franciji 28, na Danskem 24 in v Nemčiji 21.

Na hotelsko industrijo medtem v vseh zajetih državah gledajo povečini pozitivno (69–73 odstotkov).

Ko gre za industrijo križarskih ladij, imata najbolj negativno stališče do nje Francija (47 odstotkov) in Nemčija (45 odstotkov), medtem ko gledajo nanjo bolj pozitivno v Španiji (20 odstotkov) in Italiji (19 odstotkov), potem ko sta Barcelona in Benetke sprejele ukrepe proti križarkam.

Podpora protestom

Evropejci v veliki večini podpirajo pomisleke aktivistov glede čezmernega turizma in pravijo, da imajo veliko simpatij do prebivalcev najbolj priljubljenih turističnih destinacij, ki protestirajo. Tu ponovno prednjači Španija (66 odstotkov), sledijo Francija, Nemčija in Švedska. Vprašani se tudi v veliki večini strinjajo z ukrepi oblasti za boj proti množičnemu turizmu.

Kot poroča Guardian, je nadzor nad številom turistov težko usklajevanje za nacionalne, mestne in lokalne oblasti, pri čemer je potrebno sklepati kompromise med pogosto prepotrebnimi prihodki in delovnimi mesti, ki jih ustvarjajo tuji obiskovalci, ter kvaliteto življenja prebivalcev.

Mesta, kot so Amsterdam, Pariz, Sevilla in Benetke, turistične atrakcije, kot sta atenska Akropola in Hagija Sofija v Carigradu, ter naravni parki, kot je Calanques v Marseillesu, so vsa v zadnjem času sprejela ukrepe proti čezmernemu turizmu. Strategije vključujejo reguliranje oz. zmanjševanje števila obiskovalcev z dviganjem turističnih taks, uvedbo vstopnin, časovnice vstopov ali rezervacijski sistem in množične kampanje ozaveščanja s ciljem zmanjšanja števila obiskovalcev.

Najbolj priljubljen ukrep so vnaprejšnje rezervacije vstopnic za priljubljene atrakcije, kot sta Kolosej v Rimu in Louvre v Parizu. Najmanj polovica vprašanih tudi podpira omejevanje števila obiskovalcev in prepoved gradnje novih hotelov v turističnih mestih, za kar so se denimo odločili v Amsterdamu.

Malce manj priljubljene so turistične takse za vstop v najbolj obljudena mesta, prepoved oddajanj stanovanj turistom in prepoved obiskovalcev, ki ne ostanejo v mestu najmanj eno noč.

Grčija pa je danes sporočila, da bodo lastniki domov, ki spremenijo svoje kratkoročno oddajanje stanovanj v dolgoročno, za tri leta oproščeni davkov. V sklopu načrta za spopadanje s pomanjkanjem stanovanj je grški premier Kyriakos Mitsotakis prejšnji teden sporočil, da Grčija načrtuje tudi zvišanje davka na kratkoročno oddajanje stanovanj in prepovedati nove licence v središču Aten. Prebivalci prestolnice so se na načrte odzvali povečini pozitivno. "To je velik problem, ker spreminja urbano krajino. Kjer so tradicionalne stavbe, so zdaj ob njih moderne, zasnovane za Airbnb," je povedala 58-letna Atenčanka Penny Platanitou.

Valentina Reino, ena od vodij Airbnbja za južno Evropo, je dejala, da je njeno podjetje pripravljeno sodelovati z grško vlado na "ciljnih in sorazmernih rešitev". Nizke plače, visoka inflacija, pomanjkanje nepremičnin in rast kratkoročnih turističnih oddajanj stanovanj so v Grčiji, ki še vedno okreva po desetletje dolgi dolžniški krizi, podžgali stanovanjsko krizo, pri čemer so še posebej prizadeti tisti z nizkimi plačami, mladi pari in študentje. 

Grčija je do zdaj porabila 2,2 milijarde evrov za subvencioniranje nizkoobrestnih posojil, da bi tako pomagali mladim do nepremičnin, še dodatni 2 milijardi pa bo namenila za razširitev načrta na pare do 50. leta starosti.
2024-09-13.title: Tretjina Špancev meni, da je tujih turistov preveč. Evropejci za ukrepe proti množičnemu turizmu.

One third of Spaniards think there are too many foreign tourists. The European Union has also been involved in the fight against mass tourism.

Greece with initiatives against tourist housing

A third of Spain's population believes that there are too many foreign tourists in their area, according to the results of a pan-European survey, which also shows that the majority of Europeans are pro-democracy and support measures to combat over-tourism.

The YouGov survey came after a summer of protests and alarming warnings about the negative consequences of mass tourism from Santorini and the Canary Islands to Cinque Terre and Amsterdam.

The public survey covered Denmark, France, Germany, Italy, Spain, Sweden and the United Kingdom, and the results showed that the Spaniards were the most anti-mass tourism, with 32 percent of them considering too many foreign tourists in their area. This proportion has risen to 48% in Catalonia, which includes Barcelona.

With a population of 1.6 million, this city receives about 32 million visitors a year, and the situation is so alarming that one local columnist wrote last month: "My place has been stolen and I will never get it back".

Spain is also the country most likely to have a negative attitude toward foreign tourists, at 28 percent. In France, 16 percent of respondents share this view, in Italy 11 and in Germany 14 percent. The Spanish also have a more negative opinion than others when it comes to the real estate sector for short-term rental, which is supposed to be the main culprit in inflating real estate prices and the displacement of local people from urban centres.

The Spanish government announced in July a radical restriction on short-term tourist rental and strict licensing checks on platforms such as Airbnb and Booking.com, while Barcelona's city authorities plan to ban all holiday accommodation by 2029.

The survey showed that more than a third of Spaniards (37%) feel that the tourist rental sector brings more harm than good, and 45 percent have a strongly negative view of such rental. In the UK, 33% have a negative opinion on this sector, in Italy 30% in France 28, in Denmark 24 and in Germany 21.

The majority (69 ⁇ 73) of the countries concerned, meanwhile, have a positive view of the hotel industry.

The cruise ship industry is the most negatively viewed by France (47 percent) and Germany (45 percent), while Spain (20 percent) and Italy (19 percent) are more positive after Barcelona and Venice took action against cruise ships.

Support for protests

The vast majority of Europeans support the concerns of activists about over-tourism and say they have great sympathy for the residents of the most popular tourist destinations who are protesting. Spain (66 percent) again leads, followed by France, Germany and Sweden. The vast majority of respondents also agree with the authorities' measures to combat mass tourism.

As the Guardian reports, controlling the number of tourists is a difficult coordination for national, city and local authorities, with compromises needed between often over-demanding incomes and foreign visitors' jobs and the quality of life of residents.

Cities such as Amsterdam, Paris, Seville and Venice, tourist attractions such as the Athenian Acropolis and Hagia Sophia in Carigrad, and natural parks such as Calanques in Marseilles have all recently taken measures against over-tourism. The strategies include regulating or reducing the number of visitors by raising tourist rates, introducing tickets, timetables or booking systems, and mass awareness campaigns to reduce the number of visitors.

The most popular measure is the advance reservation of tickets for popular attractions such as the Colosseum in Rome and the Louvre in Paris. At least half of the respondents also support restricting the number of visitors and banning the construction of new hotels in tourist towns, which they have chosen, for example, in Amsterdam.

A little less popular are tourist fees for entering the most populous cities, a ban on offering apartments to tourists and a ban on visitors not staying in the city for at least one night.

Greece has announced that homeowners who convert their short-term mortgages to long-term mortgages will be exempt from taxes for three years. As part of the housing shortage plan, Greek Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis announced last week that Greece also plans to raise the tax on short-term rental of housing and ban new licences in central Athens. Residents of the capital have responded positively to the majority of the plans. "It's a big problem because it changes the urban landscape. Where traditional buildings are, they are now modern, designed for Airbnb", said Penny Platanitou, 58, of Athens.

Valentina Reino, one of Airbnb's South European managers, said her company was ready to work with the Greek government on 'targeted and proportionate solutions'. Low wages, high inflation, a lack of real estate and the growth of short-term tourist rentals have fuelled the housing crisis in Greece, which is still recovering from a decade-long debt crisis, particularly affecting low-wage earners, young couples and students.

Greece has so far spent €2.2 billion on subsidising low-interest loans to help young people acquire real estate, with an additional €2 billion to expand the scheme to couples up to the age of 50.
2024-09-13.english_title: One third of Spaniards think there are too many foreign tourists. The European Union has also been involved in the fight against mass tourism.

Raiven s skladbo Mama napovedala drugi del Siren in evropsko turnejo

Kot gostja se ji je pri pesmi pridružila srbska raperka Micka Lifa

Pevka Raiven je v svet poslala novo pesem, ki je po njeno prva, v kateri odkrito spregovori o sebi. Z Mamo naj bi izkazovala globoko hvaležnost svoji evrovizijski družini, obenem pa napovedala drugi del EP-ja Sirene in turnejo po Evropi prihodnje leto.

Med letošnjo Evrovizijo na Švedskem, kjer je Slovenijo zastopala Raiven, se je slovenske predstavnice prijel vzdevek "Mama". Ta je zdaj tudi dobil svojo zvočno podobo. Skladba Mama je tako "intimen hommage", s katerim slovenska glasbenica izkazuje globoko hvaležnost svoji evrovizijski družini.

"To je prva skladba, v kateri odkrito spregovorim o sebi. Prej sem vedno pisala o drugih ženskah, izmišljenih likih ali pa zavijala svoje misli v tančico metafor, da sem omilila neposrednost," je dejala akademsko izobražena glasbenica in poudarila, da je bilo za ustvarjanje tako iskrenega besedila potrebno kar nekaj poguma in samozavesti.

Raiven se je pri skladbi kot gostja pridružila srbska raperka Micka Lifa, ki je znana po tem, da jo navdihujeta hiphop 90. let prejšnjega stoletja in rejverska kultura. "Takoj mi je pritegnila pozornost, tako s svojim vizualnim izrazom kot s samozavestjo, s katero piše besedila," je povedala Raiven in dodala, da sta se povezali prek družbenega omrežja Instagram. "Zdi se, kot da se poznamo že sto let, saj smo se odlično ujeli in si delili enak smisel za humor," je delila Srbkinja, ki je hvaležna, da je tako edinstvena glasbenica, kot je Raiven, prepoznala njeno ustvarjalnost, je zapisano v sporočilu za javnost.

Skupaj sta plod svojega sodelovanja tudi premierno predstavili na Paradi ponosa v Beogradu. Pred večtisočglavo množico je Raiven tudi končala serijo nastopov na letošnjih paradah ponosa – njeno potovanje se je začelo v Zagrebu, nadaljevalo v Ljubljani, vrhunec pa je doseglo v srbski prestolnici, kjer je bučno odmevalo geslo: "Jaz sem, ti si, Veronika."

Prvič zapela tudi v tujem jeziku

Mama predstavlja most med preteklim ustvarjanjem in prihodnostjo Raiven, ki je tokrat prvič v skladbi zapela v slovenščini in srbščini, s čimer je želela izraziti povezanost z občinstvom na območju. "Opazila sem, da občinstvo na Balkanu mojo glasbo dojema nekoliko drugače kot slovensko," je povedala in poudarila, da zato z Mamo želi nagovoriti poslušalce zunaj Slovenije in pokazati, kako jih ceni. "Vsak glasbenik sanja o tem, da bi dosegel čim širše občinstvo, in to je tudi moj cilj," je razložila Raiven, ki je pesem opremila tudi z vizualno podobo.

Pod to se kot režiserka podpisuje Urša Premik, v njem pa sijejo tudi izrazni plesalci in člani baletnega ansambla SNG Opera in balet, ki pod vodstvom koreografa Lukasa Zuschlaga s plesnimi sekvencami raziskujejo mešanico estetike, lepote in občutka moralne ambivalence, kontrast med lepoto in propadom. Estetiko videospota popestrijo tudi edinstvene kreacije, med drugim tudi hrvaškega modnega oblikovalca Juraja Zigmana, čigar obleke nosijo svetovne zvezde, kot so Beyoncé, Nicki Minaj, Christina Aguilera in Cardi B.

Za nekaj časa se bo poslovila od domačega občinstva

Raiven, ki se pod svoje skladbe podpisuje kot avtorica besedil in glasbe, sicer z Mamo subtilno napoveduje drugi del konceptualne avdioepopeje Sirene. "Če sem pri prvem delu EP-ja Sirene pisala o drugih ženskah, v drugem delu pišem o svojih osebnih izkušnjah – o tem, kako je biti ženska v glasbeni industriji," je priznala 28-letna pevka.

Nove skladbe bo premierno predstavila 21. decembra na koncertu v Centru urbane kulture Kino Šiška. Tam bo nastopila z novo koncertno zasedbo, ob kateri bo v osredje postavila edinstven preplet elektronike in vizualne dovršenosti.

Svoj vstop na evropsko koncertno sceno je umetnica, ki bo v okviru turneje Sirene, pt. 1 mešanico elektronskega futurizma in klasičnega godalnega kvarteta prinesla v Piran, Krško, Maribor in Celje, že naznanila v Beogradu. Z drugim delom kratkometražnega albuma se tako prihodnje leto odpravlja tudi na turnejo po Evropi. Med drugim se bo 28. marca ustavila v Zagrebu, 5. aprila bo v Pragi, med 7. in 11. aprilom jo čakajo trije koncerti na Poljskem – v Krakovu, Vroclavu in Varšavi – konec aprila pa bo zavzela oder v Beogradu.

"Evropska turneja je zame največji korak v karieri – poleg Evrovizije. Zelo sem hvaležna za priložnost, da se po Evroviziji še naprej povežem s poslušalci zunaj Slovenije. Čutim globoko hvaležnost in se obenem izjemno veselim," je poudarila Raiven, ki je navdušena nad tem, kako bo med pripravami in samo turnejo še naprej rasla kot umetnica.
2024-09-13.title: Raiven s skladbo Mama napovedala drugi del Siren in evropsko turnejo
2024-09-13.english_content:
Raven with the song "Mama" announced the second part of the Sirens and European tour

She was joined by Serbian rapper Mick Lifa as a guest.

Singer Raiven has sent a new song to the world, her first, that speaks openly about herself. With Mama, she was supposed to express her deep gratitude to her Eurovision family, while also announcing the second part of the EP Sirene and a European tour next year.

During this year's Eurovision Song Contest in Sweden, where Slovenia was represented by Raiven, the Slovenian representatives adopted the nickname "Mama". This one's got its sound now too. The composition of Mama is an "intimate homage" by which a Slovenian musician expresses deep gratitude to her Eurovision family.

"This is the first song I've ever written about myself. I used to write about other women, fictional characters, or wrap my thoughts in a thin metaphor that I disliked being direct", said the scholarly musician, who stressed that creating such an honest lyrics took a little courage and self-confidence.

Raiven was joined as a guest by Serbian rapper Mick Lifa, who is known for being inspired by the 1990s hip hop and riverside culture. "I immediately got her attention, both with her visual expression and the self-confidence with which she writes", Raiven said, adding that they were connected via social networking site Instagram. "It seems like we've known each other for a hundred years, because we've been catching up and sharing the same sense of humor", said the Serb woman, who is grateful that a unique musician like Raiven has recognized her creativity, the message to the public said.

Together, they also premiered the fruit of their cooperation at the Pride Parade in Belgrade. Raiven also finished a series of performances at this year's pride parades before a crowd of thousands. Her journey began in Zagreb, continued in Ljubljana, and peaked in the Serbian capital, where the slogan was loudly chanted: "I am, you are, Veronika".

She sang in a foreign language for the first time.

Mama represents a bridge between the past creation and the future of Raiven, who this time sang in Slovene and Serbian for the first time in a song, thus expressing her connection with the audience in the area. "I noticed that the Balkan audience perceives my music a little differently from Slovenian", she said, stressing that this is why she wants to talk to listeners outside Slovenia and show how much she values them. "Every musician dreams of reaching a wider audience, and that's my goal", Raiven explained, who also provided the song with a visual image.

Under the direction of Urša Premik, the show features prominent dancers and members of the SNG Opera and Ballet ensemble, who, under the direction of choreographer Lukas Zuschlag, explore a mixture of aesthetics, beauty and a sense of moral ambivalence, contrast between beauty and decay. The aesthetics of the video space are also supported by unique creations, including the Croatian fashion designer Jura Zigman, whose clothes are worn by world stars such as Beyoncé, Nicki Minaj, Christina Aguilera and Cardi B.

She'll be saying goodbye to her home audience for a while.

Raiven, who is a songwriter and music composer, also subtly predicts the second part of the concept audio opera Sirene with Mamo. "If I wrote about other women in the first part of the Sirene EP, in the second part I write about my personal experiences  ⁇  about what it's like to be a woman in the music industry", admitted the 28-year-old singer.

The new songs will premiere on December 21 at a concert at the Kino Shishka Urban Culture Center. There she will perform with a new concert crew, putting at the center a unique intersection of electronics and visual perfection.

She has also been a guest artist on the European concert scene. She will be announcing her debut in Belgrade on the Sirene Tour, a mixture of electronic futurism and the classic string quartet. With the second part of the short-lived album, he will also embark on a European tour next year. She will perform in Zagreb on 28 March, Prague on 5 April, Poland on 7 and 11 April, and perform in Belgrade at the end of April.

"The European Tour is the biggest step in my career, next to Eurovision. I am very grateful for the opportunity to continue to connect with audiences outside Slovenia after Eurovision. I feel deeply grateful and at the same time extremely excited", said Raiven, who is excited about how she will continue to grow as an artist during the preparations and the tour itself.
2024-09-13.english_title: Raven with the song "Mama" announced the second part of the Sirens and European tour

Šrilanka: Oče in sin iz Italije oglobljena zaradi kraje metuljev

Dvojec pokončal na stotine insektov

Šrilanške oblasti so očeta in sina iz Italije oglobile za 60 milijonov šrilanških rupij (180.000 evrov), ker sta skušala iz safarija pretihotapiti na stotine endemičnih insektov, vključno z 92 vrstami metuljev.

Čuvaji narodnega parka Jala so maja letos aretirali 68-letnega Luigija Ferrarija in njegovega 28-letnega sina Mattio, potem ko so ju ujeli s kozarci z insekti. Moška sta insekte zvabila z vabami za živali in sta jih nameravala kemično konzervirati z voščenimi moduli, je pokazala preiskava.

V začetku septembra je bila dvojica obsojena zaradi nezakonitega zbiranja, posedovanja in prenosa insektov, ob tem pa jima je bila izrečena najvišja globa za kak zločin nad divjimi živalmi v zgodovini Šrilanke.

Eden od čuvajev parka, Sudživa Nišanta, je za BBC povedal, da je na dan incidenta voznik džipa za safari svojo ekipo čuvajev obvestil, da je ob cesti parkiran "sumljiv avtomobil" in da sta se moška iz vozila napotila v gozd z mrežami za insekte.

Pazniki so locirali vozilo in v prtljažniku odkrili na stotine kozarcev z insekti. "Vsi insekti – več kot 300 – so bili poginuli, ko smo jih našli. Kozarce sta napolnila s kemikalijami," je povedal Nišanta.

Proti Italijanoma so oblasti sprva vložile 810 točk obtožnice, ki pa so jih pozneje zmanjšali na 304. Če do 24. septembra ne plačata globe, jima preti dveletna zaporna kazen. Kot poroča italijanski časnik Corriere della Sera, sta bila oče in sin na dopustu v Šrilanki, v pridržanju pa ostajata že štiri mesece.

Visoka globa kot opozorilo

Narodni park Jala, ki leži na jugovzhodu te otoške azijske države, je eden najbolj priljubljenih parkov v Šrilanki in med drugim dom številčne populacije leopardov, slonov in bivolov.

Luigija Ferrarija, ortopedskega kirurga in specialista za poškodbe gležnjev, njegovi prijatelji opisujejo kot navdušenca nad insekti in je tudi član entomološke zveze v Modeni. Njegovi kolegi v Italiji so na šrilanške oblasti naslovili več prošenj, naj bodo prizanesljivi do njega, pri čemer nekateri tudi trdijo, da metulji, ki jih je ujel, nimajo nobene komercialne vrednosti.

Džagat Gunavardena, strokovnjak za okoljsko pravo, je za BBC povedal, da je visoka globa predvsem opozorilo kriminalcem, ki naj bi jih odvračala od tovrstnih dejanj.
2024-09-13.title: Šrilanka: Oče in sin iz Italije oglobljena zaradi kraje metuljev

Sri Lanka: Father and son in Italy beaten for stealing butterflies

Two killed hundreds of insects

Sri Lankan authorities fined a father and son from Italy 60 million Sri Lankan rupees (US$180,000) for trying to trap hundreds of endemic insects, including 92 species of butterflies, from the safari.

The guards of the Jala National Park arrested Luigi Ferrari, 68, and his 28-year-old son Mattio in May after they caught them with insect glasses. The male insects were attracted by animal invitations and intended to be chemically preserved with fermented modules, the investigation showed.

In early September, two men were convicted of illegal collection, possession and transportation of insects, and were fined the highest amount of wildlife crime in Sri Lanka's history.

One of the park's guards, Sudjiva Nishant, told the BBC that on the day of the incident, a jeep driver for a safari informed his guard team that a "suspicious car" was parked along the road and that the men from the vehicle had headed into the woods with insect nets.

Security personnel located the vehicle and found hundreds of insect vials in the trunk. "All the insects over 300 were dead when we found them. They've filled the cups with chemicals", Nichanta said.

The Italian authorities initially charged the Italians with 810 charges, which were later reduced to 304. If they don't pay the fine by September 24, they face a two-year prison term. According to the Italian newspaper Corriere della Sera, the father and son were on vacation in Sri Lanka and have been detained for four months.

High fine as a warning

Jala National Park, located in the southeast of this island country in Asia, is one of the most popular parks in Sri Lanka and home to a large population of leopards, elephants, and buffaloes.

Luigi Ferrari, an orthopedic surgeon and specialist in ankle injuries, is described by his friends as an insect enthusiast and a member of the Entomological Society of Modena. His colleagues in Italy have sent several requests to the Sri Lankan authorities to be tolerant of him, with some even claiming that the butterflies he has captured have no commercial value.

Jagat Gunavardena, an expert in environmental law, told the BBC that the high fine was primarily a warning to criminals who were supposed to deter them from such acts.
2024-09-13.english_title: Sri Lanka: Father and son in Italy beaten for stealing butterflies

Glasbeni pozdrav se vrača – z gostoma Rudijem Šantlom in Robertom Smolnikarjem

Modrooki in dinamični Primorec iz Pivke, sicer moderator na Radiu Robin, Sandi Morel se še z večjo samozavestjo vrača v studio in pred televizijske gledalce. Tokrat bo tudi pel in sicer že v premierni oddaji Glasbeni pozdrav nocoj ob 20.00.

Glavna gosta bosta nekdanja člana ansambla Štajerskih 7, oba sta izjemna glasbenika. Rudi Šantl, prepoznavni vokal nekdanje zasedbe, ki je deloval tudi v zabavnih zasedbah, je bil 25 let član mariborske Opere in letos šteje že 50 glasbenih let na odru.

Robert Smolnikar je virtuoz na harmoniki in avtor nepozabnih pesmi sestava Štajerskih sedem. Zadnja leta deluje v Triu Roberta Smolnikarja in najlepše pesmi zaokroža z izjemnim sopranom Mojce Bitenc.

Gostja oddaje bo tudi Zala Smolnikar. V oddaji nocoj nastopi tudi zasedba Firbci, ki je letošnje poletje zatresla Slovenijo s pesmijo Brajde.

"Najin seks je boljši, odkar sva omejila rabo telefonov"

Podkast Evolucija užitka v šesti epizodi pete sezone raziskuje pomembnost intimnosti za osrečujoče spolno življenje, kolonizacijo spletne polarizacije in radikalizacije v medosebne odnose, skrajne spletne vplivneže in moškosfero

Posebna raziskovalca Eva in Luka, ki ju interpretirata igralca Manca Dorrer in Domen Valič, v peti sezoni podkasta o spolnosti Evolucija užitka še naprej raziskujeta vpliv digitalizacije na človeško spolnost, seksualnost in intimo.

V šestem delu spoznamo Gala in njegovo doživljanje intime. Gal je star 30 let in je pet let v intimnopartnerski zvezi z Jasno. Odločila sta se, da močno omejita rabo pametnih telefonov, kadar sta skupaj, saj sta ugotovila, da si želita prave intimnosti.

"Zdej mava že neki časa dogovor, da ne uporabljava telefonov, ko sva skupaj. Mislim, sploh na sprehodih. Da sva res skupaj, kadar sva skupaj. In ni blo enostavno odmislit telefona, sploh zaradi službe. Ampak sej vsi vejo. Če je kaj nujnega, me je treba poklicat, drugač pa mejl. Zdej je super, k sm res lahko v trenutku, tukaj in zdaj, k čutim in se zavedam, vidim stvari takšne, kot so v resnici. Pa ne mislim tko, duhovno, ampak čist tko, da sem prisoten."

Kanadska psihologinja dr. Sophie Bergeron je redna profesorica na Univerzi v Montrealu in vodja raziskovalnega centra CRIPCAS, kjer se ukvarjajo s spolnim nasiljem, intimnopartnerskimi odnosi in travmo. Kot pravi, "intimnost ne pomeni le časa, ki ga preživimo skupaj, ampak gre bolj za proces, v katerem si partnerja delita zelo osebne stvari, in način, kako se poslušata".

Odkrili so, da ni pomembno samo, kako se pogovarjata o neprijetnih, temveč tudi o prijetnih izkušnjah in dogodkih. "Če na primer deliš nekaj pozitivnega, nekaj razburljivega, kar se ti je čez dan zgodilo, in se s tabo veseli, potem je to povezano z boljšim spolnim življenjem, kot če se odzove nevtralno ali celo slabše, če reče, ah, to ni nič takega."

Pravi, da je poleg tega pomembna tudi kakovost časa, ki ga osebi v intimnopartnerskem odnosu preživita skupaj. "Mislim, da moraš odložiti telefon, ko si s partnerico, partnerjem. Zagotovo. Pa čeprav je to le dvajset minut, to pa ne bi smelo biti tako težko. Vem, da je za nekatere ljudi to izziv, ampak to resnično verjamem."

Mnenjski mehurčki na spletu polarizirajo in radikalizirajo

Gal se je odločil, da zapre vse profile na družbenih medijih, tudi zaradi prevelike prisotnosti telefona v svojem življenju. Po začetnem obdobju zmedenosti in občutka, da ničesar ne razume, saj ni več ljudi, ki bi mu neprestano razlagali svet, je šele začutil, kako močno sta digitalni in fizični svet prepletena. Tinca Lukan na Fakulteti za družbene vede piše doktorat o vplivništvu v Sloveniji. Pravi, da se je svet vplivništva iz "kaj kupiti" v času pandemije koronavirusne bolezni premaknil v "o čem misliti".

"Predvsem v anglosaškem svetu so to politični vplivneži, ki širijo ideje, to monetizirajo prek direktnih transakcij, niso pa neposredno povezani z oglaševalsko industrijo. So pa povezani s političnimi strankami, tudi v Sloveniji." Pravi, da je veliko odvisno od algoritmov, saj se v Sloveniji na TikToku še ne da oglaševati. "Te vsebine organsko dobijo toliko ogledov, ker so kontroverzne, kar imajo platforme rade, to je rast metrik, ljudje ostajajo na platformah. Ta logika platform podpira take skrajne vsebine, bi lahko rekli," pojasnjuje Tinca Lukan.

Skupnost NoFap in vrnitev diskurza o škodljivosti masturbacije za zdravje

Kakšno pa je vaše spolno življenje? Pišite na evolucijauzitka@rtvslo.si ali popolnoma anonimno izpolnite spletni obrazec, ki ga najdete na tej povezavi.

Gala skrbi za njegovega brata Bineta, saj se je pridružil skupnosti NoFap. Gre za skupnost, ki spodbuja abstinenco od pornografije in samozadovoljevanja. NoFap raziskuje Chiara Perin, doktorska študentka sociologije in metodologije sociološkega raziskovanja na Univerzi v Milanu in Univerzi v Torinu. Raziskuje spol in seksualnost v digitalnem prostoru, spolne in reproduktivne pravice, seksualno delo in konstrukcije moškosti v digitalnih prostorih, tudi skrajne desnice in moškosfere.

Kot pravi, je "NoFap galaksija digitalnih prostorov, v katerih se spodbuja abstinenca od pornografije in masturbacije kot sredstva za premagovanje samodiagnosticirane odvisnosti od pornografije, čezmerne uporabe pornografije in kompulzivnega spolnega vedenja, nanaša pa se tudi širše, bolj na splošno na samo prakso abstinence. Sedež NoFap je kanal r/NoFap na Redditu, v katerem se je število članov podvojilo s 477.000 leta 2020 na 1,1 milijona leta 2022." 

Skupnost NoFap promovira dnevne, tedenske, mesečne in letne izzive abstinence. To dopolnjujejo "s prakso, ki jo imenujejo razstrupljanje od dopamina in odpovedovanje od dejavnosti, ki po njihovem proizvajajo prevelike količine dopamina, kot je gledanje objav na družbenih medijih ali igranje videoiger". Kot razlaga Perin, je ključna ideja 90-dnevni izziv, ki temelji na nenehnem samonadzoru in disciplini. "Ta subjektu (večinoma moškemu) omogoča, da ga ne obvladujejo več seksualni nagoni, kar je mogoče doseči samo z odrekanjem in dolgoročno vzdržnostjo. Pri tem uporabljajo psevdoznanstveni medikalizirani jezik, ki moralne in družbene sodbe/težave glede uživanja samozadovoljevanja/pornografije spremeni v medicinska in patološka vprašanja. Raba pornografije in masturbacija sta tako patologiji ali medicinsko stanje."   

Tudi o tem v novi epizodi podkasta Evolucija užitka, v kateri boste izvedeli več o skupnosti NoFap, povezavi s skupnostjo Incel, »teorijo spola«, kaj je Chad, kaj Giga Chad in kakšne so reprezentacije moškosti v moškosferi. Vabljeni k poslušanju. 

"Živjo, jst sm Gal, star sem 30 let. Z Jasno sva skupaj, kok, pet let? Tik pred korono sva se spoznala. Pa, super nama gre. Ful jo imam rad. In ona mene … no upam, da me ima. Ne ne ne, hahah, sej vem, da me ima. Oba ful velik časa preživiva v službi, velik tut potujeva. Pač, rada delava, imava dobre službe. Veva, da mava v tem smislu ful srečo, k to ni samoumevno, da najdeš delovno okolje, k te podpira, ti pusti velik svobode, hkrati pa dost motivira za delo. Sploh pri teh letih. Z Jasno mava en tak obred, da skupaj začneva dan. Še pred službo greva na sprehod. V gozd. To sva začela počet med kranteno in se je obdržalo. Prov razmišljava, da bi si kupila psa, če se že tok sprehajava, hahaha. No, po moje so sprehodi razlog, da najina zveza funkcionira tok dobr. K se že zjutri poveževa, vidiva, kje sva, vsak zase in skupaj, predebatirava kakšno stvar, malo potelovadiva, se apdejtava, kaj bova počela čez dan … Odkar to počneva, je tut najin seks boljši, k sva na prvem mestu midva in ne več služba."

"Our sex is better since we've restricted our use of phones".

The sixth episode of Season 5 explores the importance of intimacy to a happy sex life, the colonization of online polarization and radicalization into interpersonal relationships, extreme online influencers and the male sphere.

Special Investigator Eva and Luke, played by actors Manca Dorrer and Domen Valić, continue to explore the impact of digitalization on human sexuality, sexuality and intimacy in the fifth season of the sexuality podcast Evolution of Pleasure.

In Part 6, we learn about Gala and his intimate experiences. Gal is 30 years old and has been in an intimate relationship with Jasno for five years. They decided to severely limit their use of smartphones when they were together, realizing that they wanted real intimacy.

"We have been making an agreement for some time now not to use our phones when we are together. I mean, even on a walk. That we're really together when we're together. And it wasn't easy to get rid of the phone, even for work. But the seeds are known to everyone. If you need anything urgent, you need to call me, otherwise email me. So it's great, I can really in the moment, right here and right now, feel and realize, see things as they really are. I don't mean who, spiritually, but who, purely, that I am present".

Canadian psychologist Dr. Sophie Bergeron is a full professor at the University of Montreal and the director of the CRIPCAS research center, which deals with sexual violence, intimate partnerships and trauma. As she says, "intimacy is not just about the time we spend together, but more about the process of partners sharing very personal things and the way they listen to each other".

They found that not only is it important how they talk about unpleasant things but also about pleasant experiences and events. "For example, if you share something positive, something exciting that happened to you during the day, and he's happy with you, then it's related to a better sex life than if he's neutral or even worse, if he says, 'Oh, that's not something like that.'"

He says that the quality of time spent together in an intimate relationship is also important. "I think you should put the phone down when you're with your partner, your partner. I'm sure you will. Even though it's only 20 minutes, it shouldn't be that hard. I know that this is a challenge for some people, but I really believe in it".

The opinion polls on the Internet are polarizing and radicalizing

Gal has decided to close all his social media profiles, even because of the over-presence of the phone in his life. After an initial period of confusion and feeling that he doesn't understand anything because there are no more people to constantly explain the world to him, he has only just felt how deeply intertwined the digital and physical worlds are. Tinca Lukan at the Faculty of Social Sciences is writing a PhD on influence in Slovenia. He says the world of influencers has moved from "what to buy" during the coronavirus pandemic to "what to think".

"Especially in the Anglo-Saxon world, these are political influencers who spread ideas, monetise them through direct transactions, but are not directly connected to the advertising industry. However, they are linked to political parties, including in Slovenia. "He says that a lot depends on algorithms, because in Slovenia, TikToku is not yet ad-supported. "These content get so many views organically because they're controversial, what platforms like is growth metrics, people stay on platforms. This platform logic supports such extreme content, you might say", explains Tinca Lukan.

The NoFap community and the return of discourse on the health hazards of masturbation

What's your sex life like? Please write to evolutionsuzitka@rtvslo.si or complete the online form available at this link anonymously.

Gala's taking care of his brother Binet, who joined the NoFap community. It's a community that encourages abstinence from pornography and self-indulgence. NoFap is researching Chiara Perin, a doctoral student in sociology and methodology of sociological research at the University of Milan and the University of Turin. It explores gender and sexuality in digital space, sexual and reproductive rights, sexual work and the construction of masculinity in digital spaces, including the far right and the male sphere.

As it states, "NoFap is a galaxy of digital spaces that promote abstinence from pornography and masturbation as a means of overcoming self-diagnosed addiction to pornography, excessive use of pornography and compulsive sexual behavior, but also refers more broadly, more generally, to the practice of abstinence itself. NoFap's headquarters is on Reddit's r/NoFap channel, where the number of members has doubled from 477,000 in 2020 to 1,1 million in 2022.'

The NoFap community promotes daily, weekly, monthly and annual abstinence challenges. They supplement this "with a practice they call dopamine detoxification and withdrawal from activities that produce excessive amounts of dopamine, such as watching social media posts or playing video games". As Perin explains, the key idea is a 90-day challenge based on constant self-control and discipline. "This allows the subject (mostly a man) to be free from sexual impulses, which can only be achieved through renunciation and long-term endurance. In doing so, pseudoscientific medicalized language is used to turn moral and social judgments/problems regarding the enjoyment of self-indulgence/pornography into medical and pathological issues. Pornography addiction and masturbation are both pathologies or medical conditions".

Also, in the new episode of the podcast Evolution of Pleasure, where you'll learn more about the NoFap community, the Incel community connection, gender theory, what Chad is, what Giga Chad is, and what male representations are in the male sphere. You're invited to listen to this.

Britanci težko ločijo med ribami: "Jemo jih samo ocvrte"

Svet za morsko skrbništvo ozavešča Britance

Raziskava v Veliki Britaniji je pokazala, da imajo Britanci velike težave ločevati med najbolj osnovnimi vrstami rib, pri čemer jih 40 odstotkov priznava, da so jih jedli "samo ocvrte ali panirane".

Več kot polovica vprašanih v raziskavi sveta za morsko skrbništvo (Marine Stewardship Council) ni vedela, da je kovač (po angleško John Dory) riba, pri čemer ga je 12 odstotkov zamenjalo za britanskega pesnika.

Deset odstotkov vprašanih je menilo, da je trska vrsta psa, šest odstotkov jo je zamenjalo za ameriškega umetnika Jaksona Pollocka. Za osliča (ang. hake) pa jih je podoben delež menil, da je vrtnarsko orodje.

A čeprav Britanci težko ločijo med vrstami rib, jih vseeno dokaj pogosto uživajo – zajeti v raziskavo jih jedo približno petkrat na mesec. A običajno posegajo vedno po istih ribah, 80 odstotkov morske hrane, konzumirane v Veliki Britaniji, pa sestavlja "velikih pet": polenovka, vahnja, losos, tuna in rakci.

V raziskavi jih je 86 odstotkov priznalo, da uživajo le ribe, ki jih poznajo. 60 odstotkov jih nikdar ni poskusilo kovača, ki je sicer pogosta morska riba, podobno, ko gre za romba ali nožničarke.

Mnoge skrbi, da bi imela riba preveč kosti

Samo 39 odstotkov jih je odgovorilo, da bi si upali pripraviti celo ribo. Raziskava se je poglobila tudi v vprašanje, zakaj  kupujejo vedno iste vrste. Nekatere ljudi skrbi cena, spet druge, da jim ne bo všeč okus, medtem ko tretje skrbi, da bo imela riba "preveč kosti" ali da je ne bodo znali pripraviti.

79 odstotkov jih je sicer odgovorilo, da bi bili radi bolj avanturistični, ko gre za ribe in morsko hrano, a je raziskava tudi pokazala, da 43 odstotkov vprašanih ribe uživa samo ocvrte ali panirane.

George Clark, programski direktor MSC-ja, je za Guardian povedal, da raziskava kaže, da je med potrošniki še veliko prostora za izboljšanje znanja o ribah in morski hrani. Tudi zato so septembra objavili pobudo, s katero želijo ljudi "spodbuditi, da poskusijo nekaj drugačnega", še posebej ribe, ulovljene na trajnostni način.

The British have a hard time distinguishing between fish: "We only eat them in the fridge".

The Maritime Board is raising awareness of the British

A survey in the United Kingdom found that Britons have a hard time distinguishing the most basic fish species, with 40 percent admitting to eating "only shrimp or pancakes".

More than half of the Marine Stewardship Council survey respondents did not know that the blacksmith (John Dory) was a fish, with 12 percent confusing him with a British poet.

Ten percent of those polled thought the dog was a dog, and six percent thought it was an American artist named Jackson Pollock. For hake, a similar proportion thought they were a garden tool.

But while the British have a hard time distinguishing between fish species, they still enjoy them quite often  ⁇  being caught eating them about five times a month in the survey. But they usually always reach for the same fish, and 80 percent of the seafood consumed in Britain is made up of the "big five": salmon, cod, salmon, tuna, and shrimp.

In the survey, 86 percent admitted to eating only fish they knew. Sixty percent have never tried a blacksmith, a common fish, similar to a rhombus or a dagger.

Many people worry that fish will have too many bones

Only 39 percent of respondents said they would even hope to cook a fish. The research also explored why they always buy the same species. Some people worry about the price, others about the taste, while others worry about the fish being "too bony" or unable to cook.

While 79 percent of respondents said they would like to be more adventurous about fish and seafood, the survey also showed that 43 percent of fishes only enjoy snacks or spices.

George Clark, MSC's programme director, told the Guardian that research shows that there is still plenty of room for consumers to improve their knowledge of fish and seafood. That is why they launched an initiative in September to "encourage people to try something different", especially fish caught in a sustainable way.

Gušti pred edinstvenim koncertom v Križankah: "Igrali bomo skladbe, ki so zaznamovale generacijo"

Pogovor z Miho Guštinom - Guštijem

Miha Guštin - Gušti je v štirih desetletjih glasbenega udejstvovanja gotovo pustil neizbrisen pečat. Avtor nekaterih največjih uspešnic rokovske scene bo v Križankah skupaj s prijatelji, kot pravi, pričaral "edinstven koncert, ki se ne bo ponovil".

Gušti je vzdevek, ki je sinonim za nekatere največje uspešnice slovenske glasbe. Potem ko je z zasedbo Big Foot Mama izkusil slovenski glasbeni Olimp, zdaj ustvarja skladbe, ki ga izpopolnjujejo. Za MMC je spregovoril o glasbenih začetkih, o obdobju z zasedbo Big Foot Mama in glasbenem navdihu, pa tudi o uspehu sina Krisa (Joker Out) in o letošnjem samostojnem albumu Ljubezen osvobaja.

Več si preberite v spodnjem pogovoru.

Kot začetek vaše glasbene poti štejete v bistvu prve resne glasbene korake – osnovnošolski tamburaški orkester. Vam je osnovnošolsko preigravanje dalo kakšno pomembno lekcijo, ki se je držite tudi po 40 letih glasbene kariere? 

V orkestrih se naučiš poslušati tudi druge, ne samo sebe. Nisem pa takrat niti v sanjah vedel, da bom kdaj živel od glasbe. Pri trinajstih letih mi je potem oče kupil kitaro, in to je bil zame že veliko bolj resen instrument. Takrat sem hotel glasbo ne le poslušati, temveč tudi slišati in od takrat štejem 40 let.

Kdaj ste bili prepričani, da bo glasba vaše življenje?

Dolgo časa sem potreboval, da sem lahko spoznal, da bo glasba moje življenje. Najprej sem samo po zabavah igral kitaro in prepeval priredbe. Tudi z Big Foot Mamo smo sprva preigravali le coverje, in to nam je bilo to čisto dovolj, nismo razmišljali naprej. Ko smo bili že lep čas predskupina Lovšinovih Sokolov, sem pomislil, da je treba imeti svoje pesmi, če želiš, da te začnejo jemati resneje. Tako sem napisal prvi komad, in je bil ljudem všeč, nato drugega, tretjega ... Spoznal sem, da to znam delati. Potem smo začeli razmišljati v tej smeri, in izkazalo se je, da to počnemo zelo dobro. Po tretji plošči, kjer je gor Led s severa, sem lahko pustil službo geodeta in od takrat naprej sem samo glasbenik.

Kakšen vpliv je imel Pero Lovšin na začetke zasedbe Big Foot Mama? Katera skladba je bila prvi prestop od glasbe, ki je podobna njegovi, do pristnega in unikatnega zvoka, kot ga poznamo danes?

Ja, bil sem tak oboževalec Petra Lovšina, da je bil tudi prvi komad po imenu Prid rajš k men, izšel je na neki skupni kompilaciji mladih slovenskih bendov, močno podoben Lovšinovim pesmim. Meni se niti ni zdelo, ampak so mi drugi povedali, da je prevelika podobnost s Petrom Lovšinom. Potem sem vedno imel to v glavi in prva plošča Nova pravila je že imela veliko bolj naš, bigfootovski zvok.

Led s severa – verjetno ena izmed največjih, če ne kar največja uspešnica BFM. Je bila na neki način tudi vstopnica benda v sfero največjih v Sloveniji?

Ja, Led s severa je bil nekako prelomnica, ko smo dokazali, da znamo še kaj več kot le tri akorde in kvazipankovski zvok. Ta komad je nekako šel čez publiko rokenrola in smo dobili tudi širše, drugačno poslušalstvo.

Za dve veliki uspešnici, Črn tulipan in Led s severa vas je navdihnila vaša žena, veliko vlogo pa je imela tudi skladba Creep (Radiohead). Nekoliko nenavadna kombinacija, mar ne?

Ja, za obe pesmi me je navdihnila Chantal, zdaj moja žena. Creep, pesem  Radioheadov, pa mi je bila neke vrste razodetje, da je lahko pesem lepa, tudi če je zamorjena in kanček depresivna. Kombinacija vsega tega me je očarala in mi dala navdih za komad Led s severa. Črn tulipan je pa pač nažgan komad, poln hrepenenja po črnem tulipanu.

Zakaj vaša glasba sprva ni bila všeč ljubljanski publiki?

Mi smo začeli z bendom ravno v času, ko se je v Ljubljani začel razvijati hiphop, rap, funk in podobno. Mi smo bili takrat po zvoku in preveč rokersko naravnani in smo bili za ljubljansko sceno nekako pasé.

Se zgodi, da ste z bendom največje uspešnice, ki ste jih morali igrati vedno in povsod, začeli zaradi ponavljanja morda celo prezirati? Se da tudi lastne glasbe naveličati?

Jaz osebno lastne glasbe, ko je enkrat plošča zunaj, ne poslušam več, ampak ko si na odru in ko si v zanosu s publiko, je to užitek, še posebej ko vidiš žar v očeh poslušalstva, kako pojejo in norijo.

Gotovo pa ste se najedli klasičnega zvoka Big Foot Mame, oziroma kot mu pravite “garažnega zvoka”. Odločili ste se, da daste prednost lastnemu ustvarjanju, pa čeprav ste bili v nekem obdobju prepričani, da boste pri BFM do konca. Kako težko je ponovno prodirati na glasbeno sceno, vsaj kar se občinstva tiče, ko si enkrat že bil na samem vrhu? 

Če se spreminjaš, vedno nekako šokiraš. Nekomu je všeč, pretežno pa potrebuje poslušalstvo nekaj časa, da te sprejme drugačnega. V glasbi jaz temu rečem, da se je treba vedno na novo dokazovati. V kreativnem procesu pa, da se je treba na novo izumljati.

Kako težko je bilo sprejeti odločitev, da zapustite BFM?

Meni je bilo to zelo težko. S temi fanti sem preživel od od dvajsetega do tridesetega leta. Lahko se pohvalim, da sem dejansko doživel rock'n'roll. In to z Grego, Danijem, Jožetom in Alenom. Mislil sem, da je to to in da bom do konca življenja lahko počel te stvari. No, izkazalo se je, da me je začel zanimati drugačen zvok in po dolgem premisleku sem se odločil za samostojno pot.

Po dveh epizodah v ozadju (BFM in Polona Kasal) ste vi v središču pozornosti. Besedila ostajajo podobno domiselna in kakovostna, glasbeni slog popolnoma drugačen. Kako ste se ob soju žarometov počutili na začetku solistične glasbene poti in kako se zdaj?

Na začetku je bila ta pot veliko bolj evforična in kričava, predvsem odziv publike, ker so bili prvi oboževalci pač mladina. Zdaj so tudi oni z menoj zrasli in imajo svoj način izražanja občudovanja.

Letos maja ste po trinajstih letih predstavili prvi novi album. Je to vrhunec vaše glasbene ustvarjalnosti do zdaj?

Vedno je vrhunec, ko izdaš novo ploščo, vsaj upaš, da je to, kar si ustvaril, korak, ki ga prej še nisi storil. Za nekoga so vrhunec hiti Big Footov, za nekoga komadi iz časa Guštija in Polona, za nekoga moje sedanje ustvarjanje. Sam si želim, da bi bil še kdaj kakšen vrhunec.Si pa poslušalstvo vedno izbere svoj čas favoritov.

Tudi sin Kris se je glasbeno proslavil z astronomskim vzponom zasedbe Joker Out. Vas je njihov sunkoviti uspeh presenetil?

Seveda nas je vse presenetil, kako sunkovit prodor so si ustvarili. Neverjetno, a povsem zasluženo. Nove generacije nimajo zavor in imajo neizmeren talent.

Obstajajo kakšne pasti pri rokenrolu kot življenjskem slogu? Gotovo ste ga zasuli z nasveti nekoga, ki je to pot zvezdništva že prehodil.

Največji glasbeni mojster ali zasedba vseh časov?Uf ... Beatles, Abba, Sting ...Najboljši album na slovenski sceni?Katere barve je tvoj dan (Dan D).Glasbena inspiracija po 40-letni karieri?Dobra glasba in trenutki, ki me dvignejo in zadenejo.Kdo bo naslednji veliki izvajalec na slovenski glasbeni sceni?Upam, da bo še veliko bendov, kot so Joker Out, MRFY ali Jet Black Dimonds.Vaš največji glasbeni uspeh?Da lahko živim in preživim glasbe.Vaš največji glasbeni spodrsljaj?Ko dobiš ta superioren občutek, da je vse, kar narediš hudo dobro, pa ni res.S kom bi najraje delili oder v Križankah?Predvsem si želim deliti oder s svojimi prijatelji.

Pa niti ne, nisem mu solil pameti, kaj je potrebno in kaj ne. So drugi časi in stvari, ki smo se jih mi izogibali, so zdaj dobrodošle. Na primer, mi ne bi nikoli šli na izbor za Evrovizijo, oni pa so, in prav so imeli.

Kako ste zadovoljni z odzivom poslušalcev na nove komade? Kakšno vlogo pri promociji igrajo zdaj že mogoče celo nekoliko zastareli mediji kot so radijske postaje in kakšno sodobne platforme za predvajanje glasbe?

Novi komadi postajajo prepoznavni, in želim si, da bo kakšen od njih tudi spadal kdaj med slovenske zimzelene uspešnice. Seveda uporabljam vse te platforme, ker se moram in se tudi spopadam s tem. Je pa res, da je moja publika predvsem povezana s klasičnimi mediji, kot so televizija, radio in Youtube. Se pa tudi to spreminja. Facebook in instagram sta tukaj nekje, kar se moje publike tiče. Profila na Tik toku pa sploh nimam.

Kaj lahko oboževalci pričakujejo v četrtek v Križankah? Celoten presek dolge glasbene kariere, zgolj samostojne skladbe ali morda kako presenečenje?

V Križankah bo enkraten dogodek, in dvomim, da se bo kdaj ponovil. Bo predvsem presek mojih uspešnic z originalnimi pevci. Nekaj bo tudi novih skladb, a predvsem bomo igrali pesmi, ki so mene in generacije zaznamovale na slovenski glasbeni sceni. Grega Skočir bo pel hite iz obdobja Big Foot Mama, Polona Kasal pride iz Londona izključno, da zapoje najine uspešnice: Vedno zame, Makova polja in Mine leto. S Tomijem Megličem bova pričarala košček glasbenega dialoga 1NA1, na odru pa bodo tudi Joker Out in Leyre.
2024-09-13.title: Guštiprededinstvenimkoncertomvkrižankah:igrali bomo skladbe, ki so zaznamovale generacijo
2024-09-13.english_content:
Guests before a unique concert in Krzyžanka: "We're going to play songs that have marked a generation"

A conversation with Miho Gustin - Gustin

Miha Guštin - Gušti has certainly left an indelible mark on his four decades of musical participation. The author of some of the greatest hits of the rock scene will, as he says, give a "unique concert that will not be repeated" in Križanka together with friends.

Gušti is a nickname that is synonymous with some of the biggest hits in Slovenian music. After experiencing the Slovenian musical Olympus with the Big Foot Mama, he now creates songs that perfect him. He spoke to MMC about his musical beginnings, his time with Big Foot Mama and his musical inspiration, as well as the success of his son Chris (Joker Out) and this year's solo album Love Is Liberating.

Read more in the conversation below.

As the beginning of your musical journey, you are essentially taking the first serious musical steps of an elementary school drumming band. Did your high school recital teach you any important lessons that you still hold onto after 40 years of music?

In orchestras, you learn to listen to others, not just yourself. But I didn't even know I'd ever live off music. When I was 13, my father bought me a guitar, and it was already a much more serious instrument for me. I wanted to listen to music not only then, but also then, and I've been counting 40 years since then.

When were you sure that music would be your life?

It took me a long time to realize that music would be my life. At first, I only played guitar after parties and sang at events. Big Foot Mom and I were just playing cover at first, and that was enough for us, we didn't think ahead. When we were the lovely days of the Lovshin Rockers, I thought you had to have your own songs if you wanted to get taken more seriously. So I wrote the first piece, and people liked it, then the second, third... I realized I could do that. And then we started thinking about it, and it turned out that we were doing very well. After the third album, where the ice from the north is up, I was able to quit my job as a geodet and from then on, I'm just a musician.

What influence did Pero Lovshin have on the early days of Big Foot Mama? What was the first step from music similar to his to the authentic and unique sound we know today?

Yes, I was such a fan of Peter Lovshin that the first piece called "Prid Rasz k mi" was also released on a compilation of young Slovenian bands, very similar to Lovshin's songs. I didn't think so, but others told me he was too much like Peter Lovshin. Then I always had this in my head and the first record, New Rules, had a much more of our bigfoot sound.

Ice from the North is probably one of the biggest, if not the biggest, hit BFM's. Was it also somehow a ticket to the biggest bands in Slovenia?

Yes, Ice from the North was a kind of breakthrough when we proved we knew more than just three chords and quasi-panch sound. This piece kind of went beyond the rock and roll audience and we got a wider, different audience.

For two big hits, Black Tulip and Ice from the North, your wife inspired you, and the song Creep (Radiohead) played a big part. Some kind of weird combination, right?

Yeah, I was inspired by Chantal, now my wife, for both songs. And Creep, the Radiohead song, was a kind of revelation to me that a song can be beautiful even if it's tired and a little depressing. The combination of all this fascinated me and inspired me to make a piece of ice from the North. But the black tulip is a burning piece, full of cravings for a black tulip.

Why was your music not liked by the beloved audience at first?

We started the band at a time when hip-hop, rap, funk and the like were developing in Ljubljana. We were so sound-oriented and too rock-oriented at the time, and we were kind of pasé for the love scene.

Does it happen that you and your greatest hits band, which you had to play all the time and all the time, have become disdainful of repetition, perhaps even contempt? Can you get tired of your own music?

I personally don't listen to my own music once the record is out, but when you're on stage and you're in the audience, it's a pleasure, especially when you see the glow in the eyes of the audience, how they sing and go crazy.

But you must have eaten the classic Big Foot Mame sound, or what you call the "garage sound". You've decided to give priority to your own creation, even though you've been convinced for some time that you'll be at BFM for the rest of your life. How hard is it to get back on the music scene, at least as far as the audience is concerned, once you've been at the top?

You change, you always kind of shock. Some people like it, but mostly it takes a little listening time to get you to a different person. In music, I tell it, you always have to prove yourself. But in the creative process, you have to reinvent yourself.

How difficult was it to make the decision to leave BFM?

It was very hard for me. I lived with these guys from the 20s to the 30s. I can boast that I actually experienced rock 'n' roll. And this one with Greg, Dan, JoJet, and Allen. I thought that's it, and I thought I could do these things for the rest of my life. Well, it turns out I was beginning to be interested in a different sound, and after much thought, I decided to go my own way.

After two episodes in the background (BFM and Polon Kasal) you're in the spotlight. The lyrics remain similarly inventive and quality, with a completely different musical style. How did you feel about the light bulb at the beginning of your solo music career, and how do you feel now?

At first, the route was much more euphoric and shouting, especially the audience's response, because the first fans were young people. Now they've grown up with me and they have their own way of expressing admiration.

This May, you released your first new album in 13 years. Is this the peak of your musical creativity so far?

It's always the highlight of a new album, at least hoping that what you've created is a step you haven't taken before. For someone, the top of the Big Foot rush, for someone, a piece from the time of Gustav and Polon, for someone, my current creation. I wish I could be a top-notch guy again. But you're always choosing your time favorites.

His son Kris also became famous for his musical career, with the astronomical rise of the Joker Out crew. Did their sneaky success surprise you?

Of course, we were all surprised by how much of a big breakthrough they've made. Amazing, but well deserved. The new generation has no brakes and has unlimited talent.

Are there any traps in rock 'n' roll as a lifestyle? You must have gotten him off the hook with the advice of someone who's already gone down this path of stardom.

The greatest musical master or the greatest musical ensemble of all time? - What? The Beatles, Abba, the Sting... The best album on the Slovenian scene? What color is your day? Musical inspiration after a 40-year career? Good music and moments that lift and strike me. Who's going to be the next big performer on the Slovenian music scene? I hope there's more bands like Joker Out, MRFY, or Jet Black Dimonds. Your greatest musical achievement? That I could live and survive music. Your biggest musical flop? When you get this superior feeling that everything you do is really good, it's not true. Who would you rather share the stage with in the Crusades? I want to share the stage with my friends.

I didn't even get him to know what was necessary and what wasn't. There are other times, and the things we've been avoiding are now welcome. For example, we would never go to the Eurovision Song Contest, but they did, and they were right.

How satisfied are you with the audience's response to the new pieces? What role do even a somewhat outdated media, such as radio stations and modern music platforms, now play in promoting music?

New pieces are becoming recognizable, and I wish one of them would also fall among the Slovenian grey hits. Of course, I use all these platforms because I have to, and I have to deal with, this. But it's true that my audience is mainly connected to classical media like TV, radio and YouTube. But that's changing, too. Facebook and Instagram are somewhere around here that concerns my audience. I don't have a profile on Tik Tok at all.

What can worshippers expect on Thursday in the Crusades? A whole long musical career, just a solo piece or maybe a surprise?

There's gonna be a unique event in the Crusades, and I doubt it's ever gonna happen again. It's gonna be a crossover of my hits with the original singers. There will be some new songs, but above all, we will play songs that have marked me and generations on the Slovenian music scene. Greg Jumpy will be singing the Big Foot Mama hits, Polon Kasal comes from London exclusively to sing our hits: Always Me, Tommy and I are gonna be doing a piece of 1NA1's musical dialogue, and we're gonna be doing Joker Out and Leyre on stage.
2024-09-13.english_title: We're gonna play songs that have marked a generation.

Nio onvo L60 z nižjo ceno izziva teslo model Y

Nov poskus podjetja Nio

Avtomobilski proizvajalec Nio bo začel serijsko proizvodnjo znamke Onvo na Kitajskem. Električni avtomobil L60 naj bi tudi na račun nižje cene konkuriral Teslinemu modelu Y. Na voljo bo tudi v Evropi.

Nio je avtomobilska znamka, ki se želi vse od leta 2021 naprej uveljaviti na evropskem avtomobilskem trgu. V prvih sedmih mesecih je bilo v Nemčiji na novo registriranih le 266 vozil. V ponudbi so premijski limuzini ET5 in ET7 ter športni terenci EL6 , EL7 in ES8.

Večji zagon prodaje Nio načrtuje na Kitajskem, kjer bo predstavil nova vozila, ki jih lahko pozneje s ciljem povečevanja tržnega deleža pričakujemo tudi v Evropi. Kompaktni onvo L60 od avgusta izdelujejo v Niovi tovarni v Hefeju. Kitajskim strankam naj bi jih dobavili letos.Onvo je Nieva blagovna znamka. Vozila so izdelana z uporabo nove arhitekture proizvajalca, vendar pa lahko še vedno uporabljajo postaje za menjavo baterij, ki so značilne za proizvajalca Nio.

Nio z onvo L60 meri na kupce Tesline uspešnice model Y. Na Kitajskem je osnovni L60 po poročanju Automobilwoche skoraj 3500 evrov pod osnovno ceno Teslinega tekmeca.
