Na najpomembnejšem svetovnem tekmovanju mladih kuharjev kar trije Slovenci

Slovenijo bodo na Malti zastopali Boštjan Volk, Matija Cotič in Pablo Donatio Falcon

Na najpomembnejšem svetovnem tekmovanju mladih chefov San Pellegrino Young Chef bodo letos Slovenijo zastopali kar trije mladi kuharji. To so Boštjan Volk iz Gostišča Volk v Plešivcu, Matija Cotič iz Koče na Kokoši in Pablo Donatio Falcon iz Hiše Franko.

Na regionalnem finalu, ki bo potekal 25. in 26. novembra na Malti, bo Slovenija imela tudi sodnika, to nalogo bo opravljal kuharski mojster Igor Jagodic iz ljubljanske restavracije Strelec, nosilke Michelinove zvezdice.

San Pellegrino Young Chef Academy je svetovna pobuda za odkrivanje in mentorstvo nadarjenih mladih kuharjev, starih do 30 let. Na tekmovanje se prijavi na tisoče mladih, saj s tem dobijo priložnost, da se povežejo in učijo od najvplivnejših predstavnikov svetovne gastronomije ter na svetovnem odru pokažejo svojo kulinarično ustvarjalnost.

Prvi izbor na podlagi pisnih prijav opravijo strokovnjaki prestižne Mednarodne šole italijanske kulinarike ALMA. Letos je to selekcijo prestalo 165 kandidatov z vsega sveta, ki so se s tem uvrstili v 15 regijskih finalov.

Slovenija s tremi, Grčija z enim, Hrvaška brez

Iz Slovenije se je tokrat na tekmovanje prijavilo devet kandidatov, za regijski finale so bili izbrani trije.

"To je res neverjetno, saj našo regijsko konkurenco predstavljajo precej večje države, med njimi Hrvaška in Grčija. Slednja bo imela v regijskem finalu enega predstavnika, naša južna soseda žal nobenega. Če stvar pogledamo globalno, pa je še bolj neverjetna: tekmovalci iz države z dvema milijonoma prebivalcev bodo predstavljali skoraj dva odstotka vseh tekmovalcev," je pomen tega uspeha orisala Lili Vodušek, vodja znamke San Pellegrino za Slovenijo.

Poleg Slovenije in Grčije bodo svoje predstavnike na Malti imeli še Madžarska, Izrael, Romunija, Poljska, Srbija in Malta.

Naši tekmovalci bodo sodnikom postregli vipavo, domači gozd in poezijo

Slovenski mladi kuharji se že pripravljajo na regijski finalni izziv, vsak od njih pa je navdih za tekmovalno jed iskal v sebi in svojem domačem okolju. Za žirijo so namreč poleg recepta in kuharskih tehnik izjemno pomembne tudi zgodba, vrednote in osebno prepričanje chefa, ki jih jed izraža.

Matija Cotič iz Koče na Kokoši, ki mu bo kot mentor na tekmovanju stal ob strani Tomaž Kavčič, je žirijo prepričal z jedjo, ki jo navdihuje tradicija Vipavske doline, glavna zvezda pa je repa tropinka.

"Moja jed je poklon tradiciji in trajnostni naravnanosti Vipavske doline. Jota iz repe tropinke je postrežena v aluminijasti posodici, v sebi skriva okuse in spomine žetve. Spremljajo jo kožna klobasa krotegin, kruh iz moke grozdnih pešk in prekajeno olje grozdnih pešk. Jed je preplet različnih tradicionalnih in sodobnih pristopov in tehnik, vsak ugriz pa zbudi spomine na družino, vinograde in naše vrednote," je svoj krožnik opisal Matija Cotič.

Boštjanu Volku iz Gostišča Volk, ki je tudi lanski prejemnik nagrade evropski mladi chef leta 2023, bo kot mentor svetoval Jure Tomič. Boštjanov navdih predstavlja domači gozd.

"Lani sem na obrobju gozda pri gostilni posadil bučna semena. Ko sem šel nekega jutra pogledat, kako rastejo buče, sem na eni videl ugriz, ki ga ima v naših krajih le divjad. Tako sem dobil navdih za tekmovalno jed, v kateri sem povezal jelena, bučo in gobe, ki skupaj predstavljajo naravne gozdne okuse."

Glavni krožnik sestavljajo natrgano jelenovo meso, bučni pire, okisana čebulica in čipka bučnih semen, jed pa dopolnjujeta še maslo in biskvit bučnega olja ter jelenova juha, posodica iz gob in ocvrtek buñuelo temnega piva s kremo jelenovega kostnega mozga.

Iz Hiše Franko jed s tremi verzi

Slovenijo bo na tekmovanju zastopal tudi mladenič, ki ni Slovenec, saj ima španske, urugvajske, venezuelske in italijanske korenine, a dela v Sloveniji. Pablo Donatio Falcon je mlajši chef pri Ani Roš v Hiši Franko, njegova mentorica bo tamkajšnja vodja kuhinje, Američanka Yvonne Simon, Pablov navdih pa predstavlja poezija.

"Gastronomija in poezija predstavljata dva izmed najlepših izrazov, ki jih je človeštvo razvilo za komunikacijo. Obe nas opominjata na lepoto, ki nas obdaja, in na odpornost človeškega duha. To povezavo sem zajel v koncept haikuja, japonske poezije v treh verzih," je svoj navdih za jed, ki jo sestavljajo trije verzi, opisal Pablo Donatio Falcon.

Prvi verz je sestavljen iz hrustljavega krekerja iz stročnic s kislo smetano z medenim cvetnim prahom, emulzije bučnih semen, zelenega kardamoma ter sezonskih zelišč in rož.

Drugi verz predstavlja gozdna infuzija iz brinovih jagod in borovih iglic, ki pomaga očistiti brbončice ter povezuje okuse iz prvega verza s tistimi iz tretjega, ki je sestavljen iz srnjaka z bučo in zemeljskih okusov tartufove kreme, črnega kardamoma in črnega česnovega misa.

Na regijskem finalu prejšnjega tekmovanja San Pellegrino Young Chef smo se Slovenci odlično odrezali, predstavljala sta nas zdajšnji sodnik v Masterchefu Mojmir Šiftar in mladi Žiga Koprivc, ki je prejel nagrado San Pellegrina za družbeno odgovornost.

Svetovni finale bo konec leta 2025 v Milanu.
2024-09-26.title: Na najpomembnejšem svetovnem tekmovanju mladih kuharjev kar trije Slovenci
2024-09-26.english_content:
At the most important world competition of young chefs three Slovenes

Slovenia will be represented in Malta by Boshtjan Wolf, Matja Cotic and Pablo Donatio Falcon

In the most important world competition of young chefs, the San Pellegrino Young Chef, Slovenia will be represented by three young chefs. These are the Boast Wolf from the Wolf's Inn in the Dance, Mattia Cotic from the Chicken House and Pablo Donatio Falcon from House of Franco.

The regional final, which will take place on 25 and 26 November in Malta, will also feature a judge from Slovenia, who will be judged by chef Igor Jagodic of the Michelin starred Archer restaurant in Ljubljana.

The San Pellegrino Young Chef Academy is a global initiative to discover and mentor talented young chefs under the age of 30. Thousands of young people enter the competition, giving them the opportunity to connect and learn from the world's most influential gastronomists and showcase their culinary creativity on the world stage.

The first selection is made on the basis of written applications by experts of the prestigious International School of Italian Culinary ALMA. This year, 165 candidates from around the world have qualified for the regional finals.

Slovenia with three, Greece with one, Croatia without

Nine candidates from Slovenia applied for the competition, three of whom were selected for the regional finals.

"This is truly amazing, because our regional competition is represented by much larger countries, including Croatia and Greece. The next one will have one representative in the regional final, our southern neighbor none. Looking at the global picture, it is even more incredible: competitors from a country of two million people will represent almost two percent of all competitors", said Lili Vodušek, San Pellegrino's head of Slovenia.

In addition to Slovenia and Greece, Hungary, Israel, Romania, Poland, Serbia and Malta will also have their representatives in Malta.

Our contestants will serve the judges with sparkling wine, native forests and poetry.

The Slovenian young chefs are already preparing for the regional final challenge, and each of them has been looking for inspiration for competitive food in themselves and their home environment. In addition to the recipe and cooking techniques, the story, values, and personal convictions expressed by the chef are of great importance to the jury.

Matja Cotič from Koča na Kokos, who will mentor him at the competition alongside Tomaž Kavčič, convinced the jury with a meal inspired by the tradition of the Vipava Valley, and the main star is the tail of the tropic.

"My food is a gift to the tradition and the sustainable alignment of the Vipava Valley. The iodine from the beard of a tropical plant is preserved in an aluminum container, hiding in it the taste and memories of the harvest. It is accompanied by a leather crotch, a bread made from grapefruit flour and a crushed grapefruit oil. The dish is a mixture of traditional and modern approaches and techniques, and each bite brings back memories of family, vineyards and our values", said Matija Cotič, describing his dish.

The European Youth Chef Award for 2023 will be presented to the host of the Gostišta Volk's Bosztjan Volk, who will be mentored by Jure Tomič. The inspiration for the Bosnian is the forests of the country.

"Last year, I planted a seedling at a restaurant on the edge of the forest. One morning, when I went to see the bushes growing, I saw a bite on one of them that only wild animals have in our area. So I was inspired to make a competitive dish that combined deer, buckwheat, and mushrooms, all of which together represent the natural flavors of the forest".

The main dish consists of ground deer meat, buckwheat, sour onion and buckwheat chips, and is complemented by butter and biscuits of buckwheat oil and deer soup, a mushroom dish and a buñuelo of dark beer with deer bone marrow cream.

From the house, Frank eats three versions.

Slovenia will also be represented by a young man who is not Slovenian, as he has Spanish, Uruguayan, Venezuelan and Italian roots but works in Slovenia. Pablo Donatio Falcon is the younger chef at Ani Roche in House Franco, his mentor will be the kitchen manager there, the American Yvonne Simon, and Pablo's inspiration will be poetry.

"Gastronomy and poetry are two of the most beautiful expressions humanity has ever developed for communication. Both remind us of the beauty that surrounds us and the resilience of the human spirit. I have captured this connection into the concept of haiku, Japanese poetry in three verses", Pablo Donatio Falcon described his inspiration for the three-verse meal.

The first verse consists of a cotton-cropped crackers made of citrus fruits with acidic cream with honey flower powder, emulsions of buffalo seeds, green cardamom and seasonal herbs and flowers.

The second verse is a forest infusion of pine and pine needles to help purify the larvae and to link the flavors of the first verse with those of the third, which consists of a bunch of larvae and the earthly flavors of tartuff cream, black cardamom and black garlic mass.

In the regional final of the previous competition San Pellegrino Young Chef, we Slovenians did well, represented by the current Masterchef judge Mojmir Shiftar and the young Ziga Koprivc, who received the San Pellegrino Award for Social Responsibility.

The World Cup will be held in Milan at the end of 2025.
2024-09-26.english_title: At the most important world competition of young chefs three Slovenes

Med Mehiko in Španijo obujen kolonialni spor, ker kralj ni povabljen na inavguracijo

Na seznamu povabljencev tudi ruski predsednik Vladimir Putin

Med Mehiko in Španijo je izbruhnil spor, ker španski kralj Filip VI. ni bil povabljen na inavguracijo novoizvoljene predsednice Claudie Sheinbaum.

V Madridu so odločitev mehiške vlade kritizirali kot nesprejemljivo. V Mehiki pa vztrajajo pri opravičilu zaradi škode, povzročene s španskim osvajanjem Amerik.

Mehika je na inavguracijo Claudie Sheinbaum, prve ženske na mestu predsednice te države, ki bo v torek, že julija povabila Sancheza, ne pa tudi španskega kralja.

A špansko zunanje ministrstvo je zdaj sporočilo, da na inavguracijo ne bodo poslali svojega predstavnika, saj na dogodek niso povabili kralja Filipa VI., kar da je nesprejemljivo.

Španski premier Pedro Sanchez je izrazil obžalovanje zaradi "nesprejemljive in nerazumljive" odločitve prihajajoče mehiške vlade in pojasnil, da želijo s tem izraziti protest.

"Španija in Mehika sta bratski državi – in zato se izključitev našega kralja zdi nesprejemljiva," je dejal novinarjem. "Ne pozabimo, da je bil ta kralj na prav vseh inavguracijah najprej kot princ in nato kot kralj. Zato ne moremo sprejeti njegove izključitve in zato smo sporočili mehiški vladi, da na inavguraciji ne bo nobenega španskega predstavnika.”

Sheinbaum je v izjavi v sredo pojasnila, da monarha niso povabili, ker se ni odzval na pismo trenutnega predsednika Andresa Manuela Lopeza Obradorja iz leta 2019, v katerem ga je pozval, naj se javno opraviči za špansko osvajanje Amerik.

Claudia Sheinbaum: "Potrebujemo spoštovanje"

Pismo je predsednik, ki je bil v svojem mandatu večkrat kritičen do Španije, poslal ob 200. obletnici neodvisnosti Mehike, v njem pa zahteval javno priznanje krivic, ki jih je povzročilo špansko osvajanje. Zunanje ministrstvo v Madridu je takrat zavrnilo zahtevo za opravičilo.

Sheinbaum je bila še kritična, da do srede niso dobili odgovora od kralja in ker je del pisma pricurljal v medije. Je pa zavrnila namige, da zaradi spora prekinjajo vezi s Španijo. "Seveda ne, ampak potrebujemo spoštovanje," je dejala.

Prepričana je, da bi odnosom koristila prenovljena zgodovinska perspektiva v skladu z razvojem obeh narodov.

Seznam povabljenih na inavguracijo je sicer že pred tem razburila del javnosti, na njem je med drugim tudi ruski predsednik Vladimir Putin.

A colonial dispute between Mexico and Spain arose because the King was not invited to the inauguration

Russian President Vladimir Putin is also on the guest list.

A dispute broke out between Mexico and Spain because King Philip VI of Spain was not invited to the inauguration of the newly elected President Claudie Sheinbaum.

In Madrid, the Mexican government's decision was criticized as unacceptable. In Mexico, however, they continue to apologize for the damage caused by the Spanish conquest of the Americas.

Mexico is hosting the inauguration of Claudie Sheinbaum, the first woman to hold the office of President of that country, who will be inviting Sanchez, not even the King of Spain, on Tuesday, July.

But the Spanish Foreign Ministry has now announced that they will not send a representative to the inauguration because King Philip VI was not invited to the event, which is unacceptable.

Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez expressed regret over the "unacceptable and unreasonable" decision of the upcoming Mexican government and explained that they wanted to express protest.

"Spain and Mexico are brotherly countries  ⁇  and therefore the exclusion of our king seems unacceptable", he told reporters. "Let us not forget that this king was right at all inaugurations first as a prince and then as a king. We cannot accept his exclusion and have therefore informed the Mexican government that no Spanish representative will be present at the inauguration.

Sheinbaum explained in a statement on Wednesday that the monarch was not invited because he did not respond to a 2019 letter from current President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador, asking him to publicly apologize for the Spanish conquest of the Americas.

Claudia Sheinbaum: "We need respect"

The letter, sent by the president, who has been critical of Spain on several occasions during his term, marked the 200th anniversary of Mexico's independence and called for a public recognition of the crimes committed by the Spanish conquest. The Ministry of Foreign Affairs in Madrid at the time rejected the apology.

Sheinbaum was critical that the king had not responded to her letter until Wednesday and that part of the letter had been leaked to the media. But she rejected suggestions that the dispute would cut ties with Spain. "Of course not, but we need respect", she said.

She is convinced that a renewed historical perspective in line with the development of both nations would benefit the relationship.

The list of those invited to the inauguration has already angered a number of people, including Russian President Vladimir Putin.
2024-09-26.english_title: A colonial dispute between Mexico and Spain arose because the King was not invited to the inauguration

2024-09-26.content:
Česa je strah voznike e-skirojev?

Avtomobilski kviz številka 13

V avtomobilskem kvizu številka 14 vas sprašujemo, česa je strah voznike e-skirojev?

Pred vami je najbolj Avtomobilnostni kviz v Sloveniji! Vsak teden bomo za vas pripravili eno zanimivo vprašanje, s katerim bomo na preizkus postavili vaše znanje o avtomobilih, prometu in mobilnosti nasploh. Namen kviza je razkrivati številne neznane zgodbe, ki so zaznamovale avtomobilsko zgodovino in prometno mobilnost. Na zastavljeno vprašanje vam ponujamo tri rešitve, vi pa izberite pravo. Čez teden dni bomo razkrili pravilni odgovor in osvetlili ozadje zgodbe.



Namig k vprašanju

Malo čustev ima takšen vpliv na naše vedenje in počutje kot strah, ki je eno izmed naših temeljnih čustev. V Avtomobilnosti smo se s strahom in še bolj s fobijami v vožnji že ukvarjali, saj gre za pomemben in pogosto prezrt del vozniške varnosti, ki pesti veliko voznikov. To temo smo odprli s psihologom doc. dr. Janezom Rojškom, ki je za Avtomobilnost takrat takole pojasnil razliko med strahom in fobijami: "Treba je ločiti med strahom in fobijami. Poznamo normalen strah, ki je biološka danost človeku, da ne počne neumnosti, ki jih počnemo v življenju, in bi lahko pripeljale celo do tega, da bi človeško raso iztrebili. Ta strah je točno znan.“

Fobije, ki imajo svoje korene pogosto v preteklih, neprijetnih travmatičnih izkušnjah ali aktualnih izkušnjah v vsakdanjem življenju in se ločijo na preproste in kompleksnejših ter do travmatskih fobij, ki so zelo nejasne v svojem nastanku, pa prav tako pomembno vplivajo na človekovo dejavnost. Tudi na našo vožnjo, ne le na dinamiko v naših medsebojnih odnosih ali na naše odnose v poklicu, ki ga opravljamo. Janez Rojšek dodaja: "Fobije vedno sprožijo situacije, ki so vezane na posamezne predmete ali situacijske dejavnosti, V prometu se lahko bojimo predorov, vožnje z avtomobilom, na drugi stani se lahko bojimo ostrih predmetov, zobozdravnika in podobno. To so najpogostejše fobije”.
2024-09-26.title: Česa je strah voznike e-skirojev?

What's the fear of e-scooter drivers?

The car quiz number 13

In the car quiz number 14, we ask you, what is the fear of e-scooter drivers?

You're in front of the most exciting car quiz in Slovenia! Each week we will prepare an interesting question for you to test your knowledge of cars, traffic and mobility in general. The purpose of the quiz is to reveal many unknown stories that have marked the history of the automobile and mobility. We offer you three solutions to the question you ask, and you choose the right one. In a week's time, we'll reveal the correct answer and shed some light on the background.



Hint to the question

A little emotion has as much effect on our behavior and feelings as fear, which is one of our basic emotions. In the automotive sector, we have already dealt with fear and even more with driving phobias, as this is an important and often overlooked part of driving safety that plagues many drivers. We opened this topic with psychologist Dr. Jan Roischk, who explained the difference between fear and phobias to Automobile at the time: "There is a distinction between fear and phobias. We know the normal fear, which is a biological gift to man, that he will not do the stupid things we do in life, and that it could even lead to the extermination of the human race. This fear is well known.

Phobia, which often have roots in past, unpleasant traumatic experiences or current experiences in everyday life and are distinguished from simpler and more complex and even traumatic phobias, which are very vague in their origin, also have a significant impact on human activity. And it's about our driving, not just the dynamics of our relationships with each other or our relationships in the profession we're doing. Janez Royszek adds: "Phobia is always triggered by situations that are related to particular objects or situations. In traffic, we may be afraid of tunnels, driving a car, at other stations we may be afraid of sharp objects, the dentist and the like. These are the most common phobias.

2024-09-26.content:
Danski zvezdnik in kulinarični kritik ovadena zaradi "perverznega" uživanja živih jastogov

Aktivisti za pravice živali zgroženi

Danski igralec Pilou Asbæk se je ta mesec mudil na Ferskih otokih, kjer je v družbi danskega kulinaričnega kritika Sørena Franka izkušal tudi otoško kulinarično sceno. A ena od večerij je zvezdniku in piscu prinesla ovadbo policiji.

Asbæka in Franka je zaradi "okrutnosti nad živalmi" med zasebno večerjo policiji prijavila aktivistka okoljske organizacije Sea Shepherd (Morski pastir).

Søren Frank, eden najbolj uveljavljenih danskih gastronomskih piscev, je izkušnjo na Ferskih otokih sam opisal v reportaži v danskem časopisu Berlingske, v kateri je med drugim zapisal, da je skoraj pet ur dolg obed, ki ga je opisal kot "bizarno in popolnoma noro večerjo gospodov", nenehno prehajal med slastnim in ogabnim.

Uglednima gostoma so med večerjo na domu izvoznika morske hrane Gunnarja Marnija Simonsena med drugim postregli jastoge, ki jih je morala družba pojesti (napol) žive, potem ko so samo rep za 12 sekund potopili v vrelo vodo. Rep so nato zaužili, medtem ko so morali jedci držati jastoga za klešče, da jih ta ne bi ugriznil v nos.

 "Okus je nebeško čist, z le nekaj kapljami limone in ščepcem soli," piše o izkušnji Frank.

42-letni Asbæk, pri nas najbolj znan po vlogi v danski seriji Oblast (Borgen), na Ferskih otokih pa je snemal svoj novi film, nato doživi "dramatični vrhunec obeda", ko se zaplete v "spopad z živahno hobotnico z osmimi lovkami, preden se mu uspe osvoboditi njenih priseskov". Hobotnica nato roma naravnost iz igralčevih rok v ponev, kjer jo za nekaj sekund flambirajo, nato pa pojedo.

Pozivi, naj kritika odpustijo

Dvojico je policiji prijavila Valentina Crast, kampanjska vodja kontroverzne skrajne organizacije Sea Shepherd. Je tudi nekdanja kandidatka za evropsko poslanko stranke Alternativet.

Kot meni ona, so na ferski večerji udeleženci več kot očitno kršili zakon o zaščiti živali. Valentina Crast je dejanja Franka in Asbæka označila za "bolna" in "brutalna", ovadbo pa je vložila tudi proti izvozniku morske hrane Simonsenu in uradni turistični organizaciji Ferskih otokov Visit Faroe Islands.

Zgroženi so tudi v neprofitni organizaciji Dyrenes Alliance. "Pilou Asbæk in Søren Frank, lahko vaju je sram. Nesprejemljivo je, da promovirata kulturo, v kateri je sprejemljivo mučiti in zlorabljati živali preprosto zato, ker nimajo glasu, da bi jih slišali!" so zapisali na Instagramu.

"Kako lahko kdo brani krutost, ki so ji izpostavljene te živali? Prav nič zabavnega ni na tem – to je sadizem! Nobena žival ne bi smela trpeti za človeški užitek ali gastronomijo."

Ob tem so časopis Berlingske pozvali, naj Franka nemudoma odpusti.

Asbæk: Nihče ni bolj prizadet kot jaz

Dogodek je dvignil toliko prahu, da se je bil Asbæk prisiljen odzvati in se opravičiti vsem, ki jih je s svojo "fersko izkušnjo" prizadel, pri tem pa krivdo posredno naprtil Franku, ki da je članek objavil brez njegove vednosti. 

"Nihče ni bolj prizadet zaradi razprave, kot sem jaz. Kot ljudje smo dolžni spoštljivo ravnati z živalmi. Ne glede na to, ali gre za prašiče iz danske živinoreje ali pa morski živelj Severnega Atlantika," je zapisal na Instagramu. 

"S filmsko ekipo smo bili povabljeni na posebno in zasebno večerjo s ferskimi specialitetami. Zato sem kot gost hotel tudi izkazati kulturno ponižnost in radovednost do ferskih gostiteljev. Moj namen nikakor ni bil, da bi se to zgodilo na račun moje predanosti do živali, kar sem malce naivno prepustil gostiteljem večera."

Ob tem je še poudaril, da sam ni jedel živih jastogov, omenjenih v Frankovem članku, kot tudi ni vedel, da bo pisec celoten večer opisal v reportaži z Asbækom v glavni vlogi.

Vodja Morskega pastirja v zaporu

Vodja Morskega pastirja, 73-letni ameriško-kanadski državljan Paul Watson, je od julija v priporu na Grenlandiji, kjer so ga tamkajšnje oblasti v sodelovanju z danskimi priprle na podlagi mednarodnega naloga za aretacijo.

Nalog za aretacijo je izdala japonska obalna straža zaradi incidenta iz leta 2010, ko je Watson z detonacijo eksplozivnih sredstev skušal ovirati uradno misijo japonske ladje za lov na kite. Watsonu, ki je tudi soustanovitelj Greenpeacea, grozi 12-letna zaporna kazen.
2024-09-26.title: Danskizvezdnikinkulinaričnikritikovadenazaradiperverznega uživanja živih jastogov
2024-09-26.english_content:
Danish star and culinary critic accused of "perverting" live lizard consumption

Animal rights activists in danger

Danish actor Pilou Asbæk has been to the Faroe Islands this month, where he has also experienced the island's culinary scene in the company of Danish culinary critic Søren Frank. But one night, she brought a star and a writer a police report.

Asbæka and Franka were reported to police during a private dinner by environmental activist Sea Shepherd for "animal cruelty".

Søren Frank, one of Denmark's most prominent gastronomic writers, himself described his experience in the Faroe Islands in a report in the Danish newspaper Berlingske, in which he wrote, among other things, that the nearly five-hour lunch, which he described as "a bizarre and utterly insane gentleman's dinner", was constantly torn between delicious and disgusting.

The distinguished guests were served with a meal at the home of seafood exporter Gunnar Marnie Simonsen, among other things, with the company having to eat (half) live, after having submerged their tail in hot water for only 12 seconds. The tail was then swallowed, while the eaters had to hold the lizard by the ribs to prevent it from biting them in the nose.

"The taste is heavenly, with only a few drops of lemon and a pinch of salt", says Frank.

Asbæk, 42, best known for his role in the Danish series Oblast (Borgen), was filming his new film in the Persian Islands, then experiencing "the dramatic climax of the lunch" when he "clashed with a lively octopus with eight hunters before he managed to free himself of its prey". The lobster then rots straight from the player's hands into the frogs, where it is flavored for a few seconds and then eaten.

Calls for Forgiveness of Criticism

The two were reported to the police by Valentina Crast, campaign manager of the controversial extremist organization Sea Shepherd. She is also a former candidate for the European Parliament from the Alternative Party.

In her opinion, the parties at the fairy dinner were more than obviously breaking the animal welfare law. Valentina Crast called the actions of Frank and Asbæka 'sick' and 'brutal' and also lodged an appeal against the seafood exporter Simonsen and the official tourism organisation Visit Faroe Islands.

They're also threatened by the nonprofit Dyrenes Alliance. "Pilou Asbæk and Søren Frank, you may be ashamed. It is unacceptable that they promote a culture in which it is acceptable to torture and abuse animals simply because they have no voice to be heard!" they wrote on Instagram.

"How can anyone resist the cruelty to which these animals are exposed? There's nothing funny about it. It's sadism. No animal should suffer for human pleasure or gastronomy".

At the same time, the Berlin newspaper called for Frank's immediate dismissal.

No one is more affected than I am.

The event was so devastating that Asbæk was forced to respond and apologize to all those he had hurt by his "physical experience", and in doing so indirectly blamed Frank, who had published the article without his knowledge.

"No one is more affected by the debate than I am. As humans, we are obligated to treat animals with respect. Whether it's pigs from the Danish livestock industry or a North Atlantic marine resident", he wrote on Instagram.

"The film crew and I were invited to a special and private dinner featuring fairy tales. So as a guest, I also wanted to show cultural humility and curiosity toward the fair's hosts. My intention was not to make this happen at the expense of my devotion to animals, which I had slightly naively left to the hosts of the evening".

He also pointed out that he did not eat the live lizards mentioned in Frank's article, nor did he know that the writer would cover the entire evening in a story with Asbæk in the lead role.

The Chief of the Shepherds at the Prison

The head of the Marine Shepherd, 73-year-old US-Canadian Paul Watson, has been detained in Greenland since July, where he was arrested by the authorities in cooperation with the Danish authorities on an international arrest warrant.

A warrant for his arrest was issued by the Japanese Coast Guard for an incident in 2010 when Watson attempted to detonate explosives to disrupt the official mission of a Japanese whaling ship. Watson, who also co-founded Greenpeace, faces a 12-year prison sentence.
2024-09-26.english_title: Danish star culinary criticism of the perverse use of live lizards

2024-09-26.author: K. S.
2024-09-26.content:
V Mariboru se z degustacijami začenja 24. festival najstarejše trte

V štirih dnevih številne pokušnje in dogodki

V Mariboru se z okroglo mizo Ne sodi vina po etiketi in vinskimi pokušnjami začenja 24. Festival najstarejše trte. S festivalom vina, kulinarike in kulture se v štajerski prestolnici poklanjajo najstarejši trti na svetu, 450-letni Guinnessovi rekorderki.

Vrhunec dogajanja bo nedeljska trgatev stare trte na Lentu.

Štiridnevni festivalski program vključuje tri vinsko-kulinarične večere, tridnevno tržnico slovenskih dobrot in doživetja, kot so tradicionalno splavarjenje po Dravi, pohod po mestnih gričih in obisk Vinagove vinske kleti. Festival, ki ga vsako leto pripravljajo v sodelovanju z lokalnimi ponudniki, bo letos prvič gostoval tudi na kulturnih prizoriščih – v Umetnostni galeriji Maribor in na arkadah Mariborskega gradu.

Kot je pred dogodkom dejal mariborski župan Saša Arsenovič, se je zgodovina mesta začela ob reki, s prenovo Lenta pa so ta del mesta končno vrnili občanom in tudi znameniti najstarejši trti. Veseli se zaključka prenove Hiše najstarejše trte, ki bo skupaj z Minoriti in Vojašniškim trgom zaokrožila mestno zgodbo, posvečeno kulturi in gastronomiji.

V petek bodo na arkadah Mariborskega gradu pripravili vinsko-kulinarični večer, na katerem bodo obiskovalci spoznavali ponudbo vinotek in vinskih barov, v soboto pa bo večer z vrhunskima sommelierema Valentino Bufolina in Vaneso Centrih. Na Glavnem trgu bo v petek in soboto tržnica slovenskih dobrot, na kateri se bo predstavljalo 15 imetnikov certifikata Naše najboljše.

Vrhunec bo trgatev

V nedeljo se bo tržnica preselila na Trg pri najstarejši trti, kjer bo dopoldne vrhunec festivala – 38. praznik trgatve najstarejše trte na svetu v družbi gospodarja trte, župana Arsenoviča, skrbnika trte Staneta Kocutarja, mariborske vinske kraljice Maruše Mukenauer in vinske kraljice Slovenije Sanje Ferjančič, vinskih vitezov ter malečniških bračev.

Prvi grozd bo odrezal Jože Protner, ki je tesno povezan z najstarejšo trto, saj je leta 1980 podpisal delovni nalog, po katerem se je ekipa agronomov lotila revitalizacije trte, sedem let pozneje pa je zasnoval program prve slovesne trgatve najstarejše trte.

Letošnja pozeba v delu štajerskih vinogradov trte ni prizadela, je pa že s tvorbo cvetnih zasnov dala vedeti, da grozdja ne bo zelo veliko, je povedal skrbnik trte Kocutar. Letošnji pridelek znaša 14 kilogramov. V zadnjih 38 letih je bil najmanjši pridelek leta 2011, ko je tehtal 13 kilogramov, največji pa leta 2019, kar 107 kilogramov, je še povedal.

Po spletu srečnih okoliščin so organizatorji pridobili avtentično zaprto stekleničko prve polnitve vin najstarejše trte letnika 1987. To je bilo veliko presenečenje, saj so bili prepričani, da so vse stekleničke prve polnitve izgubljene. Stekleničko bodo javno predstavili na dogodku VinDel 16. oktobra, nato pa jo bodo predali Muzeju najstarejše trte na svetu.
2024-09-26.title: V Mariboru se z degustacijami začenja 24. festival najstarejše trte
2024-09-26.english_content:
The 24th annual festival of the oldest strawberries begins in Maribor with tastings

In four days, many trials and events

In Maribor, a round table is not judged by the label and wine tasting starts 24. The festival of the oldest string. With the festival of wine, culinary and culture, the world's oldest strawberry, the 450-year-old Guinness World Record, is being presented in the Styria capital.

The highlight of the event will be Sunday's old-growth crackling at Lent.

The four-day festival programme includes three wine-culinary evenings, a three-day Slovenian fare market and experiences such as traditional Dravist bathing, walking around the town hills and visiting Vinagova wine cellar. The festival, which is organised annually in cooperation with local suppliers, will also be hosted for the first time this year at cultural venues  ⁇  in the Maribor Art Gallery and the Maribor Castle arcades.

As Maribor Mayor Sasha Arsenovic said before the event, the history of the city began by the river, and with the renovation of Lenta, this part of the city was finally returned to the citizens and also the oldest known trut. The renovation of the oldest house of the trunk, which will surround the town's history, with its history of culture and gastronomy, together with the Minority and the Military Market, is being completed.

On Friday, the Maribor Castle arcades will host a wine-culinary evening, where visitors will learn about the offer of wineries and wine bars, and on Saturday, the evening will be with top sommeliers Valentino Bufolino and Vanessa Centrih. On Friday and Saturday, the Main Market will host a Slovenian charity market, which will present 15 holders of the Certificate of Our Best.

The top will be crushed

On Sunday, the market will move to the Market at the oldest vineyard, where the 38th anniversary of the world's oldest vineyard will be celebrated in the morning, in the company of the vineyard owner, Mayor Arsenovic, the vineyard keeper Stanet Kocutar, Maribor wine queen Maruše Mukenauer and Slovenian wine queen Sanje Ferjančić, the wine knights and the male brothers.

The first grape will be harvested by Jože Protner, who is closely associated with the oldest vine, having signed a work order in 1980 to help a team of agronomists revitalize the vine and seven years later devised the programme for the first solemn market of the oldest vine.

This year's harvest in the vineyard of the Styrofoam has not been affected, but the flowering patterns have already indicated that the grapes will not be very large, said the vineyard manager Kocutar. This year's yield is 14 kilograms. In the last 38 years, the lowest yield was in 2011 when it weighed 13 kilograms and the highest in 2019 was 107 kilograms, he said.

Through a web of happy circumstances, the organizers obtained an authentically sealed bottle of the first bottle of the oldest wine of the year in 1987. This was a big surprise, because they were convinced that all the first-fill bottles were lost. The glass will be unveiled at the VinDel event on October 16 and then handed over to the Museum of the World's Oldest Tree.
2024-09-26.english_title: The 24th annual festival of the oldest strawberries begins in Maribor with tastings

2024-09-26.author: K. S.
2024-09-26.content:
Pariz in Berlin bo še letos povezal hitri vlak

Od decembra dalje bosta Pariz in Berlin povezana z novo linijo hitrih vlakov. Dnevni vlak se bo pridružil priljubljenemu nočnemu vlaku med prestolnicama, ki je spet zaživel lani, ampak ga od takrat pestijo številne tehnične težave.

Dnevna linija med berlinsko postajo Hauptbahnhof in pariško Gare de L’Est zaradi logističnih težav prihaja z zamudo, vožnja pa bo eno uro daljša, kot so sprva napovedovali. Vlak se bo ustavil v Strasbourgu, Karlsruheju in Frankfurt Süd, pot pa bo trajala okoli osem ur, poroča Guardian.

Najhitrejša povezava med francosko in nemško prestolnico trenutno traja slabih devet ur, a je treba enkrat, dvakrat ali trikrat prestopati, zaradi česar je lahko pot precej nezanesljiva.

Za zdaj načrtujejo zgolj eno povezavo na dan – vlak iz Pariza ob 9.55, ta bo v Berlin prispel malo po 18.00, medtem ko bo vlak iz Berlina odpeljal ob 11.54 in bo v Pariz prispel ob 20.00. Upravljavca SNCF in Deutsche Bahn upata, da bodo potniki vlak videli kot drugo možnost letalski izbiri in občutno izboljšavo od dozdajšnje trase.

Vozovnice bodo na prodaj od 59 evrov dalje za enosmerno drugega razreda in od 69 evrov za prvi razred. Cene bodo nihale glede na povpraševanje, rezervacijski sistem pa se bo odprl 16. oktobra in pričakujejo veliko povpraševanje. Na vsakem vlaku je na voljo okoli 530 sedežev.

DB in SNCF sta začela sodelovati leta 2007, od takrat pa hitri vlaki ICE in TGV vozijo na progah Frankfurt–Pariz in Stuttgart–Pariz.

Povezava med Berlinom in Parizom se je že leta težko pričakovala, tudi zaradi vse večjih pritiskov na upravljavce vlakov po Evropi, da okrepijo svoje povezave – tako zaradi zelenih prizadevanj, da bi potnike preusmerili z letal na vlake kot tudi zaradi popandemičnega trenda počasnih potovanj.
2024-09-26.title: Pariz in Berlin bo še letos povezal hitri vlak
2024-09-26.english_content:
Paris and Berlin will be connected by a high-speed train this year.

From December onwards, Paris and Berlin will be connected by a new high-speed train line. The daytime train will join the popular night train between the capitals, which was revived last year but has since been plagued by numerous technical problems.

The daily line between Berlin's Hauptbahnhof and Paris' Gare de L ⁇ Est is delayed by logistical problems, and the journey will be an hour longer than originally predicted. The train will stop in Strasbourg, Karlsruhe and Frankfurt Süd, and the journey will take about eight hours, reports the Guardian.

The fastest connection between the French and German capitals currently takes a poorly nine hours, but it has to be crossed once, twice or three times, making the route quite unreliable.

So far, they're planning only one daily connection  ⁇  the train from Paris at 9.55 a.m., this one will arrive in Berlin shortly after 6.00, while the train from Berlin will leave at 11.54 a.m. and arrive in Paris at 8.00. The operator SNCF and Deutsche Bahn hope that passengers will see the train as a second air choice and a significant improvement from the current route.

Tickets will be on sale from €59 for single-way second class and from €69 for first class. Prices will vary according to demand and the booking system will open on 16 October and expect high demand. There are approximately 530 seats available on each train.

DB and SNCF started cooperating in 2007 and since then ICE and TGV high-speed trains have been operating on the Frankfurt ⁇ Paris and Stuttgart ⁇ Paris lines.

The link between Berlin and Paris has been difficult to anticipate for years, also due to increasing pressure on train operators across Europe to strengthen their links  ⁇  both due to green efforts to divert passengers from planes to trains and the post-pandemic trend of slow travel.
2024-09-26.english_title: Paris and Berlin will be connected by a high-speed train this year.

2024-09-25.author: Ž. E. Č.
2024-09-25.content:
Finska bo Kitajski predčasno vrnila orjaški pandi

Vrnitev ne bi smela vplivati na odnose med državama

Zaradi naraščajoče inflacije in vzdrževalnih stroškov si živalski vrt na Finskem ne more več privoščiti oskrbe pand Lumi in Pyry, ki sta tja prišla leta 2018 in bi morala tam ostati 15 let. Tako so se odločili, da ju predčasno vrnejo na Kitajsko.

Orjaška pandi, poimenovana Lumi in Pyry, so na Finsko pripeljali januarja 2018, nekaj mesecev po tem, ko je kitajski predsednik Ši Džinping obiskal nordijsko državo in podpisal skupni sporazum o zaščiti živali. Prvotni dogovor je predvideval, da bosta pandi tam ostala 15 let, to pa se je zdaj spremenilo.

Po besedah vodje finskega živalskega vrta Ahtari Rista Sivonena so v objekt za kosmatinca od njunega prihoda pred več kot šestimi leti vložili več kot osem milijonov evrov in se za njuno vzdrževanje – vključno s pristojbino za ohranitev, plačano Kitajski – soočili z letnimi stroški 1,5 milijona evrov.

Čeprav so upali, da bosta črno-bela medveda pritegnila obiskovalce, so lani iz živalskega vrta sporočili, da se spopadajo z vedno večjimi dolgovi, krivec za to je bila predvsem pandemija covida-19, ki je omejila potovanja. Naraščajoča inflacija je še povečala stroške, finska vlada pa je leta 2023 zavrnila prošnje za državno financiranje. Ker si zasebno podjetje ne more več privoščiti oskrbe pand, so tako že lani začeli razpravljati o tem, da pandi predčasno vrnejo v domovino.

Kitajsko veleposlaništvo v Helsinkih je zapisalo, da sta se državi, kljub prizadevanjem Kitajske, da bi pomagala živalskemu vrtu, po prijateljskih posvetovanjih na koncu skupaj odločili za vrnitev pand. "Zdaj smo dosegli točko, ko so Kitajci privolili, da je to mogoče storiti," je dejal Sivonen in dodal, da so pogajanja o vrnitvi živali skupaj trajala tri leta. 

Pandi bosta iz trenutnega doma kmalu odšla v enomesečno karanteno, nato pa bosta potovala na Kitajsko.

Tiskovni predstavnik finskega zunanjega ministrstva je zagotovil, da je bila vrnitev pand poslovna odločitev živalskega vrta, ki ni vključevala finske vlade in ne bi smela vplivati ​​na odnose med državama. Od svoje ustanovitve leta 1949 Ljudska republika Kitajska namreč pošilja pande v tuje živalske vrtove, da bi okrepila trgovinske vezi, utrdila zunanje odnose in okrepila svojo mednarodno podobo.
2024-09-25.title: Finska bo Kitajski predčasno vrnila orjaški pandi
2024-09-25.english_content:
Finland will return the giant panda to China early

The return should not affect relations between States

The Finnish Zoo is no longer able to afford the supplies of the Lumi and Pyry pandas, which arrived in 2018 and should remain there for 15 years, due to rising inflation and maintenance costs. So they decided to send them back to China prematurely.

The giant pandas, named Lumi and Pyry, were brought to Finland in January 2018, a few months after Chinese President Xi Jinping visited the Nordic country and signed a joint agreement on animal protection. The original agreement was that the pandas would stay there for 15 years, but that has now changed.

According to the head of the Finnish zoo Ahtari Rista Sivonena, the kosmatin facility has been invested more than eight million euros since its arrival more than six years ago and has been subject to annual costs of 1.5 million euros for its maintenance  ⁇  including the maintenance fee paid to China  ⁇ .

Although they hoped to attract visitors to the zoo, they reported from the zoo last year that they were facing increasing debts, primarily due to the COVID-19 pandemic that has restricted travel. The increase in inflation has further increased costs and the Finnish government rejected the requests for state funding in 2023. Since private companies can no longer afford to supply the pandas, they began discussing early repatriation last year.

The Chinese Embassy in Helsinki reported that despite China's efforts to help the zoo, they finally decided to return the panda after friendly consultations. "We have now reached a point where the Chinese have allowed this to be done", Sivonen said, adding that the talks on the animals' return together have lasted three years.

The pandas will soon leave their current home for a one-month quarantine, and then travel to China.

A press representative from the Finnish Ministry of Foreign Affairs assured that the return of the pand was a business decision of the zoo, which did not involve the Finnish government and should not affect relations between the states. Since its establishment in 1949, the People's Republic of China has been sending pandas to foreign zoos to strengthen trade ties, strengthen foreign relations and strengthen its international image.
2024-09-25.english_title: Finland will return the giant panda to China early

2024-09-25.content:
Obnovljene tri zmagovalke akcije Naj planinska pot

Akcija Naj planinska pot

V sklopu akcije Naj planinska pot so markacisti konec poletja obnovili lansko zmagovalko, to je pot s Kamniškega sedla do Brane in Planjave, ter letošnji naj planinski poti Koželjeva pot ob Kamniški Bistrici in pot Jama Topla–Mala Peca na Koroškem.

Pot s Kamniškega sedla do Brane in Planjave so markacisti zaradi vremenskih razmer obnovili (šele) letos poleti. Lani so obnovo namreč onemogočale ujme, ki so močno prizadele večji del Slovenije, tudi planinske poti, so sporočili iz Zavarovalnice Triglav, ki sodeluje s sredstvi za obnovo. 

Planjava in Brana sta razgledna skalna vrhova Kamniško-Savinjskih Alp, ki ju povezuje planinska pot čez Kamniško sedlo. Čeprav je pot iz Kamniške Bistrice na Kamniško sedlo lahka planinska pot, pa je njeno nadaljevanje do Brane na vzhodu in Planjave na zahodu bolj zahtevno in primerno za izkušene planince.

Zanimiva in slikovita Koželjeva pot ob Kamniški Bistrici je priljubljena lahka planinska pot, primerna za vse starosti, ki vodi po desnem bregu Kamniške Bistrice v zatrep doline do izvira reke.

Kot so pojasnili v zavarovalnici, je bilo treba na zmagovalki letošnjega izbora obnoviti skoraj celotno pot s krajšimi presledki, požagati in odstraniti podrto drevje, odstraniti nanose lesa in drugega materiala ter izdelati stopnice in bočne zaščite.

Sredstva tudi za drugouvrščeno pot

Letos so v Zavarovalnici Triglav, ki glasovanje izvaja s Planinsko zvezo Slovenije (PZS), naredili izjemo in sredstva za obnovo podarili tudi drugouvrščeni poti, to je poti od jame Topla do Male Pece na Koroškem, za katero skrbi Planinsko društvo Mežica.

Pot, ki se od jame Topla najprej bolj ali manj drži rudarske ceste, nato preči travnik in pod strmimi skalami hudournik Zajčja peč, je zdaj urejena, zaradi obsežnega vetroloma, ki je pred dobrim tednom dni podrl žičnico in ohromil cesto za oskrbovanje, pa je trenutno zaprt Dom na Peci. Zato planincem svetujejo, naj pred obiskom preverijo aktualne razmere glede odprtosti planinske koče.

Zavarovalnica Triglav in PZS sta izbor najbolj priljubljene planinske poti prvič izvedla leta 2017, od takrat so skupaj z omenjenimi tremi obnovili osem različno zahtevnih poti.

Kot prva je bila v akciji Naj planinska pot obnovljena krožna pot Planina Blato–Planina pri Jezeru–Planina Dedno polje–Vrata–Prehodavci–Dvojno jezero–Štapce–Ovčarija–Planina pri Jezeru–Planina Blato. Sledile so Rečiška planinska krožna pot, zelo zahtevna Bambergova planinska pot na Triglav z Luknje čez Plemenice, zelo zahtevna pot s Kranjske koče na Ledinah na Koroško Rinko ter zelo zahtevna Hanzeva pot, ki vodi od Koče na Gozdu na Prisojnik.
2024-09-25.title: Obnovljene tri zmagovalke akcije Naj planinska pot
2024-09-25.english_content:
Renewed three winning streams Let the Mountain Path

Action Let the Mountain Path

As part of the action, the Marcacci have restored the last winner at the end of the summer, the route from Kamnický sedl to Brana and Planjave, and this year's Koželovo mountain route to Kamnická Bistrica and the Jam Topla ⁇ Mala Peca route to Koroška.

The route from Kamnický sedla to Brana and Planjave was restored by the Marcacists this summer due to weather conditions. Last year, the reconstruction was hampered by the landslides that severely affected most of Slovenia, including mountain roads, said the Triglav Insurance Company, which cooperates with the reconstruction funds.

Planning and Brana are the scenic rocky peaks of the Stony-Savin Alps, linked by a mountain pass over the Stony Sedge. Although the route from Kamnička Bistrica to Kamnička Sedla is an easy mountain route, its continuation to Brana in the east and Planja in the west is more challenging and suitable for experienced mountaineers.

The interesting and picturesque Kożol's Trail along the Stony Bistrica is a popular light mountain trail suitable for all ages that leads along the right bank of the Stony Bistrica into the valley's watershed to the source of the river.

As explained by the insurer, the winners of this year's election had to rebuild almost the entire route with shorter tracks, burn and remove the fallen trees, remove the wood and other material deposits, and build stairs and side protections.

Funds also for the secondary route

This year, the Triglav Conservancy, which is voting with the Slovenian Mountain Association (SPA), made an exception and donated the funds for the reconstruction of a secondary route, the route from the cave of Topla to the small cave in Krakow, which is run by the Mežica Mountain Society.

The path that follows the cave of Topla, which is a mining road, then a grassland and the rocky rocks of the Rabbit's furnace, is now paved, because of the massive windfall that broke the wire and paralyzed the supply road a week ago. Therefore, it is recommended that mountain climbers check the current conditions regarding the opening of the mountain hut before visiting.

The insurance company Triglav and PZS first carried out the selection of the most popular mountain routes in 2017, since then they have rebuilt eight differently challenging routes together with the three mentioned.

The first was the renewal of the Mountain Road Circular of the Plateau Planin at Lake Plateau. The following were the Racha Mountain Circular Path, the very difficult Bamberg Mountain Path to Triglav from the Hole through the Plemenice, the very difficult path from the Kranjska Cottage on the Idyna to the Koroška Rinko and the very difficult Hanzeva Path leading from the Cottage on the Forest to the Prasarónik.

2024-09-25.author: Ž. E. Č.
2024-09-25.content:
70 portretov Meloni: v Albaniji zaživela restavracija, posvečena italijanski premierki

Je v bližini taborišča, ki bo kmalu obravnavalo prošnje za azil ljudi, ki želijo vstopiti v Evropsko unijo po morju

V albanskem pristanišču se je odprla restavracija z morsko hrano, kjer stene krasi 70 portretov italijanske predsednice vlade Giorgie Meloni – od nasmejane in jezne Meloni pa do Meloni kot otroka in političarke. Vse je naslikal Helidon Haliti.

V Albaniji so odprli restavracijo, posvečeno italijanski premierki Giorgii Meloni. Prostori restavracije Trattoria Meloni so polni podobe Meloni, tam je namreč kar 70 portretov italijanske premierke – od nasmejane, resne in jezne Meloni pa do Meloni kot otroka, najstnice in političarke. "Ko se kuhinja, umetnost in politika združijo, lahko narediš čudovite stvari," je dejal Gjergj Luca, nekdanji igralec in lastnik restavracije z morsko hrano v severnem pristanišču Shëngjin.

Vse portrete je naslikal Helidon Haliti. "Je zelo zanimiv, močan lik. Čeprav se ne strinjam z njenimi političnimi prepričanji, me to ni ustavilo pri strastnem opravljanju dela," je povedal znani albanski umetnik. "Ali sem potreboval dovoljenje za slikanje njenega portreta? Ali je Andy Warhol potreboval dovoljenje za slikanje Marilyn Monroe? V postmodernizmu je to dovoljeno in mislim, da mi je z Meloni uspelo," je še poudaril.

Nova restavracija je sicer v bližini taborišča, ki bo kmalu obravnavalo prošnje za azil ljudi, ki želijo vstopiti v Evropsko unijo (EU) po morju. Gre za enega od dveh centrov, ki naj bi v prihodnjih tednih začela obravnavati prošnje za azil. Po dogovoru, ki ga financira Italija, bodo tisti, ki prečkajo Sredozemlje iz severne Afrike in jih prestreže italijanska obalna straža, odpeljani v Albanijo.

Meloni, ki je v preteklosti pozvala k pomorski zapori severne Afrike, je lokacijo centra Shëngjin obiskala junija, preden se je restavracija odprla. Tako sin slavnega albanskega igralca Luca, ki si je blizu z Ramo in ga je osebnost "izjemne" Meloni očarala, upa, da se bo vrnila in pokusila njegovo hrano ter občudovala portrete, ki krasijo vsak centimeter sten restavracije, poroča Guardian.

Migracijski načrt naj bi bil nezakonit po mednarodnem pravu

Meloni in albanski premier Edi Rama sta migracijski načrt, ki so ga združenja za človekove pravice označila za nezakonitega po mednarodnem pravu, a ga je EU tiho potrdil, prvič skovala lansko poletje. Kljub kritikam so tamkajšnji prebivalci centre v veliki meri pozdravili, saj ustvarjajo delovna mesta v obubožani regiji Albanije.

Britanski premier Keir Starmer je bil po tem, ko je prejšnji teden na srečanju z Meloni v Rimu izrazil "veliko zanimanje" za migracijski pakt in obljubil, da bo poslal štiri milijone funtov v podporo njenemu zatiranju nedovoljene migracije, deležen kritik skupin za človekove pravice in laburistov.

Meloni je bila sicer tudi ključna protagonistka dogovora, podpisanega julija 2023 med EU-jem in Tunizijo, v katerem naj bi severnoafriška država prejela več milijonov evrov za preprečevanje odhodov migrantskih čolnov, pa tudi za naložbe v podjetja in izobraževanje – vse z namenom odvračanje od migracij.

Politika je v zgodnjih fazah obrodila le malo sadov, zdaj pa se dogovoru, skupaj z drugim, ki libijsko obalno stražo usposobi za zaustavljanje odhodov ljudi, pripisuje zmanjšanje prihodov. V skladu z dogovorom z Libijo naj bi ljudi pošiljali nazaj v taborišča, kjer se spoprijemajo z zlorabami.
2024-09-25.title: 70 portretov Meloni: v Albaniji zaživela restavracija, posvečena italijanski premierki
2024-09-25.english_content:
70 portraits of Meloni: a restaurant dedicated to the Italian Prime Minister in Albania

Is it near a camp that will soon be handling asylum applications for people seeking to enter the European Union by sea?

A seafood restaurant opened in the Albanian port, where the walls adorn 70 portraits of Italian Prime Minister Giorgie Meloni, from a smiling and angry Meloni to Meloni as a child and politician. It was painted by Helidon Haliti.

In Albania, they opened a restaurant dedicated to the Italian Prime Minister, Giorgio Meloni. The rooms of Trattoria Meloni are full of images of Meloni, with 70 portraits of Italian prime ministers, from a smiling, serious and angry Meloni to Melona as a child, teenager and politician. "When cooking, art and politics come together, you can do wonderful things", said Gjergj Luca, a former actor and owner of a seafood restaurant in the northern port of Shëngjin.

All the portraits were painted by Helidon Haliti. "He's a very interesting, powerful character. Although I disagree with her political beliefs, this did not stop me from pursuing a passionate career", said the famous Albanian artist. "Did I need permission to paint her portrait? Did Andy Warhol need permission to paint Marilyn Monroe? In postmodernism, this is allowed and I think I did it with Melona", he added.

The new restaurant is located near the camp, which will soon handle asylum applications from people seeking to enter the European Union (EU) by sea. It is one of two centres to start processing asylum applications in the coming weeks. Under the agreement, financed by Italy, those crossing the Mediterranean from North Africa and cut off by the Italian coastguard will be taken to Albania.

Meloni, who has previously invited to North Africa's maritime prison, visited the location of Shengjin Center in June before the restaurant opened. So the son of famous Albanian actor Luca, who is close to Ramo and is fascinated by Meloni's "exceptional" personality, hopes to return and try his food and admire the portraits that decorate every inch of the restaurant's walls, reports the Guardian.

The migration plan is illegal under international law

Meloni and Albanian Prime Minister Edi Rama have created a migration plan, which human rights groups have labeled illegal under international law but which the EU has quietly approved, for the first time last summer. Despite criticism, the city's residents have largely welcomed the job creation in Albania's impoverished region.

UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer was a vocal critic of human rights groups and labourers after he expressed "great interest" in the migration pact at a meeting with Melona in Rome last week and pledged to send £4 million to support its crackdown on illegal migration.

Meloni was also a key player in the agreement signed in July 2023 between the EU and Tunisia, which said the North African country would receive several million euros to prevent the departure of migrant boats, as well as to invest in businesses and education  ⁇  all to deter migration.

The policy has yielded little fruit in its early stages, but now the deal, along with another that the Libyan Coast Guard has been able to stop people leaving, is credited with reducing revenues. Under the agreement with Libya, people were supposed to be sent back to the camps where they were being abused.
2024-09-25.english_title: 70 portraits of Meloni: a restaurant dedicated to the Italian Prime Minister in Albania

2024-09-25.content:
Michael Douglas dopolnil 80, Catherine Zeta-Jones pa 55 let

Oskarjevec ostaja neomajen aktivist in filantrop, ki se zavzema za mir, blaginjo in podporo umetnosti

Igralec Michael Douglas praznuje 80. rojstni dan. Poleg kariernih dosežkov s filmi oskarjevec ostaja neomajen aktivist in filantrop, ki se zavzema za mir, blaginjo in podporo umetnosti. Njegova žena Catherine Zeta-Jones je danes upihnila 55. svečko.

Michael Douglas se je 25. septembra leta 1944 v mestu New Brunswicku v New Jerseyju rodil pozneje ločenima igralcema Diani in Kirku Douglasu. Njegovi stari starši po očetovi strani so bili beloruski judovski priseljenci, mati pa se je rodila na Bermudih kot hči tamkajšnjega generalnega državnega tožilca, podpolkovnika Thomasa Melvilla Dilla, je objavljeno na spletni strani mednarodne spletna podatkovne filmske baze IMDb.

Douglas je obiskoval elitno pripravljalno šolo Choate Rosemary School v Wallingfordu, poletja pa je preživel na snemanjih filmov z očetom. Čeprav je bil igralec sprejet na univerzo Yale, se je odločil za kalifornijsko univerzo v Santa Barbari.

Že v najstniških letih se je odločil za poklic igralca in očeta pogosto spraševal o igralskem poklicu, čeprav je ta odločno nasprotoval njegovi odločitvi. Michael je bil vztrajen in leta 1966 s stransko vlogo nastopil v očetovem filmu Cast a Giant Shadow.

Od svojih prvih igralskih vlog v filmu Hail, Hero! iz leta 1969 in seriji Ulice San Francisca (The Streets of San Francisco) iz leta 1972 je Douglas znan po kultnih vlogah. Med njimi so z oskarjem nagrajena vloga Gordona Gekka v filmu Wall Street iz leta 1987 ter kritiško priznani filmi Usodna privlačnost (Fatal Attraction), Ameriški predsednik (The American President), Prvinski nagon (Basic Instinct) in Lov na zeleni diamant (Romancing the Stone).

Ameriški filmski ustvarjalec je sodeloval tudi pri politično pomembnih in družbeno vplivnih filmih. V začetku letošnjega leta je izšla televizijska miniserija Franklin, v kateri je Douglas upodobil ameriškega genija Benjamina Franklina med njegovim devetletnim bivanjem v Franciji, kjer je ta lobiral za francosko pomoč in leta 1778 sklenil francosko-ameriško zavezništvo.

Nekdanji generalni sekretar Združenih narodov Kofi Annan ga je imenoval za glasnika miru Združenih narodov

Douglas je za svoje delo prejel številna priznanja, med drugim dva oskarja, pet zlatih globusov, nagrado emmy, nagrado AFI za življenjsko delo, dva francoska cezarja za karierne dosežke in nedavno tudi častno palmo za življenjsko delo na 76. festivalu v Cannesu ter nagrado Satyajit Ray za življenjsko delo na filmskem festivalu Goa v Indiji.

Leta 1998 ga je nekdanji generalni sekretar Združenih narodov Kofi Annan imenoval za glasnika miru Združenih narodov. Njegova glavna cilja sta še vedno omejitev jedrskega orožja in nadzor nad strelskim orožjem. Je tudi član upravnega odbora fundacije Ploughshares in nevladne Pobude za preprečevanje jedrske grožnje.

Več let je tudi gostil dobrodelni golfski dogodek z naslovom Michael Douglas in prijatelji, na katerem so zbrali več kot šest milijonov ameriških dolarjev za ameriški Sklad za filmsko in televizijsko industrijo.

Douglas je poročen s 55-letno valižansko igralko Catherine Zeta-Jones, prav tako oskarjevka, ki rojstni dan prav tako kot on praznuje 25. septembra. Skupaj imata sina Dylana Michaela in hčerko Carys Zeto. Iz prejšnjega zakona z Diandro Luker ima igralec še sina Camerona.
2024-09-25.title: Michael Douglas dopolnil 80, Catherine Zeta-Jones pa 55 let
2024-09-25.english_content:
Michael Douglas is 80, and Catherine Zeta-Jones is 55.

The Oscar winner remains an unwavering activist and philanthropist committed to peace, prosperity and support for the arts.

Actor Michael Douglas is celebrating his 80th birthday. In addition to his film career achievements, the Oscar winner remains an unwavering activist and philanthropist committed to peace, prosperity and support for the arts. His wife, Catherine Zeta-Jones, inhaled the 55th candle today.

Michael Douglas was born on September 25, 1944, in New Brunswick, New Jersey, to actresses Diana and Kirk Douglas, who later divorced. His paternal grandparents were Belarusian Jewish immigrants, and his mother was born in Bermuda as the daughter of the local Attorney General, Lieutenant Colonel Thomas Melville Dill, according to the website of the international online film database IMDb.

Douglas attended the elite preparatory school Choate Rosemary School in Wallingford, and spent the summer filming with his father. Although the actor was accepted to Yale University, he chose the University of California at Santa Barbara.

He decided to pursue an acting career as a teenager, and he often questioned his father about his acting career, although he strongly opposed his decision. Michael was persistent and in 1966 he appeared in his father's film Cast a Giant Shadow as a supporting actor.

From his first acting roles in the 1969 film Hail, Hero! and 1972 series The Streets of San Francisco, Douglas has been known for his cult roles. Among them are the Oscar-winning role of Gordon Geck in the 1987 film Wall Street and the critically acclaimed films Fatal Attraction, The American President, Basic Instinct, and Romancing the Stone.

The American filmmaker has also worked on politically important and socially influential films. Earlier this year, there was a television miniseries Franklin in which Douglas enriched American genius Benjamin Franklin during his nine-year stay in France, where he lobbied for French aid and in 1778 concluded a Franco-American alliance.

Former United Nations Secretary-General Kofi Annan appointed him as the United Nations Messenger of Peace

Douglas has received numerous accolades for his work, including two Oscars, five Golden Globes, an Emmy Award, an AFI Lifetime Achievement Award, two French César Awards for Career Achievement, and recently the Palme d'Or for Lifetime Achievement at the 76th Cannes Film Festival, and the Satyajit Ray Lifetime Achievement Award at the Goa Film Festival in India.

In 1998, former United Nations Secretary-General Kofi Annan appointed him as the United Nations Messenger of Peace. Its main objectives remain to limit nuclear weapons and control firearms. He is also a member of the board of directors of the Ploughshares Foundation and the non-governmental Nuclear Threat Prevention Initiative.

For years, he also hosted a charity golf event called Michael Douglas and Friends, which raised over $6 million for the American Film and Television Industry Fund.

Douglas is married to the 55-year-old Welsh actress Catherine Zeta-Jones, also an Oscar winner who celebrates her birthday on September 25 as he does. They have a son, Dylan Michael, and a daughter, Carys Zeta. From a previous marriage to Diandro Luker, the actor has a son, Cameron.
2024-09-25.english_title: Michael Douglas is 80, and Catherine Zeta-Jones is 55.

Magna na avstrijskem Štajerskem zaradi težav v panogi odpušča: delo bo izgubilo 200 ljudi

Obrat Magna Powertrain v Lannachu je bil predviden kot osrednje Magnino vozlišče za e-mobilnost

Družba Magna Steyr je zaradi težav v panogi napovedala, da bo odpustila 200 zaposlenih v obratu na avstrijskem Štajerskem, kjer izdelujejo pogone za električna vozila. Če se položaj ne bo izboljšal, utegne biti ogroženih do 2500 delovnih mest.

Obrat Magna Powertrain s sedežem v kraju Lannach na avstrijskem Štajerskem, kjer že leta izdelujejo menjalnike in štirikolesne pogone, je bil predviden kot osrednje Magnino vozlišče za e-mobilnost. V njem naj bi med drugim izdelovali motorje za električne avtomobile ameriškega proizvajalca Fisker, ki pa je pred nekaj meseci v ZDA razglasil bankrot.

Trenutno v Magni Powertrain izdelujejo zgolj elektromotorje za električne avtomobile razreda G znamke Mercedes-Benz, ki jih proizvaja sestrsko podjetje Magna Steyr v Gradcu. Vendar novih naročil ni na vidiku, zato je vodstvo pred nekaj dnevi sporočilo, da so prisiljeni zmanjšati število delovnih mest za 200.

Kriza v obratu Magna Powertrain, ki je po informacijah avstrijske televizije ORF še pred dvema letoma zaposloval 2950 delavcev, se je po poročanju avstrijskih medijev napovedovala že nekaj časa. Menedžerjem in inženirjem so tako že lani svetovali, naj si poiščejo službo kje drugje.

Magna pa nima težav le s svojim obratom v Lannachu. Že spomladi je namreč sporočila, da bodo zaprli tovarno v Roitzschu pri Bitterfeldu v nemški zvezni deželi Saška-Anhalt, v kateri izdelujejo menjalnike s štirikolesnim pogonom za luksuzne avtomobile z notranjim zgorevanjem. Tam je brez dela ostalo 250 zaposlenih.

Magna ima v Evropi še več težav. Britanski Jaguar bo letos v tovarni Magna Steyr v Gradcu opustil proizvodnjo dveh modelov, in sicer kompaktnega športnega terenca E-Pace z motorjem z notranjim zgorevanjem in njegovega električnega dvojnika I-Pace. Vnovič naj bi jo zagnal šele leta 2027. Poleg tega je britanski proizvajalec Ineos za nedoločen čas odložil začetek proizvodnje električnega terenskega vozila fusilier, ki naj bi bila zaupana Magni Steyr.

V Gradcu Magna Steyr trenutno zaposluje 7000 delavcev, medtem ko jih je bilo še lani jeseni 8000. Vendar se je od tistih, ki so iz podjetja odšli, le okoli 200 ljudi prijavilo na uradu za zaposlovanje. Nekateri so se preusmerili v druge poklice, je poročal časnik Kleine Zeitung ter dodal, da ni zanemarljivo tudi število odpuščenih delavcev iz Slovenije, ki pa se ne odraža v štajerski brezposelnosti.
2024-09-25.title: Magna na avstrijskem Štajerskem zaradi težav v panogi odpušča: delo bo izgubilo 200 ljudi
2024-09-25.english_content:
Magna in Styria, Austria, fires 200 people due to industrial problems

The rotation of the Magna Powertrain in Lannach was envisaged as Magna's central e-mobility hub

Magna Steyr has announced that it will lay off 200 employees at its plant in Styria, Austria, where it produces electric vehicle engines, due to problems in the industry. If the situation does not improve, up to 2500 jobs could be at risk.

The Magna Powertrain plant, located in the town of Lannach in Stajersk, Austria, where the transmission and four-wheel drive have been manufactured for years, was intended as a central Magna hub for e-mobility. It was supposed to manufacture engines for electric cars from the US manufacturer Fisker, which declared bankruptcy a few months ago in the US.

At present, Magna Powertrain only manufactures electric motors for Mercedes-Benz G-Class electric cars, which are produced by its sister company Magna Steyr in Graz. But new jobs are not in sight, so management announced a few days ago that they were forced to cut jobs by 200.

The crisis at Magna Powertrain, which employed 2,950 workers two years ago, according to Austrian television ORF, has been reported in the Austrian media for some time. So last year, managers and engineers were advised to look elsewhere for work.

Magna's only got problems with its plant in Lannach. In the spring, it announced that a plant in Roitzsch near Bitterfeld in the German state of Saxony-Anhalt would be closed, where it manufactured four-wheel drive transmissions for luxury cars with internal combustion. There are 250 unemployed workers left there.

Magna has more problems in Europe. The British Jaguar will cease production of two models this year at Magna Steyr's factory in Graz, namely the compact E-Pace sports car with an internal combustion engine and its electric I-Pace. It's not supposed to be restarted until 2027. In addition, the British manufacturer Ineos postponed indefinitely the start of production of the electric field vehicle fusilier, which was to be entrusted to Magni Steyr.

The Magna Steyr Workshop currently employs 7000 workers, up from 8000 last autumn. However, of those who left the company, only about 200 applied for employment. Some have switched to other professions, reported the newspaper Kleine Zeitung, adding that the number of dismissed workers in Slovenia is not negligible, but that it is not reflected in the unemployment rate.
2024-09-25.english_title: Magna in Styria, Austria, fires 200 people due to industrial problems

Turistični avgust za Slovenijo rekorden

Največ prenočitev domačih turistov je bilo v občini Piran, med tujimi pa v Ljubljani

Slovenijo je avgusta obiskalo 1,18 milijona turistov oziroma 18,2 odstotka več kot avgusta lani. Število prenočitev se je povečalo za 13,9 odstotka, na rekordnih 3,27 milijona. Največ prenočitev so našteli v občini Bled.

Po podatkih statističnega urada so domači turisti avgusta ustvarili skoraj 187.000 prihodov in nekaj več kot 633.000 prenočitev. Prvih je bilo 16 odstotkov več kot avgusta lani, drugih pa sedem odstotkov več. Največ njihovih prenočitev je bilo v občini Piran, sledile so občine Izola, Brežice in Ankaran.

Tako kot julija so največ prenočitev med domačimi turisti (18 odstotkov) ustvarili otroci iz starostne skupine od sedem do 14 let, njihova povprečna doba bivanja pa je bila 3,8 prenočitve.

Prihodov tujih turistov je bilo nekaj več kot 996.000 oziroma za skoraj petino več kot lani, prenočitev pa 2,6 milijona oziroma 16 odstotkov več. Med njimi so po navedbah državnega statističnega urada že tradicionalno najbolj priljubljene občine Ljubljana, Piran in Bled. V teh treh občinah so ustvarili nekaj več kot tretjino vseh tujih prenočitev.

Med tujimi turisti je bila najbolj zastopana starostna skupina od 35 do 44 let, povprečna doba bivanja te starostne skupine pa je znašala 2,7 prenočitve.

Po deležu prenočitev so bile na prvem mestu gorske občine (39 odstotkov vseh prenočitev), največ so jih našteli v občini Bled. S petino vseh prenočitev so sledile obmorske občine, pri čemer je bil najbolj priljubljen Piran. Sledile so zdraviliške občine (14 odstotkov) z Brežicami na vrhu in občina Ljubljana (12 odstotkov).

V osmih mesecih skupaj je bilo prihodov s 4,79 milijona 6,2 odstotka več, prenočitev pa z 12,54 milijona 4,3 odstotka več.
2024-09-25.title: Turistični avgust za Slovenijo rekorden
2024-09-25.english_content:
Record tourist August for Slovenia

The largest number of overnight stays of domestic tourists was in the municipality of Piran, and among foreigners in Ljubljana

Slovenia received 1.18 million tourists in August, an increase of 18.2 percent over last August. The number of overnight stays increased by 13.9 percent to a record 3.27 million. The most overnight stay was in the Bled congregation.

According to the Office for National Statistics, domestic tourists generated almost 187,000 arrivals and slightly more than 633,000 overnight stays in August. The first was 16 percent higher than in August last year, and the other seven percent higher. Most of their overnight stay was in the Piran municipality, followed by the municipalities of Izola, Brežica and Ankaran.

As in July, the highest number of overnight stays among domestic tourists (18 percent) were made by children aged seven to 14, with an average stay of 3.8 nights.

Foreign tourists came in at just over 996,000, or nearly a fifth more than last year, and overnight stays were 2.6 million, or 16 percent more. According to the State Statistical Office, the traditional most popular municipalities are Ljubljana, Piran and Bled. In these three congregations, they generated just over a third of all overnight stays.

The average stay of the foreign tourists was 2.7 nights, with the 35 to 44-year-old age group being the most represented.

The first place in the mountain community (39 percent of all overnight stays) was the Bled County. With one fifth of all overnight stays, coastal communities followed, with Piran being the most popular. The healthcare communities (14%) followed, with Brežicá at the top and Ljubljana (12%) followed.

In eight months combined, revenues increased by 4.79 million by 6.2 percent and overnight spending by 12.54 million by 4.3 percent.
2024-09-25.english_title: Record tourist August for Slovenia

V laboratoriju prvič vzgojili rubin v kosu nakita

Dragi kamni, pridelani v laboratoriju, so cenovno ugodnejša in okolju prijaznejša alternativa izkopanim kamnom

Britanska raziskovalka oblikovanja nakita Sofie Boons je v platinast prstan vstavila odpadne odrezke pravega rubina. Z novo kemično tehniko, ki jo je razvila, se je droben delček dragulja, ki je že del nakita, pomnožil oz. zrasel v polno velikost.

Sofie Boons, univerzitetna predavateljica in raziskovalka oblikovanja nakita na Univerzi Zahodne Anglije v Bristolu, je razvila posebno kemično tehniko. Ta omogoča, da se drobni delček pravega rubina pomnoži, medtem ko je že nameščen v svojem delu preostalega dela kosa nakita. Univerza verjame, da ta tovrstni proces doslej še ni bil uspešen.

Za gojenje dragulja je Boons začela z rubinastim "semenom", vzetim iz odpadnih odrezkov dragega kamna. Fragment je postavila v platinasto stvaritev, v tem primeru prstan, in nato uporabila kemično sredstvo, imenovano "flux". To zniža temperaturo, kar omogoči rast dragulja.

Za razliko od draguljev, vzgojenih iz nič v laboratoriju, ki so lahko energetsko intenzivni, ali tistih, ki so netrajnostno izkopani iz zemlje, ti rastejo v peči iz kosov odpadnega materiala dragih kamnov in potrebujejo le nekaj dni in samo "pet ur energije", da se razvijejo.

"Eksperimentiram s tem, da jih v peči gojim med pet in petdeset ur," je dejala Boons in pojasnila, da daljši čas pomeni kristale, ki so nekoliko čistejši in večji. "Prizadevam si skrajšati časovni proces, da bi bil bolj trajnosten," je še pristavila. Dodala je, da metoda izpodbija idejo, da so dragi kamni, ki jih ustvarijo ljudje, sintetični. "Rahlo nepredvidljiva rast ima naravne poteze, kar se mi kot izdelovalki nakita zdi fascinantno," je dejala, poroča BBC.

"Posnemajo tisto, kar raste tisoče let v zemlji"

"Dragi kamni, pridelani v laboratoriju, niso umetni. Posnemajo tisto, kar raste tisoče let v zemlji, zato so cenovno ugodnejša alternativa izkopanim kamnom," je povedala Rebecca Enderby, bristolska oblikovalka sodobnega nakita, ki je pisala o laboratorijsko pridelanih diamantih, in dodala, da se spreminja dojemanje njihove vrednosti. 

Po njeno bi lahko bili dragulji, vzgojeni v laboratoriju, bolj "okolju prijazni". "Vendar za ustvarjanje porabijo veliko energije, zato bi jih bilo treba proizvajati z uporabo zelenih ponudnikov energije," je poudarila.

Projekt, ki je del doktorata Boons, je zdaj pritegnil drugo fazo financiranja univerze. Univerza v Bristolu se je pridružila sodelovanju, tako da bo mogoče raziskavo razširiti tudi na druge drage kamne.
2024-09-25.title: V laboratoriju prvič vzgojili rubin v kosu nakita
2024-09-25.english_content:
In the lab, they first raised a ruby in a piece of jewelry.

Laboratory-produced precious stones are a more cost-effective and environmentally friendly alternative to quarried stone

British jewelry designer Sofie Boons inserted scraped ruby into a platinum ring. With the new chemical technique he developed, the tiny piece of jewelry that was already part of the jewelry was multiplied or grew to its full size.

Sofie Boons, a university lecturer and jewelry design researcher at the University of the West of England in Bristol, developed a special chemical technique. This allows a tiny piece of real ruby to multiply while the rest of the piece of jewelry is already installed in its part. The university believes that this process has not been successful.

To cultivate the gem, Boons began with a ruby seed extracted from the waste of precious stones. She put the fragment into a platinum creation, in this case a ring, and then used a chemical called flux. This lowers the temperature, which allows the gem to grow.

Unlike gems that are raised from scratch in a laboratory, which can be energy-intensive, or those that are unsustainably dug out of the ground, these grow in a kiln made of waste material from precious stones and only need a few days and only "five hours of energy" to develop.

"I experiment with growing them in the oven between five and 50 hours", Boons said, explaining that the longer time means crystals that are slightly cleaner and larger. "I plan to shorten the time process to be more sustainable", she added. She added that the method challenges the idea that man-made gemstones are synthetic. "The rapid unpredictable growth is naturally occurring, which I find fascinating as a jeweler", she said, reports the BBC.

"They mimic what grows in the earth for thousands of years"

"The precious stones produced in the laboratory are not artificial. They mimic what grows in the soil for thousands of years, making them a more affordable alternative to quarried stone", said Rebecca Enderby, a Bristol-based designer of modern jewellery who wrote about lab-grown diamonds, adding that the perception of their value is changing.

According to her, jewelry raised in a lab could be more "environmentally friendly". 'But they consume a lot of energy to create, so they should be produced using green energy providers,' she stressed.

The project, which is part of Dr. Boons's, has now attracted second phase funding from the university. The University of Bristol has joined the partnership so that the research can be extended to other precious stones.
2024-09-25.english_title: In the lab, they first raised a ruby in a piece of jewelry.
